[03] 1^b^.^eb^ tattha katame so.lasa haaraa? desanaa vicayo yutti pada.t.thaano lakkha.no catubyuuho aava.t.to vibhatti parivattano vevacano pa~n~natti ^a^M0.0002^ea^ otara.no sodhano adhi.t.thaano parikkhaaro samaaropano iti.
[21] desanaa ^a^P0.0002^ea^ vicayo yutti, pada.t.thaano ca lakkha.no.
[22] catubyuuho ca aava.t.to, vibhatti parivattano..
[21] vevacano ca pa~n~natti, otara.no ca sodhano.
[22] adhi.t.thaano parikkhaaro, samaaropano so.laso {so.lasa (sii0)}..
[21] ete so.lasa haaraa, pakittitaa atthato asa.mki.n.naa.
[22] etesa~nceva bhavati, vitthaaratayaa nayavibhattiiti..
[03] 2^b^.^eb^ tattha katame pa~nca nayaa? nandiyaava.t.to tipukkhalo siihavikkii.lito disaalocano a"nkuso iti.
[21] pa.thamo nandiyaava.t.to, dutiyo ca tipukkhalo.
[22] siihavikkii.lito naama, tatiyo nayala~njako {nayala~nchako (sii0)}..
[21] disaalocanamaaha.msu ^a^V0.0003^ea^, catuttha.m nayamuttama.m.
[22] pa~ncamo a"nkuso naama, sabbe pa~nca nayaa gataati..

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaani a.t.thaarasa muulapadaani? nava padaani kusalaani nava padaani akusalaani. tattha katamaani nava padaani akusalaani, ta.nhaa avijjaa lobho doso moho subhasa~n~naa sukhasa~n~naa niccasa~n~naa attasa~n~naati, imaani nava padaani akusalaani, yattha sabbo akusalapakkho sa"ngaha.m samosara.na.m gacchati.

[03] tattha katamaani nava padaani kusalaani? samatho vipassanaa alobho adoso amoho asubhasa~n~naa dukkhasa~n~naa aniccasa~n~naa anattasa~n~naati, imaani nava padaani kusalaani, yattha sabbo kusalapakkho sa"ngaha.m samosara.na.m gacchati.
[21] ta.nhaa ^a^M0.0003^ea^ ca avijjaapi ca, lobho doso tatheva moho ca.
[22] caturo ca vipallaasaa, kilesabhuumii nava padaani..
[21] samatho ^a^P0.0003^ea^ ca vipassanaa ca, kusalaani ca yaani tii.ni muulaani.
[22] caturo satipa.t.thaanaa, indriyabhuumii nava padaani..
[21] navahi ca padehi kusalaa, navahi ca yujjanti akusalapakkhaa.
[22] ete kho muulapadaa, bhavanti a.t.thaarasa padaaniiti..
[06] uddesavaaro.
[03] 4^b^.^eb^ tattha sa"nkhepato netti kittitaa.
[21] assaadaadiinavataa ^a^V0.0004^ea^, nissara.nampi ca phala.m upaayo ca.
[22] aa.nattii ca bhagavato, yogiina.m ^b^desanaahaaro^eb^..
[21] ya.m pucchita~nca vissajjita~nca, suttassa yaa ca anugiiti.
[22] suttassa yo pavicayo, haaro ^b^vicayo^eb^ti niddi.t.tho..
[21] sabbesa.m haaraana.m, yaa bhuumii yo ca gocaro tesa.m.
[22] yuttaayuttaparikkhaa, haaro ^b^yuttii^eb^ti niddi.t.tho..
[21] dhamma.m deseti jino, tassa ca dhammassa ya.m pada.t.thaana.m.
[22] iti yaava sabbadhammaa, eso haaro ^b^pada.t.thaano^eb^..
[21] vuttamhi ekadhamme, ye dhammaa ekalakkha.naa keci.
[22] vuttaa bhavanti sabbe, so haaro ^b^lakkha.no^eb^ naama..
[21] neruttamadhippaayo, bya~njanamatha desanaanidaana~nca.
[22] pubbaaparaanusandhii, eso haaro ^b^catubyuuho^eb^..
[21] ekamhi pada.t.thaane, pariyesati sesaka.m pada.t.thaana.m.
[22] aava.t.tati pa.tipakkhe, ^b^aava.t.to^eb^ naama so haaro..
[21] dhamma~nca ^a^M0.0004^ea^ pada.t.thaana.m, bhuumi~nca vibhajjate aya.m haaro.
[22] saadhaara.ne asaadhaara.ne ca neyyo ^b^vibhattii^eb^ti..
[21] kusalaakusale dhamme, niddi.t.the bhaavite pahiine ca.
[22] parivattati pa.tipakkhe, haaro ^b^parivattano^eb^ naama..
[21] vevacanaani ^a^P0.0004^ea^ bahuuni tu, sutte vuttaani ekadhammassa.
[22] yo jaanaati suttaviduu, ^b^vevacano^eb^ naama so haaro..
[21] eka.m ^a^V0.0005^ea^ bhagavaa dhamma.m, pa~n~nattiihi vividhaahi deseti.
[22] so aakaaro ~neyyo, ^b^pa~n~nattii^eb^ naama haaroti..
[21] yo ca pa.ticcuppaado, indriyakhandhaa ca dhaatu aayatanaa.
[22] etehi otarati yo, ^b^otara.no^eb^ naama so haaro..
[21] vissajjitamhi pa~nhe, gaathaaya.m pucchitaayamaarabbha.
[22] suddhaasuddhaparikkhaa, haaro so ^b^sodhano^eb^ naama..
[21] ekattataaya dhammaa, yepi ca vemattataaya niddi.t.thaa.
[22] tena vikappayitabbaa, eso haaro ^b^adhi.t.thaano^eb^..
[21] ye dhammaa ya.m dhamma.m, janayantippaccayaa paramparato.
[22] hetumavaka.d.dhayitvaa, eso haaro ^b^parikkhaaro^eb^..
[21] ye dhammaa ya.m muulaa, ye cekatthaa pakaasitaa muninaa.
[22] te samaropayitabbaa, esa ^b^samaaropano^eb^ haaro..
[06] nayasa"nkhepo
[21] ta.nha~nca avijjampi ca, samathena vipassanaa yo neti.
[22] saccehi yojayitvaa, aya.m nayo ^b^nandiyaava.t.to^eb^..
[21] yo akusale samuulehi, neti kusale ca kusalamuulehi.
[22] bhuuta.m tatha.m avitatha.m, ^b^tipukkhala.m^eb^ ta.m naya.m aahu..

[21] so.lasa haaraa pa.thama.m, disalocanato {disalocanena (ka0)} disaa viloketvaa.
[22] sa"nkhipiya a"nkusena hi, nayehi tiihi niddise sutta.m..
[21] akkhara.m pada.m bya~njana.m, nirutti tatheva niddeso.
[22] aakaaracha.t.thavacana.m, ettaava bya~njana.m sabba.m..
[21] sa"nkaasanaa ^a^P0.0005^ea^ pakaasanaa, vivara.naa vibhajanuttaaniikammapa~n~natti.
[22] etehi chahi padehi, attho kamma~nca niddi.t.tha.m..
[21] tii.ni ca nayaa anuunaa, atthassa ca chappadaani ga.nitaani.
[22] navahi padehi bhagavato, vacanassattho samaayutto..
[21] atthassa navappadaani, bya~njanapariye.t.thiyaa catubbiisa.
[22] ubhaya.m sa"nkalayitvaa {sa"nkhepayato (ka0)}, tetti.msaa ettikaa nettiiti..

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo desanaahaaro? ``assaadaadiinavataa''ti gaathaa aya.m desanaahaaro. ki.m desayati? assaada.m aadiinava.m nissara.na.m phala.m upaaya.m aa.natti.m. dhamma.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasessaamiiti.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0007^ea^ ^a^M0.0006^ea^ katamo assaado?
[21] ``kaama.m {kaamamaadikaa imaa cha gaathaa su0 ni0 772 passitabbaa} kaamayamaanassa, tassa ceta.m samijjhati.
[22] addhaa piitimano hoti, laddhaa macco yadicchatii''ti..
[03] aya.m assaado.
[03] tattha katamo aadiinavo?
[21] ``tassa ^a^P0.0006^ea^ ce kaamayaanassa, chandajaatassa jantuno.
[22] te kaamaa parihaayanti, sallaviddhova ruppatii''ti..
[03] aya.m aadiinavo.
[03] tattha katama.m nissara.na.m?
[21] ``yo kaame parivajjeti, sappasseva padaa siro.
[22] soma.m visattika.m loke, sato samativattatii''ti..
[03] ida.m nissara.na.m.
[03] tattha katamo assaado?
[21] ``khetta.m vatthu.m hira~n~na.m vaa, gavaassa.m daasaporisa.m.
[22] thiyo bandhuu puthuu kaame, yo naro anugijjhatii''ti..
[03] aya.m assaado.
[03] tattha katamo aadiinavo?
[21] ``abalaa na.m baliiyanti, maddante na.m parissayaa.
[22] tato na.m dukkhamanveti, naava.m bhinnamivodaka''nti..
[03] aya.m aadiinavo.
[03] tattha katama.m nissara.na.m?
[21] ``tasmaa jantu sadaa sato, kaamaani parivajjaye.
[22] te pahaaya tare ogha.m, naava.m sitvaava paaraguu''ti..
[03] ida.m nissara.na.m.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0008^ea^ ^a^M0.0007^ea^ katama.m phala.m?
[21] ``dhammo have rakkhati dhammacaari.m, chatta.m mahanta.m yatha vassakaale.
[22] esaanisa.mso dhamme suci.n.ne, na duggati.m gacchati dhammacaarii''ti..
[03] ida.m phala.m.
[03] tattha katamo upaayo?
[21] ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa''ti...pe0...
[21] ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa {passa dha0 pa0 277} dukkhaa''ti...pe0...
[21] ``sabbe dhammaa anattaa''ti, yadaa pa~n~naaya passati.
[22] atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyaa''ti..
[03] aya.m upaayo.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0007^ea^ katamaa aa.natti?
[21] ``cakkhumaa {passa udaa0 43} visamaaniiva, vijjamaane parakkame.
[22] pa.n.dito jiivalokasmi.m, paapaani parivajjaye''ti..
[03] aya.m aa.natti.
[21] ```su~n~nato loka.m avekkhassu,
[27] mogharaajaa'ti aa.natti, `sadaa sato'ti upaayo.
[22] `attaanudi.t.thi.m uuhacca {uhacca (ka0) passa su0 ni0 1125}, eva.m maccutaro siyaa'''..

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ tattha bhagavaa uggha.tita~n~nussa puggalassa nissara.na.m desayati, vipa~ncita~n~nussa puggalassa aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca desayati, neyyassa puggalassa assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca desayati.

[03] tattha catasso pa.tipadaa, cattaaro puggalaa. ta.nhaacarito mando satindriyena dukkhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya niyyaati satipa.t.thaanehi nissayehi. ta.nhaacarito udatto {udattho (sii0) u + aa + daa + ta} samaadhindriyena dukkhaaya pa.tipadaaya khippaabhi~n~naaya ^a^V0.0009^ea^ ^a^M0.0008^ea^ niyyaati jhaanehi nissayehi. di.t.thicarito mando viiriyindriyena sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya niyyaati sammappadhaanehi nissayehi. di.t.thicarito udatto pa~n~nindriyena sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya khippaabhi~n~naaya niyyaati saccehi nissayehi.
[03] ubho ta.nhaacaritaa samathapubba"ngamaaya vipassanaa niyyanti raagaviraagaaya cetovimuttiyaa. ubho di.t.thicaritaa vipassanaapubba"ngame samathena niyyanti avijjaaviraagaaya pa~n~naavimuttiyaa.
[03] tattha ye samathapubba"ngamaahi pa.tipadaahi niyyanti, te nandiyaava.t.tena nayena haatabbaa, ye vipassanaapubba"ngamaahi pa.tipadaahi niyyanti, te siihavikkii.litena nayena haatabbaa.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ svaaya.m ^a^P0.0008^ea^ haaro kattha sambhavati, yassa satthaa vaa dhamma.m desayati a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniiyo sabrahmacaarii, so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa saddha.m pa.tilabhati. tattha yaa viima.msaa ussaahanaa tulanaa upaparikkhaa, aya.m sutamayii pa~n~naa. tathaa sutena nissayena yaa viima.msaa tulanaa upaparikkhaa manasaanupekkha.naa, aya.m cintaamayii pa~n~naa. imaahi dviihi pa~n~naahi manasikaarasampayuttassa ya.m ~naa.na.m uppajjati dassanabhuumiya.m vaa bhaavanaabhuumiya.m vaa, aya.m bhaavanaamayii pa~n~naa.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ paratoghosaa sutamayii pa~n~naa. paccattasamu.t.thitaa yoniso manasikaaraa cintaamayii pa~n~naa. ya.m parato ca ghosena paccattasamu.t.thitena ca yonisomanasikaarena ~naa.na.m uppajjati, aya.m bhaavanaamayii pa~n~naa. yassa imaa dve pa~n~naa atthi sutamayii cintaamayii ca, aya.m uggha.tita~n~nuu. yassa sutamayii pa~n~naa atthi, cintaamayii natthi, aya.m vipa~ncita~n~nuu {vipaccita~n~nuu (sii0)}. yassa neva sutamayii pa~n~naa atthi na cintaamayii, aya.m neyyo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ saaya.m dhammadesanaa ki.m desayati? cattaari saccaani dukkha.m samudaya.m nirodha.m magga.m. aadiinavo ca phala~nca dukkha.m, assaado samudayo, nissara.na.m nirodho, upaayo aa.natti ca maggo. imaani cattaari saccaani. ida.m dhammacakka.m.

[03] yathaaha ^a^M0.0009^ea^ bhagavaa -- ``ida.m dukkha''nti me, bhikkhave, baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m, sabba.m dhammacakka.m.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0010^ea^ aparimaa.naa padaa, aparimaa.naa akkharaa, aparimaa.naa bya~njanaa, aparimaa.naa aakaaraa neruttaa niddesaa. etasseva atthassa sa"nkaasanaa pakaasanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m {uttaanikamma.m (ka0)} pa~n~natti, itipida.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m.

[03] ``aya.m dukkhasamudayo''ti me, bhikkhave, baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m...pe0... ^a^P0.0009^ea^ ``aya.m dukkhanirodho''ti me, bhikkhave...pe0... ``aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti me, bhikkhave, baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m.

[03] tattha aparimaa.naa padaa, aparimaa.naa akkharaa, aparimaa.naa bya~njanaa, aparimaa.naa aakaaraa neruttaa niddesaa. etasseva atthassa sa"nkaasanaa pakaasanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m pa~n~natti itipida.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m.

[03] tattha bhagavaa akkharehi sa"nkaaseti, padehi pakaaseti, bya~njanehi vivarati, aakaarehi vibhajati, niruttiihi uttaaniikaroti {uttaani.m karoti (ka0)}, niddesehi pa~n~napeti. tattha bhagavaa akkharehi ca padehi ca uggha.teti {ugghaa.teti (sii0)}, bya~njanehi ca aakaarehi ca vipa~ncayati, niruttiihi ca niddesehi ca vitthaareti. tattha uggha.tanaa {ugghaa.tanaa (sii0)} aadi, vipa~ncanaa majjhe, vitthaara.naa pariyosaana.m. soya.m dhammavinayo uggha.tiiyanto uggha.tita~n~nuupuggala.m vineti, tena na.m aahu ``aadikalyaa.no''ti. vipa~nciiyanto vipa~ncita~n~nuupuggala.m vineti, tena na.m aahu ``majjhekalyaa.no''ti. vitthaariiyanto neyya.m puggala.m vineti, tena na.m aahu ``pariyosaanakalyaa.no''ti.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0010^ea^ chappadaani attho sa"nkaasanaa pakaasanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m pa~n~natti, imaani chappadaani attho. chappadaani bya~njana.m akkhara.m pada.m bya~njana.m aakaaro nirutti niddeso, imaani chappadaani bya~njana.m. tenaaha bhagavaa ``dhamma.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana''nti.

[03] ^b^kevala^eb^nti ^a^P0.0010^ea^ lokuttara.m, na missa.m lokiyehi dhammehi. ^b^paripu.n.na^eb^nti paripuura.m anuuna.m anatireka.m. ^b^parisuddha^eb^nti nimmala.m sabbamalaapagata.m pariyodaata.m upa.t.thita.m sabbavisesaana.m, ida.m vuccati ^a^V0.0011^ea^ tathaagatapada.mitipi tathaagatanisevita.mitipi tathaagataara~njita.mitipi, atoceta.m brahmacariya.m pa~n~naayati. tenaaha bhagavaa ``kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasessaamii''ti.
[03] kesa.m aya.m dhammadesanaa, yogiina.m. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano --
[21] ``assaadaadiinavataa, nissara.nampi ca phala.m upaayo ca.
[22] aa.nattii ca bhagavato, yogiina.m desanaahaaro''ti..
[06] niyutto desanaahaaro.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vicayo haaro? ``ya.m pucchita~nca vissajjita~ncaa''ti gaathaa, aya.m vicayo haaro.

[03] ki.m vicinati? pada.m vicinati, pa~nha.m vicinati, visajjana.m {vissajjana.m (sii0 ka0)} vicinati, pubbaapara.m vicinati, assaada.m vicinati, aadiinava.m vicinati, nissara.na.m vicinati, phala.m vicinati, upaaya.m vicinati, aa.natti.m vicinati, anugiiti.m vicinati, sabbe nava suttante vicinati. yathaa ki.m bhave, yathaa aayasmaa ajito paaraayane bhagavanta.m pa~nha.m pucchati --
[21] ``kenassu {passa su0 ni0 1038} nivuto loko, [iccaayasmaa ajito,]
[27] kenassu nappakaasati.
[22] kissaabhilepana.m bruusi, ki.m su tassa mahabbhaya''nti..

[03] imaani ^a^M0.0011^ea^ cattaari padaani pucchitaani, so eko pa~nho. kasmaa? ekavatthu pariggahaa, eva~nhi ^a^P0.0011^ea^ aaha ``kenassu nivuto loko''ti lokaadhi.t.thaana.m pucchati, ``kenassu nappakaasatii''ti lokassa appakaasana.m pucchati, ``kissaabhilepana.m bruusii''ti lokassa abhilepana.m pucchati, ``ki.msu tassa mahabbhaya''nti tasseva lokassa mahaabhaya.m pucchati. loko tividho kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyaloko.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0012^ea^ visajjanaa --
[21] ``avijjaaya nivuto loko, [ajitaati bhagavaa,]
[27] vivicchaa {vevicchaa (su0 ni0 1039)} pamaadaa nappakaasati.
[22] jappaabhilepana.m bruumi, dukkhamassa mahabbhaya''nti..
[03] imaani cattaari padaani imehi catuuhi padehi visajjitaani pa.thama.m pa.thamena, dutiya.m dutiyena, tatiya.m tatiyena, catuttha.m catutthena.

[03] ``kenassu nivuto loko''ti pa~nhe ``avijjaaya nivuto loko''ti visajjanaa. niivara.nehi nivuto loko, avijjaaniivara.naa hi sabbe sattaa. yathaaha bhagavaa ``sabbasattaana.m, bhikkhave, sabbapaa.naana.m sabbabhuutaana.m pariyaayato ekameva niivara.na.m vadaami yadida.m avijjaa, avijjaaniivara.naa hi sabbe sattaa. sabbasova, bhikkhave, avijjaaya nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa natthi sattaana.m niivara.nanti vadaamii''ti. tena ca pa.thamassa padassa visajjanaa yuttaa.

[03] pa~n~naaya anusayaa pahiiyanti, anusayesu pahiinesu pariyu.t.thaanaa pahiiyanti. kissa {tassa (sii0)}, anusayassa pahiinattaa? ta.m yathaa khandhavantassa rukkhassa anavasesamuuluddhara.ne kate pupphaphalapallava"nkurasantati samucchinnaa bhavati. eva.m ^a^M0.0014^ea^ anusayesu pahiinesu pariyu.t.thaanasantati samucchinnaa bhavati pidahitaa pa.ticchannaa. kena? pa~n~naaya. tenaaha bhagavaa ``pa~n~naayete pidhiiyare''ti.

[27] naamaruupa~nca maarisa.
[22] eta.m me pu.t.tho pabruuhi, kattheta.m uparujjhatii''ti..
[21] ``yameta.m ^a^V0.0015^ea^ pa~nha.m apucchi {ma.m pucchi (ka0), passa su0 ni0 1043}, ajita ta.m vadaami te.
[27] yattha naama~nca ruupa~nca, asesa.m uparujjhati.
[22] vi~n~naa.nassa nirodhena, ettheta.m uparujjhatii''ti..

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0015^ea^ tii.ni sa.myojanaani sakkaayadi.t.thi vicikicchaa siilabbataparaamaaso ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m adhi.t.thaaya nirujjhanti. satta sa.myojanaani kaamacchando byaapaado ruuparaago aruuparaago maano uddhacca.m avijjaavasesaa a~n~nindriya.m adhi.t.thaaya nirujjhanti. ya.m pana eva.m jaanaati ``khii.naa me jaatii''ti, ida.m khaye ~naa.na.m. ``naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti pajaanaati, ida.m anuppaade ~naa.na.m. imaani dve ~naa.naani a~n~naataavindriya.m. tattha ya~nca ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m ya~nca a~n~nindriya.m, imaani aggaphala.m arahatta.m paapu.nantassa nirujjhanti, tattha ya~nca khaye ~naa.na.m ya~nca anuppaade ~naa.na.m, imaani dve ~naa.naani ekapa~n~naa.

[03] api ca aaramma.nasa"nketena dve naamaani labbhanti, ``khii.naa me jaatii''ti pajaanantassa khaye ~naa.nanti naama.m labhati, ``naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti pajaanantassa ^a^M0.0015^ea^ anuppaade ~naa.nanti naama.m labhati. saa pajaanana.t.thena pa~n~naa, yathaadi.t.tha.m apilaapana.t.thena sati.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ tattha ye pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa, ida.m naamaruupa.m. tattha ye phassapa~ncamakaa dhammaa, ida.m naama.m. yaani pa~ncindriyaani ruupaani, ida.m ruupa.m. tadubhaya.m naamaruupa.m vi~n~naa.nasampayutta.m tassa nirodha.m bhagavanta.m pucchanto aayasmaa ajito paaraayane evamaaha --

[22] eta.m me pu.t.tho pabruuhi, kattheta.m uparujjhatii''ti..

[03] tattha sati ca pa~n~naa ca cattaari indriyaani, sati dve indriyaani satindriya~nca samaadhindriya~nca, pa~n~naa dve indriyaani pa~n~nindriya~nca viiriyindriya~nca. yaa imesu catuusu indriyesu saddahanaa okappanaa, ida.m saddhindriya.m. tattha yaa saddhaadhipateyyaa cittekaggataa, aya.m chandasamaadhi. samaahite citte kilesaana.m vikkhambhanataaya pa.tisa"nkhaanabalena vaa bhaavanaabalena vaa, ida.m pahaana.m. tattha ^a^P0.0016^ea^ ye assaasapassaasaa vitakkavicaaraa sa~n~naavedayitaa sarasa"nkappaa, ime sa"nkhaaraa. iti purimako ca chandasamaadhi, kilesavikkhambhanataaya ca pahaana.m ime ca sa"nkhaaraa, tadubhaya.m chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. tattha yaa viiriyaadhipateyyaa cittekaggataa, aya.m viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... tattha yaa cittaadhipateyyaa cittekaggataa, aya.m cittasamaadhi...pe0... tattha yaa viima.msaadhipateyyaa cittekaggataa, aya.m viima.msaasamaadhi. samaahite citte kilesaana.m vikkhambhanataaya pa.tisa"nkhaanabalena vaa bhaavanaabalena vaa, ida.m pahaana.m. tattha ye assaasapassaasaa vitakkavicaaraa sa~n~naavedayitaa sarasa"nkappaa, ime sa"nkhaaraa. iti purimako ca viima.msaasamaadhi, kilesavikkhambhanataaya ca pahaana.m ime ca sa"nkhaaraa, tadubhaya.m viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m.

[27] manasaanaavilo siyaa.

[03] bhagavato sabba.m kaayakamma.m ~naa.napubba"ngama.m ~naa.naanuparivatti, sabba.m vaciikamma.m ~naa.napubba"ngama.m ~naa.naanuparivatti, sabba.m manokamma.m ~naa.napubba"ngama.m ~naa.naanuparivatti. atiite a.mse appa.tihata~naa.nadassana.m, anaagate a.mse appa.tihata~naa.nadassana.m, paccuppanne a.mse appa.tihata~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``manasaanaavilo siyaa''ti pariyu.t.thaanavighaata.m aaha. tathaa hi sekho abhigijjhanto asamuppanna~nca kilesa.m uppaadeti, uppanna~nca kilesa.m phaati.m karoti. yo pana anaavilasa"nkappo anabhigijjhanto vaayamati, so anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. so uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. so anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. so uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ katame {katame ca (a.t.tha0)} anuppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa? kaamavitakko byaapaadavitakko vihi.msaavitakko, ime anuppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa. katame uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa? anusayaa akusalamuulaani, ime uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa. katame anuppannaa kusalaa dhammaa? yaani sotaapannassa indriyaani, ime anuppannaa kusalaa dhammaa. katame ^a^P0.0019^ea^ uppannaa kusalaa dhammaa? yaani a.t.thamakassa indriyaani, ime uppannaa kusalaa dhammaa.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``kusalo sabbadhammaana''nti loko naama tividho kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyaloko. tattha kilesalokena bhavaloko samudaagacchati, so indriyaani nibbatteti, indriyesu bhaaviyamaanesu neyyassa pari~n~naa bhavati. saa duvidhena upaparikkhitabbaa dassanapari~n~naaya ca bhaavanaapari~n~naaya ca. yadaa hi sekho ~neyya.m parijaanaati, tadaa nibbidaasahagatehi sa~n~naamanasikaarehi neyya.m pari~n~naata.m bhavati. tassa dve dhammaa kosalla.m gacchanti -- dassanakosalla~nca bhaavanaakosalla~nca.

[03] ta.m ~naa.na.m pa~ncavidhena veditabba.m: abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaana.m bhaavanaa sacchikiriyaa. tattha ^a^P0.0020^ea^ katamaa abhi~n~naa? ya.m dhammaana.m salakkha.ne ~naa.na.m dhammapa.tisambhidaa ca atthapa.tisambhidaa ca, aya.m abhi~n~naa.

[03] tattha katamaa pari~n~naa? eva.m abhijaanitvaa yaa parijaananaa ``ida.m kusala.m, ida.m akusala.m, ida.m saavajja.m, ida.m anavajja.m, ida.m ka.nha.m, ida.m sukka.m, ida.m sevitabba.m, ida.m na sevitabba.m, ime dhammaa eva.mgahitaa, ida.m phala.m nibbattenti {nibbattaapenti (ka0)}, tesa.m eva.mgahitaana.m aya.m attho''ti, aya.m pari~n~naa.

[03] eva.m parijaanitvaa tayo dhammaa avasi.t.thaa bhavanti pahaatabbaa bhaavetabbaa sacchikaatabbaa ca. tattha katame dhammaa pahaatabbaa? ye akusalaa. tattha katame dhammaa bhaavetabbaa? ye kusalaa. tattha katame dhammaa sacchikaatabbaa? ya.m asa"nkhata.m. yo eva.m jaanaati aya.m vuccati atthakusalo dhammakusalo ^a^M0.0019^ea^ kalyaa.nataakusalo phalataakusalo, aayakusalo apaayakusalo upaayakusalo mahataa kosallena samannaagatoti, tenaaha bhagavaa ``kusalo sabbadhammaana''nti.

[03] ``sato bhikkhu paribbaje''ti tena di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarattha.m abhikkante pa.tikkante aalokite vilokite sami~njite {sammi~njite (sii0)} pasaarite sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne asite piite khaayite saayite uccaarapassaavakamme gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhibhaave satena sampajaanena vihaatabba.m. imaa dve cariyaa anu~n~naataa bhagavataa ekaa visuddhaana.m, ekaa visujjhantaana.m. ke visuddhaa? arahanto. ke visujjhantaa? sekkhaa. katakiccaani hi arahato ^a^V0.0020^ea^ indriyaani. ya.m bojjha.m, ta.m catubbidha.m dukkhassa pari~n~naabhisamayena samudayassa pahaanaabhisamayena maggassa bhaavanaabhisamayena nirodhassa sacchikiriyaabhisamayena, ida.m catubbidha.m bojjha.m yo eva.m jaanaati, aya.m vuccati ^a^P0.0021^ea^ sato abhikkamati sato pa.tikkamati khayaa raagassa khayaa dosassa khayaa mohassa. tenaaha bhagavaa ``sato bhikkhu paribbaje''ti, tenaaha --
[21] ``kaamesu naabhigijjheyya, [ajitaati bhagavaa]
[27] manasaanaavilo siyaa.
[22] kusalo sabbadhammaana.m, sato bhikkhu paribbaje''ti..

[03] eva.m pucchitabba.m, eva.m visajjitabba.m. suttassa ca anugiiti atthato ca bya~njanato ca samaanetabbaa {samaanayitabbaa (sii0 ka0)}. atthaapagata.m hi bya~njana.m samphappalaapa.m bhavati. dunnikkhittassa padabya~njanassa atthopi dunnayo bhavati, tasmaa atthabya~njanuupeta.m sa"ngaayitabba.m. sutta~nca pavicinitabba.m. ki.m ida.m sutta.m aahacca vacana.m anusandhivacana.m niitattha.m neyyattha.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya.m nibbedhabhaagiya.m asekkhabhaagiya.m? kuhi.m imassa suttassa sabbaani saccaani passitabbaani, aadimajjhapariyosaaneti? eva.m sutta.m pavicetabba.m. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano -- ``ya.m pucchita~nca vissajjita~nca, suttassa yaa ca anugiitii''ti.
[06] niyutto vicayo haaro.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0020^ea^ katamo yuttihaaro? ``sabbesa.m haaraana''nti, aya.m yuttihaaro. ki.m yojayati {yojeti (sii0)}? cattaaro mahaapadesaa buddhaapadeso sa"nghaapadeso sambahulattheraapadeso {sampahula... (ka0)} ekattheraapadeso. ime cattaaro mahaapadesaa, taani padabya~njanaani sutte otaarayitabbaani, vinaye sandassayitabbaani, dhammataaya.m upanikkhipitabbaani.

[03] katamasmi.m ^a^P0.0022^ea^ sutte otaarayitabbaani? catuusu ariyasaccesu. katamasmi.m vinaye sandassayitabbaani? raagavinaye dosavinaye mohavinaye. katamissa.m {katamiya.m (sii0)} dhammataaya.m upanikkhipitabbaani? pa.ticcasamuppaade. yadi catuusu ariyasaccesu avatarati, kilesavinaye sandissati ^a^V0.0021^ea^, dhammata~nca na vilometi, eva.m aasave na janeti. catuuhi mahaapadesehi ya.m ya.m yujjati, yena yena yujjati, yathaa yathaa yujjati, ta.m ta.m gahetabba.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ pa~nha.m pucchitena kati padaani pa~nheti padaso pariyogaahitabba.m vicetabba.m? yadi sabbaani padaani eka.m attha.m abhivadanti, eko pa~nho. atha cattaari padaani eka.m attha.m abhivadanti, eko pa~nho. atha tii.ni padaani eka.m attha.m abhivadanti, eko pa~nho. atha dve padaani eka.m attha.m abhivadanti, eko pa~nho. atha eka.m pada.m eka.m attha.m abhivadati, eko pa~nho. ta.m upaparikkhamaanena a~n~naatabba.m ki.m ime dhammaa naanatthaa naanaabya~njanaa, udaahu imesa.m dhammaana.m eko attho bya~njanameva naananti. yathaa ki.m bhave? yathaa saa devataa bhagavanta.m pa~nha.m pucchati.
[21] ``kenassubbhaahato {passa sa0 ni0 1.66} loko, kenassu parivaarito.
[22] kena sallena oti.n.no, kissa dhuupaayito sadaa''ti..
[03] imaani cattaari padaani pucchitaani. te tayo pa~nhaa katha.m ~naayati? bhagavaa hi devataaya visajjeti.
[21] ``maccunaabbhaahato {maccunabbhaahato (ka0) theragaa0 448; sa.m0 ni0 1.66 passitabba.m} loko, jaraaya parivaarito.
[22] ta.nhaasallena oti.n.no, icchaadhuupaayito sadaa''ti..

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0021^ea^ jaraa ca mara.na~nca imaani dve sa"nkhatassa sa"nkhatalakkha.naani. jaraaya.m .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m, mara.na.m vayo. tattha jaraaya ca mara.nassa ca atthato naanatta.m. kena kaara.nena, gabbhagataapi ^a^P0.0023^ea^ hi miiyanti, na ca te ji.n.naa bhavanti. atthi ca devaana.m mara.na.m, na ca tesa.m sariiraani jiiranti. sakkateva jaraaya pa.tikamma.m kaatu.m, na pana sakkate mara.nassa pa.tikamma.m kaatu.m a~n~natreva iddhimantaana.m iddhivisayaa. ya.m panaaha ta.nhaasallena oti.n.noti dissanti viitaraagaa jiirantaapi miiyantaapi. yadi ca yathaa jaraamara.na.m, eva.m ta.nhaapi siyaa. eva.m sante sabbe yobbana.t.thaapi vigatata.nhaa siyu.m. yathaa ca ta.nhaa dukkhassa samudayo, eva.m jaraamara.nampi siyaa dukkhassa samudayo, na ca siyaa ta.nhaa dukkhassa samudayo, na hi jaraamara.na.m dukkhassa samudayo, ta.nhaa dukkhassa samudayo. yathaa ca ta.nhaa maggavajjhaa, eva.m jaraamara.nampi ^a^V0.0022^ea^ siyaa maggavajjha.m. imaaya yuttiyaa a~n~nama~n~nehi kaara.nehi gavesitabba.m. yadi ca sandissati yuttisamaaruu.lha.m atthato ca a~n~natta.m, bya~njanatopi gavesitabba.m.

[03] salloti vaa dhuupaayananti vaa imesa.m dhammaana.m atthato ekatta.m. na hi yujjati icchaaya ca ta.nhaaya ca atthato a~n~natta.m. ta.nhaaya adhippaaye aparipuuramaane navasu aaghaatavatthuusu kodho ca upanaaho ca uppajjati. imaaya yuttiyaa jaraaya ca mara.nassa ca ta.nhaaya ca atthato a~n~natta.m.

[03] ya.m panida.m bhagavataa dviihi naamehi abhilapita.m icchaatipi ta.nhaatipi, ida.m bhagavataa baahiraana.m vatthuuna.m aaramma.navasena dviihi naamehi abhilapita.m icchaatipi ta.nhaatipi, sabbaa hi ta.nhaa ajjhosaanalakkha.nena ekalakkha.naa. yathaa sabbo aggi u.nhattalakkha.nena ekalakkha.no, api ca upaadaanavasena a~n~nama~n~naani naamaani labhati, ka.t.thaggiitipi ti.naggiitipi sakalikaggiitipi gomayaggiitipi thusaggiitipi sa"nkaaraggiitipi, sabbo hi aggi u.nhattalakkha.nova. eva.m sabbaa ta.nhaa ajjhosaanalakkha.nena ekalakkha.naa ^a^P0.0024^ea^, api tu aaramma.naupaadaanavasena a~n~nama~n~nehi naamehi abhilapitaa icchaaitipi ta.nhaaitipi salloitipi dhuupaayanaaitipi saritaaitipi visattikaaitipi sinehoitipi kilamathoitipi lataaitipi ma~n~nanaaitipi bandhoitipi aasaaitipi pipaasaaitipi abhinandanaaitipi, iti sabbaa ta.nhaa ajjhosaanalakkha.nena ekalakkha.naa. yathaa ca vevacane vuttaa.
[21] ``aasaa ^a^M0.0022^ea^ ca pihaa abhinandanaa ca, anekadhaatuusu saraa pati.t.thitaa.
[22] a~n~naa.namuulappabhavaa pajappitaa, sabbaa mayaa byantikataa samuulakaa''ti {samuulikaa (sii0)}..

[03] ta.nhaayeta.m vevacana.m. yathaaha bhagavaa -- ruupe tissa avigataraagassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipaasassa avigatapari.laahassa. eva.m vedanaaya sa~n~naaya sa"nkhaaresu vi~n~naa.ne avigataraagassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipaasassa avigatapari.laahassa sabba.m sutta.m vitthaaretabba.m. ta.nhaayeta.m vevacana.m. eva.m yujjati.
[03] 21^b^.^eb^ sabbo dukkhuupacaaro kaamata.nhaasa"nkhaaramuulako, na pana yujjati sabbo nibbiduupacaaro kaamata.nhaaparikkhaaramuulako. imaaya yuttiyaa a~n~nama~n~nehi kaara.nehi gavesitabba.m.

[03] yathaa ^a^V0.0023^ea^ hi {yathaaha (sii0)} bhagavaa raagacaritassa puggalassa asubha.m desayati, dosacaritassa bhagavaa puggalassa metta.m desayati. mohacaritassa bhagavaa puggalassa pa.ticcasamuppaada.m desayati. yadi hi bhagavaa raagacaritassa puggalassa metta.m cetovimutti.m deseyya. sukha.m vaa pa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m sukha.m vaa pa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m vipassanaapubba"ngama.m vaa pahaana.m deseyya, na yujjati desanaa. eva.m ya.m ki~nci raagassa anulomappahaana.m dosassa anulomappahaana.m mohassa ^a^P0.0025^ea^ anulomappahaana.m. sabba.m ta.m vicayena haarena vicinitvaa yuttihaarena yojetabba.m. yaavatikaa ~naa.nassa bhuumi.

[03] mettaavihaarissa sato byaapaado citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatiiti na yujjati desanaa, byaapaado pahaana.m abbhattha.m gacchatiiti yujjati desanaa. karu.naavihaarissa sato vihesaa citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatiiti na yujjati desanaa, vihesaa pahaana.m abbhattha.m gacchatiiti yujjati desanaa. muditaa vihaarissa sato arati citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatiiti na yujjati desanaa, arati pahaana.m abbhattha.m gacchatiiti yujjati desanaa. upekkhaavihaarissa sato raago citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatiiti na yujjati desanaa, raago pahaana.m abbhattha.m gacchatiiti yujjati desanaa. animittavihaarissa sato nimittaanusaarii tena teneva vi~n~naa.na.m pavattatiiti na yujjati desanaa ^a^M0.0023^ea^, nimitta.m pahaana.m abbhattha.m gacchatiiti yujjati desanaa. asmiiti vigata.m ayamahamasmiiti na samanupassaami. atha ca pana me kismiiti kathasmiiti vicikicchaa katha.mkathaasalla.m citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatiiti na yujjati desanaa, vicikicchaa katha.mkathaasalla.m pahaana.m abbhattha.m gacchatiiti yujjati desanaa.

[03] yathaa vaa pana pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa sato kaamaraagabyaapaadaa visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. vitakkasahagataa vaa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapannassa sato vitakkavicaarasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. upekkhaasukhasahagataa vaa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. tatiya.m ^a^P0.0026^ea^ jhaana.m samaapannassa sato piitisukhasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa, upekkhaasatipaarisuddhisahagataa vaa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapannassa sato upekkhaasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa ^a^V0.0024^ea^. aakaasaana~ncaayatanasahagataa vaa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa.

[03] aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samaapannassa sato ruupasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasahagataa vaa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samaapannassa sato aakaasaana~ncaayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. aaki~nca~n~naayatanasahagataa vaa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa.

[03] aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m ^a^M0.0024^ea^ samaapannassa sato vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasahagataa vaa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samaapannassa sato sa~n~nuupacaaraa visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasahagataa vaa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa haanaaya sa.mvattantiiti na yujjati desanaa, visesaaya sa.mvattantiiti yujjati desanaa. kallataaparicita.m citta.m na ca abhiniihaara.m khamatiiti na yujjati desanaa, kallataaparicita.m citta.m atha ca abhiniihaara.m khamatiiti yujjati desanaa.

[03] eva.m sabbe navasuttantaa yathaadhamma.m yathaavinaya.m yathaasatthusaasana.m ^a^P0.0027^ea^ sabbato vicayena haarena vicinitvaa yuttihaarena yojetabbaati. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano ``sabbesa.m haaraana.m yaa bhuumi yo ca gocaro tesa''nti.
[06] niyutto yutti haaro.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo pada.t.thaano haaro? ``dhamma.m deseti jino''ti, aya.m pada.t.thaano haaro. ki.m ^a^V0.0025^ea^ deseti? sabbadhammayaathaavaasampa.tivedhalakkha.naa avijjaa, tassaa vipallaasaa pada.t.thaana.m. ajjhosaanalakkha.naa ta.nhaa, tassaa piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m pada.t.thaana.m. patthanalakkha.no lobho, tassa adinnaadaana.m pada.t.thaana.m. va.n.nasa.n.thaanabya~njanaggaha.nalakkha.naa subhasa~n~naa, tassaa indriyaa sa.mvaro pada.t.thaana.m. saasavaphassaupagamanalakkha.naa sukhasa~n~naa, tassaa assaado pada.t.thaana.m. sa"nkhatalakkha.naana.m dhammaana.m asamanupassanalakkha.naa niccasa~n~naa, tassaa vi~n~naa.na.m pada.t.thaana.m. aniccasa~n~naadukkhasa~n~naaasamanupassanalakkha.naa attasa~n~naa, tassaa naamakaayo pada.t.thaana.m. sabbadhammasampa.tivedhalakkha.naa vijjaa, tassaa sabba.m neyya.m pada.t.thaana.m. cittavikkhepapa.tisa.mhara.nalakkha.no samatho, tassa asubhaa pada.t.thaana.m. icchaavacarapa.tisa.mhara.nalakkha.no alobho, tassa adinnaadaanaa verama.nii {verama.ni (ka0)} pada.t.thaana.m. abyaapajjalakkha.no ^a^M0.0025^ea^ adoso, tassa paa.naatipaataa verama.nii pada.t.thaana.m. vatthuavippa.tipattilakkha.no {vatthuavippa.tipaadaanalakkha.no (sii0 ka0)} amoho, tassa sammaapa.tipatti pada.t.thaana.m. viniilakavipubbakagaha.nalakkha.naa asubhasa~n~naa, tassaa nibbidaa pada.t.thaana.m. saasavaphassaparijaananalakkha.naa dukkhasa~n~naa, tassaa vedanaa pada.t.thaana.m. sa"nkhatalakkha.naana.m dhammaana.m samanupassanalakkha.naa aniccasa~n~naa ^a^P0.0028^ea^, tassaa uppaadavayaa pada.t.thaana.m. sabbadhammaabhinivesalakkha.naa anattasa~n~naa, tassaa dhammasa~n~naa pada.t.thaana.m.

[03] pa~nca kaamagu.naa kaamaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m, pa~ncindriyaani ruupiini ruuparaagassa pada.t.thaana.m, cha.t.thaayatana.m bhavaraagassa pada.t.thaana.m, nibbattabhavaanupassitaa pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m pada.t.thaana.m, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nadassanassa pada.t.thaana.m. okappanalakkha.naa saddhaa adhimuttipaccupa.t.thaanaa ca, anaavilalakkha.no pasaado sampasiidanapaccupa.t.thaano ca. abhipatthiyanalakkha.naa saddhaa, tassaa aveccapasaado pada.t.thaana.m. anaavilalakkha.no pasaado, tassa saddhaa pada.t.thaana.m. aarambhalakkha.na.m viiriya.m, tassa sammappadhaana.m pada.t.thaana.m. apilaapanalakkha.naa sati, tassaa satipa.t.thaana.m pada.t.thaana.m. ekaggalakkha.no samaadhi, tassa jhaanaani pada.t.thaana.m. pajaananalakkha.naa pa~n~naa, tassaa saccaani pada.t.thaana.m.

[03] aparo nayo, assaadamanasikaaralakkha.no ayonisomanasikaaro, tassa avijjaa pada.t.thaana.m. saccasammohanalakkha.naa avijjaa, saa sa"nkhaaraana.m pada.t.thaana.m. punabbhavaviroha.nalakkha.naa sa"nkhaaraa, te {ta.m (ka0)} vi~n~naa.nassa pada.t.thaana.m. opapaccayikanibbattilakkha.na.m vi~n~naa.na.m, ta.m naamaruupassa pada.t.thaana.m. naamakaayaruupakaayasa"nghaatalakkha.na.m naamaruupa.m, ta.m cha.laayatanassa pada.t.thaana.m. indriyavavatthaanalakkha.na.m cha.laayatana.m, ta.m phassassa pada.t.thaana.m. cakkhuruupavi~n~naa.nasannipaatalakkha.no phasso, so vedanaaya pada.t.thaana.m. i.t.thaani.t.thaanubhavanalakkha.naa vedanaa, saa ta.nhaaya pada.t.thaana.m. ajjhosaanalakkha.naa ^a^V0.0026^ea^ ta.nhaa, saa upaadaanassa pada.t.thaana.m. opapaccayika.m upaadaana.m, ta.m bhavassa pada.t.thaana.m. naamakaayaruupakaayasambhavanalakkha.no bhavo, so jaatiyaa ^a^P0.0029^ea^ pada.t.thaana.m. khandhapaatubhavanalakkha.naa jaati, saa jaraaya pada.t.thaana.m. upadhiparipaakalakkha.naa jaraa, saa mara.nassa pada.t.thaana.m. jiivitindriyupacchedalakkha.na.m mara.na.m, ta.m sokassa pada.t.thaana.m. ussukkakaarako soko, so paridevassa pada.t.thaana.m ^a^M0.0026^ea^. laalappakaarako paridevo, so dukkhassa pada.t.thaana.m. kaayasa.mpii.lana.m dukkha.m, ta.m domanassassa pada.t.thaana.m. cittasa.mpii.lana.m domanassa.m, ta.m upaayaasassa pada.t.thaana.m. odahanakaarako upaayaaso, so bhavassa pada.t.thaana.m. imaani bhava"ngaani yadaa samaggaani nibbattaani bhavanti so bhavo, ta.m sa.msaarassa pada.t.thaana.m. niyyaanikalakkha.no maggo, so nirodhassa pada.t.thaana.m.

[03] tittha~n~nutaa piita~n~nutaaya pada.t.thaana.m, piita~n~nutaa patta~n~nutaaya {matta~n~nutaaya (sii0 ka0)} pada.t.thaana.m, patta~n~nutaa atta~n~nutaaya pada.t.thaana.m, atta~n~nutaa pubbekatapu~n~nataaya pada.t.thaana.m, pubbekatapu~n~nataa patiruupadesavaasassa pada.t.thaana.m, patiruupadesavaaso sappurisuupanissayassa pada.t.thaana.m, sappurisuupanissayo attasammaapa.nidhaanassa pada.t.thaana.m, attasammaapa.nidhaana.m siilaana.m pada.t.thaana.m, siilaani avippa.tisaarassa pada.t.thaana.m, avippa.tisaaro paamojjassa pada.t.thaana.m, paamojja.m piitiyaa pada.t.thaana.m, piiti passaddhiyaa pada.t.thaana.m, passaddhi sukhassa pada.t.thaana.m, sukha.m samaadhissa pada.t.thaana.m, samaadhi yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanassa pada.t.thaana.m, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m nibbidaaya pada.t.thaana.m, nibbidaa viraagassa pada.t.thaana.m, viraago vimuttiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. vimutti vimutti~naa.nadassanassa pada.t.thaana.m. eva.m yo koci upanissayo yo koci paccayo, sabbo so pada.t.thaana.m. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano ``dhamma.m deseti jino''ti.
[06] niyutto pada.t.thaano haaro.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0030^ea^ katamo lakkha.no haaro? ``vuttamhi ekadhamme''ti, aya.m lakkha.no haaro. ki.m lakkhayati? ye dhammaa ekalakkha.naa, tesa.m dhammaana.m ekasmi.m dhamme vutte avasi.t.thaa dhammaa vuttaa bhavanti. yathaa ki.m bhave? yathaaha bhagavaa --

[03] ``cakkhu.m ^a^V0.0027^ea^, bhikkhave, anava.t.thita.m ittara.m paritta.m pabha"ngu parato dukkha.m byasana.m calana.m {cala.m (sii0)} kukku.la.m sa"nkhaara.m {sasa"nkhaara.m (ka0)} vadhaka.m amittamajjhe. imasmi.m cakkhusmi.m vutte avasi.t.thaani ajjhattikaani aayatanaani vuttaani bhavanti. kena kaara.nena? sabbaani hi cha ajjhattikaani aayatanaani vadhaka.t.thena ekalakkha.naani. yathaa caaha bhagavaa --

[03] ``atiite ^a^M0.0027^ea^, raadha, ruupe anapekkho hohi, anaagata.m ruupa.m maa abhinandi {abhinanda (ka0)}, paccuppannassa ruupassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya caagaaya pa.tinissaggaaya pa.tipajja. imasmi.m ruupakkhandhe vutte avasi.t.thaa khandhaa vuttaa bhavanti. kena kaara.nena? sabbe hi pa~ncakkhandhaa yamakovaadasutte {passa sa.m0 ni0 3.84} vadhaka.t.thena ekalakkha.naa vuttaa. yathaa caaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``yesa~nca {passa dha0 pa0 293} susamaaraddhaa, nicca.m kaayagataasati.
[22] akicca.m te na sevanti, kicce saataccakaarino''..

[03] iti kaayagataaya satiyaa vuttaaya vuttaa bhavanti vedanaagataa sati cittagataa dhammagataa ca. tathaa ya.m ki~nci di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa muta.m vaati vutte vutta.m bhavati vi~n~naata.m. yathaa caaha bhagavaa --

[03] tasmaatiha ^a^P0.0031^ea^ tva.m bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ``aataapii''ti viiriyindriya.m, ^b^``sampajaano''^eb^ti pa~n~nindriya.m, ^b^``satimaa''^eb^ti satindriya.m, ^b^``vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa''^eb^nti samaadhindriya.m, eva.m kaaye kaayaanupassino viharato cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. kena kaara.nena, ekalakkha.nattaa catunna.m indriyaana.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu bhaaviyamaanesu cattaaro sammappadhaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, catuusu sammappadhaanesu bhaaviyamaanesu cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaaviyamaanesu pa~ncindriyaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, catuusu iddhipaadesu bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, pa~ncasu indriyesu bhaaviyamaanesu pa~nca balaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, pa~ncasu balesu bhaaviyamaanesu satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, sattasu bojjha"ngesu bhaaviyamaanesu ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati, sabbeva {sabbe ca (sii0 ka0)} bodha"ngamaa dhammaa bodhipakkhiyaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti ^a^V0.0028^ea^. kena kaara.nena, sabbe hi bodha"ngamaa bodhipakkhiyaa neyyaanikalakkha.nena ekalakkha.naa, te ekalakkha.nattaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti.

[03] eva.m akusalaapi dhammaa ekalakkha.nattaa pahaana.m abbhattha.m gacchanti. catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu bhaaviyamaanesu vipallaasaa pahiiyanti, aahaaraa ^a^M0.0028^ea^ cassa pari~n~na.m gacchanti, upaadaanehi anupaadaano bhavati, yogehi ca visa.myutto bhavati, ganthehi ca vippayutto bhavati, aasavehi ca anaasavo bhavati, oghehi ca nitthi.n.no bhavati, sallehi ca visallo bhavati, vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyo cassa pari~n~na.m gacchanti, agatigamanehi na agati.m gacchati, eva.m ^a^P0.0032^ea^ akusalaapi dhammaa ekalakkha.nattaa pahaana.m abbhattha.m gacchanti.

[03] yattha vaa pana ruupindriya.m desita.m, desitaa tattheva ruupadhaatu ruupakkhandho ruupa~ncaayatana.m. yattha vaa pana sukhaa vedanaa desitaa, desita.m tattha sukhindriya.m somanassindriya.m dukkhasamudayo ca ariyasacca.m. yattha vaa pana dukkhaa vedanaa desitaa, desita.m tattha dukkhindriya.m domanassindriya.m dukkha~nca ariyasacca.m. yattha vaa pana adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa desitaa, desita.m tattha upekkhindriya.m sabbo ca pa.ticcasamuppaado. kena kaara.nena, adukkhamasukhaaya hi vedanaaya avijjaa anuseti. avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. so ca saraagasadosasamohasa.mkilesapakkhena haatabbo, viitaraagaviitadosaviitamohaariyadhammehi haatabbo.

[03] eva.m ye dhammaa ekalakkha.naa kiccato ca lakkha.nato ca saama~n~nato ca cutuupapaatato ca, tesa.m dhammaana.m ekasmi.m dhamme vutte avasi.t.thaa dhammaa vuttaa bhavanti. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano ``vuttamhi ekadhamme''ti.
[06] niyutto lakkha.no haaro.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0029^ea^ katamo catubyuuho haaro? ``neruttamadhippaayo''ti aya.m. bya~njanena suttassa nerutta~nca adhippaayo ca nidaana~nca pubbaaparasandhi ca gavesitabbo ^a^M0.0029^ea^. tattha ^a^P0.0033^ea^ katama.m nerutta.m, yaa niruttipadasa.mhitaa, ya.m dhammaana.m naamaso ~naa.na.m. yadaa hi bhikkhu atthassa ca naama.m jaanaati, dhammassa ca naama.m jaanaati, tathaa tathaa na.m abhiniropeti. aya~nca vuccati atthakusalo dhammakusalo bya~njanakusalo niruttikusalo pubbaaparakusalo desanaakusalo atiitaadhivacanakusalo anaagataadhivacanakusalo paccuppannaadhivacanakusalo itthaadhivacanakusalo purisaadhivacanakusalo napu.msakaadhivacanakusalo ekaadhivacanakusalo anekaadhivacanakusalo, eva.m sabbaani kaatabbaani janapadaniruttaani sabbaa ca janapadaniruttiyo. aya.m niruttipadasa.mhitaa.
[03] 26^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo adhippaayo?
[21] ``dhammo have rakkhati dhammacaari.m, chatta.m mahanta.m yatha vassakaale {viya vassakaale jaa0 1.10.103}.
[22] esaanisa.mso dhamme suci.n.ne, na duggati.m gacchati dhammacaarii''ti..
[03] idha bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye apaayehi parimuccitukaamaa bhavissanti, te dhammacaarino bhavissantiiti aya.m ettha bhagavato adhippaayo.
[21] ``coro yathaa sandhimukhe gahiito, sakammunaa ha~n~nati {ha~n~nate (sii0)} bajjhate ca.
[22] eva.m aya.m pecca pajaa parattha, sakammunaa ha~n~nati {ha~n~nate (sii0)} bajjhate caa''ti..
[03] idha bhagavato ko adhippaayo? sa~ncetanikaana.m kataana.m kammaana.m upacitaana.m dukkhavedaniiyaana.m ani.t.tha.m asaata.m vipaaka.m paccanubhavissatiiti aya.m ettha bhagavato adhippaayo.
[21] ``sukhakaamaani {passa dha0 pa0 131-132} bhuutaani, yo da.n.dena vihi.msati.
[22] attano sukhamesaano, pecca so na labhate sukha''nti..
[03] idha ^a^V0.0030^ea^ bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye sukhena atthikaa bhavissanti, te paapakamma.m {paapaka.m kamma.m (ka0)} na karissantiiti aya.m ettha bhagavato adhippaayo.
[21] ``middhii ^a^P0.0034^ea^ ^a^M0.0030^ea^ {passa dha0 pa0 325} yadaa hoti mahagghaso ca, niddaayitaa samparivattasaayii.
[22] mahaavaraahova nivaapapu.t.tho, punappuna.m gabbhamupeti mando''ti..

[03] idha bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye jaraamara.nena a.t.tiyitukaamaa bhavissanti, te bhavissanti bhojane matta~n~nuno indriyesu guttadvaaraa pubbarattaapararatta.m jaagariyaanuyogamanuyuttaa vipassakaa kusalesu dhammesu sagaaravaa ca sabrahmacaariisu theresu navesu majjhimesuuti aya.m ettha bhagavato adhippaayo.
[21] ``appamaado amatapada.m {amata.m pada.m (ka0) passa dha0 pa0 21}, pamaado maccuno pada.m.
[22] appamattaa na miiyanti, ye pamattaa yathaa mataa''ti..
[03] idha bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye amatapariyesana.m pariyesitukaamaa bhavissanti, te appamattaa viharissantiiti aya.m ettha bhagavato adhippaayo. aya.m adhippaayo.
[03] 27^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m nidaana.m? yathaa so dhaniyo gopaalako bhagavanta.m aaha --
[21] ``nandati puttehi puttimaa, gomaa {gomiko (sii0), gopiko (ka0) su0 ni0 33; sa.m0 ni0 1.144 passitabba.m} gohi tatheva nandati.
[22] upadhii hi narassa nandanaa, na hi so nandati yo niruupadhii''ti..
[03] bhagavaa aaha --
[21] ``socati puttehi puttimaa, gopiko {gomiko (sii0)} gohi tatheva socati.
[22] upadhii hi narassa socanaa, na hi so socati yo niruupadhii''ti..

[03] iminaa ^a^M0.0031^ea^ vatthunaa iminaa nidaanena eva.m ~naayati ``idha bhagavaa baahira.m pariggaha.m upadhi aahaa''ti. yathaa ca maaro paapimaa gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa puthusila.m paatesi, bhagavaa aaha --
[21] ``sacepi ^a^V0.0031^ea^ ^a^P0.0035^ea^ kevala.m sabba.m, gijjhakuu.ta.m calessasi {caleyyaasi (ka0) passa sa.m0 ni0 1.147}.
[22] neva sammaavimuttaana.m, buddhaana.m atthi i~njita.m..
[21] nabha.m phaleyyappathavii caleyya, sabbeva paa.naa uda santaseyyu.m.
[22] sallampi ce urasi kampayeyyu.m {pakampayeyyu.m (sii0), kappayeyyu.m (ka0)}, upadhiisu taa.na.m na karonti buddhaa''ti..
[03] iminaa vatthunaa iminaa nidaanena eva.m ~naayati ``idha bhagavaa kaaya.m upadhi.m aahaa''ti. yathaa caaha --
[21] ``na ta.m da.lha.m bandhanamaahu dhiiraa, yadaayasa.m daarujapabbaja~nca {daaruja.m babbaja~nca (sii0) passa dha0 pa0 345}.
[22] saarattarattaa ma.niku.n.dalesu, puttesu daaresu ca yaa apekkhaa''ti..
[03] iminaa vatthunaa iminaa nidaanena eva.m ~naayati ``idha bhagavaa baahiresu vatthuusu ta.nha.m aahaa''ti. yathaa caaha --
[21] ``eta.m da.lha.m bandhanamaahu dhiiraa, ohaarina.m sithila.m duppamu~nca.m.
[22] etampi chetvaana paribbajanti, anapekkhino kaamasukha.m pahaayaa''ti..
[03] iminaa vatthunaa iminaa nidaanena eva.m ~naayati ``idha bhagavaa baahiravatthukaaya ta.nhaaya pahaana.m aahaa''ti. yathaa caaha --
[21] ``aatura.m asuci.m puuti.m, duggandha.m dehanissita.m.
[22] paggharanta.m divaa ratti.m, baalaana.m abhinandita''nti..
[03] iminaa vatthunaa iminaa nidaanena eva.m ~naayati ``idha bhagavaa ajjhattikavatthukaaya ta.nhaaya pahaana.m aahaa''ti. yathaa caaha --
[21] ``ucchinda ^a^P0.0036^ea^ ^a^M0.0032^ea^ {passa dha0 pa0 285} sinehamattano, kumuda.m saaradika.mva paa.ninaa.
[22] santimaggameva bruuhaya, nibbaana.m sugatena desita''nti..
[03] iminaa ^a^V0.0032^ea^ vatthunaa iminaa nidaanena eva.m ~naayati ``idha bhagavaa ajjhattikavatthukaaya ta.nhaaya pahaana.m aahaa''ti. ida.m nidaana.m.
[03] tattha katamo pubbaaparasandhi. yathaaha --
[21] ``kaamandhaa jaalasa~nchannaa, ta.nhaachadanachaaditaa.
[27] pamattabandhanaa {pamattabandhunaa udaa0 64} baddhaa {bandhaa (ka0) passa udaa0 64}, macchaava kuminaamukhe.
[22] jaraamara.namanventi, vaccho khiirapakova maatara''nti..
[03] aya.m kaamata.nhaa vuttaa. saa katamena pubbaaparena yujjati? yathaaha --
[21] ``ratto attha.m na jaanaati, ratto dhamma.m na passati.
[22] andhantama.m tadaa hoti, ya.m raago sahate nara''nti..

[03] iti andhataaya ca sa~nchannataaya ca saayeva ta.nhaa abhilapitaa. ya~ncaaha kaamandhaa jaalasa~nchannaa, ta.nhaachadanachaaditaati. ya~ncaaha ratto attha.m na jaanaati, ratto dhamma.m na passatiiti, imehi padehi pariyu.t.thaanehi saayeva ta.nhaa abhilapitaa. ya.m andhakaara.m, aya.m dukkhasamudayo, yaa ca ta.nhaa ponobhavikaa, ya~ncaaha kaamaati ime kilesakaamaa. ya~ncaaha jaalasa~nchannaati tesa.m yeva kaamaana.m payogena pariyu.t.thaana.m dasseti, tasmaa kilesavasena ca pariyu.t.thaanavasena ca ta.nhaabandhana.m vutta.m. ye edisikaa, te jaraamara.na.m anventi, aya.m ^a^P0.0037^ea^ bhagavataa yathaanikkhittagaathaabalena dassitaa jaraamara.namanventiiti.
[21] ``yassa papa~ncaa .thitii ca natthi, sandaana.m paligha~nca {pa.ligha~nca (sii0) passa udaa0 67} viitivatto.
[22] ta.m nitta.nha.m muni.m caranta.m, na vijaanaati sadevakopi loko''ti..

[03] papa~ncaa naama ta.nhaadi.t.thimaanaa, tadabhisa"nkhataa ca sa"nkhaaraa. .thiti naama anusayaa. sandaana.m naama ta.nhaaya pariyu.t.thaana.m, yaani chatti.msata.nhaaya jaaliniyaa ^a^M0.0033^ea^ vicaritaani. paligho naama moho. ye ca papa~ncaa sa"nkhaaraa yaa ca .thiti ya.m sandaana~nca ya.m paligha~nca yo eta.m sabba.m samatikkanto, aya.m vuccati nitta.nho iti.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0033^ea^ pariyu.t.thaanasa"nkhaaraa di.t.thadhammavedaniiyaa vaa upapajjavedaniiyaa vaa aparaapariyavedaniiyaa vaa, eva.m ta.nhaa tividha.m phala.m deti di.t.the vaa dhamme upapajje vaa apare vaa pariyaaye. eva.m bhagavaa aaha ``ya.m lobhapakata.m kamma.m karoti kaayena vaa vaacaaya vaa manasaa vaa, tassa vipaaka.m anubhoti di.t.the vaa dhamme upapajje vaa apare vaa pariyaaye''ti. ida.m bhagavato pubbaaparena yujjati. tattha pariyu.t.thaana.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m vaa kamma.m upapajjavedaniiya.m vaa kamma.m aparaapariyaayavedaniiya.m {aparaapariyavedaniiya.m (sii0)} vaa kamma.m, eva.m kamma.m tidhaa vipaccati di.t.the vaa dhamme upapajje vaa apare vaa pariyaaye. yathaaha --

[03] ``ya~nce baalo idha paa.naatipaatii hoti...pe0... micchaadi.t.thi hoti, tassa di.t.the vaa dhamme vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedeti upapajje vaa apare vaa pariyaaye''ti. ida.m ^a^P0.0038^ea^ bhagavato pubbaaparena yujjati. tattha pariyu.t.thaana.m pa.tisa"nkhaanabalena pahaatabba.m, sa"nkhaaraa dassanabalena, chatti.msa ta.nhaavicaritaani bhaavanaabalena pahaatabbaaniiti eva.m ta.nhaapi tidhaa pahiiyati. yaa nitta.nhaataa aya.m saupaadisesaa nibbaanadhaatu. bhedaa kaayassa aya.m anupaadisesaa nibbaanadhaatu.

[03] papa~nco naama vuccati anubandho. ya~ncaaha bhagavaa ``papa~nceti atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m aarabbhaa''ti. ya~ncaaha bhagavaa -- ``atiite, raadha, ruupe anapekkho hohi, anaagata.m ruupa.m maa abhinandi, paccuppannassa ruupassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tinissaggaaya pa.tipajjaa''ti. ida.m bhagavato pubbaaparena yujjati. yo caapi papa~nco ye ca sa"nkhaaraa yaa ca atiitaanaagatapaccuppannassa abhinandanaa, ida.m ekattha.m. api ca a~n~nama~n~nehi padehi a~n~nama~n~nehi akkharehi a~n~nama~n~nehi bya~njanehi aparimaa.naa dhammadesanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. eva.m suttena sutta.m sa.msandayitvaa pubbaaparena saddhi.m yojayitvaa sutta.m niddi.t.tha.m bhavati.
[03] so caaya.m {sa caaya.m (sii0)} pubbaaparo sandhi catubbidho atthasandhi bya~njanasandhi desanaasandhi niddesasandhiiti.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0034^ea^ atthasandhi chappadaani sa"nkaasanaa pakaasanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikammataa pa~n~nattiiti.
[03] bya~njanasandhi chappadaani akkhara.m pada.m bya~njana.m aakaaro nirutti niddesoti.

[03] desanaasandhi ^a^V0.0034^ea^ na ca pathavi.m nissaaya jhaayati jhaayii jhaayati ca. na ca aapa.m nissaaya jhaayati jhaayii jhaayati ca, na ca teja.m nissaaya jhaayati jhaayii jhaayati ca, na ^a^P0.0039^ea^ ca vaayu.m nissaaya jhaayati jhaayii jhaayati ca. na ca aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m nissaaya...pe0... na ca vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m nissaaya...pe0... na ca aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nissaaya...pe0... na ca nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m nissaaya...pe0... na ca ima.m loka.m nissaaya...pe0... na ca paraloka.m nissaaya jhaayati jhaayii jhaayati ca. yamida.m ubhayamantarena di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m vitakkita.m vicaarita.m manasaanucintita.m, tampi nissaaya na jhaayati jhaayii jhaayati ca. aya.m sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya anissitena cittena na ~naayati jhaayanto.

[03] yathaa maaro paapimaa godhikassa kulaputtassa {passa sa.m0 ni0 1.159} vi~n~naa.na.m samanvesanto na jaanaati na passati. so hi papa~ncaatiito ta.nhaapahaanena di.t.thinissayopissa natthi. yathaa ca godhikassa, eva.m vakkalissa sadevakena lokena samaarakena sabrahmakena sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya anissitacittaa na ~naayanti jhaayamaanaa. aya.m desanaasandhi.

[03] tattha katamaa niddesasandhi? nissitacittaa akusalapakkhena niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa kusalapakkhena niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa kilesena niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa vodaanena niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa sa.msaarappavattiyaa niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa sa.msaaranivattiyaa niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa ta.nhaaya ca avijjaaya ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa samathena ca vipassanaaya ca niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa ahirikena ca anottappena ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa hiriyaa ca ottappena ca niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa asatiyaa ca asampaja~n~nena ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa satiyaa ca sampaja~n~nena ca niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa ayoniyaa ^a^M0.0035^ea^ ca ayonisomanasikaarena ^a^P0.0040^ea^ ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa yoniyaa ca yonisomanasikaarena ca niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa kosajjena ca dovacassena ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa viiriyaarambhena ca sovacassena ca niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa assaddhiyena ca pamaadena ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa saddhaaya ca appamaadena ca niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa asaddhammassavanena ca asa.mvara.nena ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa saddhammassavanena ca sa.mvarena ca niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa abhijjhaaya ca byaapaadena ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa anabhijjhaaya ca abyaapaadena ca niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa ^a^V0.0035^ea^ niivara.nehi ca sa.myojaniyehi ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa raagaviraagaaya ca cetovimuttiyaa avijjaaviraagaaya ca pa~n~naavimuttiyaa niddisitabbaa. nissitacittaa ucchedadi.t.thiyaa ca sassatadi.t.thiyaa ca niddisitabbaa, anissitacittaa saupaadisesaaya ca anupaadisesaaya ca nibbaanadhaatuyaa niddisitabbaa. aya.m niddesasandhi. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano ``neruttamadhippaayo''ti.
[06] niyutto catubyuuho haaro.
[03] 29^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo aava.t.to haaro? ``ekamhi pada.t.thaane''ti aya.m.
[21] ``aarambhatha {aarabbhatha (sii0) sa.m0 ni0 1.185; theragaa0 256 passitabba.m} nikkamatha, yu~njatha buddhasaasane.
[22] dhunaatha maccuno sena.m, na.laagaara.mva ku~njaro''ti..

[03] ``aarambhatha nikkamathaa''ti viiriyassa pada.t.thaana.m. ``yu~njatha buddhasaasane''ti samaadhissa pada.t.thaana.m. ``dhunaatha maccuno sena.m, na.laagaara.mva ku~njaro''ti pa~n~naaya pada.t.thaana.m. ``aarambhatha nikkamathaa''ti viiriyindriyassa pada.t.thaana.m. ``yu~njatha buddhasaasane''ti samaadhindriyassa pada.t.thaana.m. ``dhunaatha maccuno sena.m, na.laagaara.mva ku~njaro''ti pa~n~nindriyassa pada.t.thaana.m. imaani ^a^P0.0041^ea^ pada.t.thaanaani desanaa.
[03] ayu~njantaana.m vaa sattaana.m yoge, yu~njantaana.m vaa aarambho.

[03] tattha ye na yu~njanti, te pamaadamuulakaa na yu~njanti. so pamaado duvidho ta.nhaamuulako avijjaamuulako ca. tattha avijjaamuulako yena ^a^M0.0036^ea^ a~n~naa.nena nivuto ~neyya.t.thaana.m nappajaanaati pa~ncakkhandhaa uppaadavayadhammaati, aya.m avijjaamuulako. yo ta.nhaamuulako, so tividho anuppannaana.m bhogaana.m uppaadaaya pariyesanto pamaada.m aapajjati, uppannaana.m bhogaana.m aarakkhanimitta.m paribhoganimitta~nca pamaada.m aapajjati aya.m loke catubbidho pamaado ekavidho avijjaaya tividho ta.nhaaya. tattha avijjaaya naamakaayo pada.t.thaana.m. ta.nhaaya ruupakaayo pada.t.thaana.m. ta.m kissa hetu, ruupiisu bhavesu ajjhosaana.m, aruupiisu sammoho? tattha ruupakaayo ^a^V0.0036^ea^ ruupakkhandho naamakaayo cattaaro aruupino khandhaa. ime pa~ncakkhandhaa katamena upaadaanena saupaadaanaa, ta.nhaaya ca avijjaaya ca? tattha ta.nhaa dve upaadaanaani kaamupaadaana~nca siilabbatupaadaana~nca. avijjaa dve upaadaanaani di.t.thupaadaana~nca attavaadupaadaana~nca. imehi catuuhi upaadaanehi ye saupaadaanaa khandhaa, ida.m dukkha.m. cattaari upaadaanaani, aya.m samudayo. pa~ncakkhandhaa dukkha.m. tesa.m bhagavaa pari~n~naaya pahaanaaya ca dhamma.m deseti dukkhassa pari~n~naaya samudayassa pahaanaaya.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ tattha yo tividho ta.nhaamuulako pamaado anuppannaana.m bhogaana.m uppaadaaya pariyesati, uppannaana.m bhogaana.m aarakkha.na~nca karoti paribhoganimitta~nca, tassa sampa.tivedhena rakkha.naa pa.tisa.mhara.naa, aya.m samatho.

[03] so katha.m bhavati? yadaa jaanaati kaamaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato ^a^P0.0042^ea^ nissara.na~nca nissara.nato okaara~nca sa.mkilesa~nca vodaana~nca nekkhamme ca aanisa.msa.m. tattha yaa viima.msaa upaparikkhaa aya.m vipassanaa. ime dve dhammaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti samatho ca vipassanaa ca. imesu dviisu dhammesu bhaaviyamaanesu dve dhammaa pahiiyanti ta.nhaa ca avijjaa ca, imesu dviisu dhammesu pahiinesu cattaari upaadaanaani nirujjhanti. upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. iti purimakaani ca dve saccaani dukkha.m samudayo ca, samatho ca vipassanaa ca maggo. bhavanirodho nibbaana.m imaani cattaari saccaani. tenaaha bhagavaa ``aarambhatha nikkamathaa''ti.
[21] yathaapi ^a^M0.0037^ea^ muule anupaddave da.lhe, chinnopi rukkho punareva {punadeva (ka0) passa dha0 pa0 338} ruuhati.
[22] evampi ta.nhaanusaye anuuhate, nibbattatii dukkhamida.m punappuna.m..

[03] aya.m ta.nhaanusayo. katamassaa ta.nhaaya? bhavata.nhaaya. yo etassa dhammassa paccayo aya.m avijjaa. avijjaapaccayaa hi bhavata.nhaa. ime dve kilesaa ta.nhaa ca avijjaa ca. taani cattaari upaadaanaani tehi catuuhi upaadaanehi ye saupaadaanaa khandhaa, ida.m dukkha.m. cattaari upaadaanaani aya.m samudayo. pa~ncakkhandhaa dukkha.m. tesa.m bhagavaa pari~n~naaya ca pahaanaaya ca dhamma.m deseti dukkhassa pari~n~naaya samudayassa pahaanaaya.

[03] yena ^a^V0.0037^ea^ ^a^P0.0043^ea^ ta.nhaanusaya.m samuuhanati {samuuhanti (sii0)}, aya.m samatho. yena ta.nhaanusayassa paccaya.m avijja.m vaarayati, aya.m vipassanaa. ime dve dhammaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti samatho ca vipassanaa ca. tattha samathassa phala.m raagaviraagaa cetovimutti, vipassanaaya phala.m avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti. iti purimakaani ca dve saccaani dukkha.m samudayo ca, samatho vipassanaa ca maggo, dve ca vimuttiyo nirodho. imaani cattaari saccaani. tenaaha bhagavaa ``yathaapi muule''ti.
[21] ``sabbapaapassa akara.na.m, kusalassa upasampadaa.
[22] sacittapariyodaapana.m {pariyodapana.m (sii0) dha0 pa0 183; dii0 ni0 2.90 passitabba.m}, eta.m buddhaana saasana''nti..

[03] sabbapaapa.m naama tii.ni duccaritaani kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m, te dasa akusalakammapathaa paa.naatipaato adinnaadaana.m kaamesumicchaacaaro musaavaado pisu.naa vaacaa pharusaa vaacaa samphappalaapo abhijjhaa byaapaado micchaadi.t.thi, taani dve kammaani cetanaa cetasika~nca. tattha yo ca paa.naatipaato yaa ca pisu.naa vaacaa yaa ca pharusaa vaacaa, ida.m dosasamu.t.thaana.m. ya~nca adinnaadaana.m yo ca kaamesumicchaacaaro yo ca musaavaado, ida.m lobhasamu.t.thaana.m, yo samphappalaapo, ida.m mohasamu.t.thaana.m. imaani satta kaara.naani cetanaakamma.m. yaa abhijjhaa, aya.m lobho akusalamuula.m. yo byaapaado, aya.m doso akusalamuula.m. yaa ^a^M0.0038^ea^ micchaadi.t.thi, aya.m micchaamaggo. imaani tii.ni kaara.naani cetasikakamma.m. tenaaha ``cetanaakamma.m cetasikakamma''nti.

[03] akusalamuula.m payoga.m gacchanta.m catubbidha.m agati.m gacchati chandaa dosaa bhayaa mohaa. tattha ^a^P0.0044^ea^ ya.m chandaa agati.m gacchati, ida.m lobhasamu.t.thaana.m. ya.m dosaa agati.m gacchati, ida.m dosasamu.t.thaana.m. ya.m bhayaa ca mohaa ca agati.m gacchati, ida.m mohasamu.t.thaana.m. tattha lobho asubhaaya pahiiyati. doso mettaaya. moho pa~n~naaya. tathaa lobho upekkhaaya pahiiyati. doso mettaaya ca karu.naaya ca. moho muditaaya pahaana.m abbhattha.m gacchati. tenaaha bhagavaa ``sabbapaapassa akara.na''nti.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ sabbapaapa.m naama a.t.tha micchattaani micchaadi.t.thi micchaasa"nkappo micchaavaacaa micchaakammanto micchaaaajiivo micchaavaayaamo micchaasati micchaasamaadhi, ida.m vuccati sabbapaapa.m. ^a^V0.0038^ea^ imesa.m a.t.thanna.m micchattaana.m yaa akiriyaa akara.na.m anajjhaacaaro, ida.m vuccati sabbapaapassa akara.na.m.

[03] a.t.thasu micchattesu pahiinesu a.t.tha sammattaani sampajjanti. a.t.thanna.m sammattaana.m yaa kiriyaa kara.na.m sampaadana.m, aya.m vuccati kusalassa upasampadaa. sacittapariyodaapananti atiitassa maggassa bhaavanaakiriya.m dassayati, citte pariyodaapite {pariyodapite (sii0 ka0)} pa~ncakkhandhaa pariyodaapitaa bhavanti, eva~nhi bhagavaa aaha ``cetovisuddhattha.m, bhikkhave, tathaagate brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti. duvidhaa hi pariyodaapanaa niivara.nappahaana~nca anusayasamugghaato ca. dve pariyodaapanabhuumiyo dassanabhuumi ca, bhaavanaabhuumi ca, tattha ya.m pa.tivedhena pariyodaapeti, ida.m dukkha.m. yato pariyodaapeti, aya.m samudayo. yena pariyodaapeti, aya.m maggo. ya.m pariyodaapita.m, aya.m nirodho. imaani cattaari saccaani. tenaaha bhagavaa ``sabbapaapassa akara.na''nti.
[21] ``dhammo have rakkhati dhammacaari.m, chatta.m mahanta.m yatha vassakaale.
[22] esaanisa.mso ^a^P0.0045^ea^ dhamme suci.n.ne, na duggati.m gacchati dhammacaarii''ti..

[03] dhammo ^a^M0.0039^ea^ naama duvidho indriyasa.mvaro maggo ca. duggati naama duvidhaa devamanusse vaa upanidhaaya apaayaa duggati, nibbaana.m vaa upanidhaaya sabbaa upapattiyo duggati. tattha yaa sa.mvarasiile akha.n.dakaaritaa, aya.m dhammo suci.n.no apaayehi rakkhati. eva.m bhagavaa aaha -- dvemaa, bhikkhave, siilavato gatiyo devaa ca manussaa ca. eva~nca naa.landaaya.m nigame asibandhakaputto gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``braahma.naa, bhante, pacchaabhuumakaa kaama.n.dalukaa sevaalamaalikaa udakorohakaa aggiparicaarakaa, te mata.m kaala"nkata.m uyyaapenti naama, sa~n~naapenti naama, sagga.m naama okkaamenti {uggamenti (sii0) passa sa.m0 ni0 4.358}. bhagavaa pana, bhante, araha.m sammaasambuddho pahoti tathaa kaatu.m, yathaa sabbo loko kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyaa''ti.
[03] ``tena hi, gaama.ni, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami, yathaa te khameyya, tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasiiti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, idhassa puriso paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii ^a^V0.0039^ea^ musaavaadii pisu.navaaco pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thiko, tamena.m mahaajanakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya `aya.m puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjatuu'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, api nu so puriso mahato janakaayassa aayaacanahetu vaa thomanahetuvaa pa~njalika.m {pa~njalikaa sa.m0 ni0 4.358} anuparisakkanahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyaa''ti. ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, puriso mahati.m puthusila.m gambhiire udakarahade {udakadahe (ka0)} pakkhipeyya, tamena.m mahaajanakaayo sa"ngamma ^a^P0.0046^ea^ samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya `ummujja, bho, puthusile, uplava bho puthusile, thalamuplava, bho puthusile'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi gaama.ni, api nu saa mahatii puthusilaa mahato janakaayassa aayaacanahetu vaa thomanahetu vaa pa~njalika.m anuparisakkanahetu vaa ummujjeyya vaa uplaveyya vaa thala.m vaa uplaveyyaa''ti. ``no heta.m ^a^M0.0040^ea^, bhante''. ``evameva kho, gaama.ni, yo so puriso paa.naatipaatii...pe0... micchaadi.t.thiko, ki~ncaapi na.m mahaajanakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya `aya.m puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjatuu'ti. atha kho so puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, idhassa puriso paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato musaavaadaa pa.tivirato pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato anabhijjhaalu abyaapannacitto sammaadi.t.thiko, tamena.m mahaajanakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya `aya.m puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatuu'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, api nu so puriso mahato janakaayassa aayaacanahetu vaa thomanahetu vaa pa~njalika.m anuparisakkanahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyyaa''ti. ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, puriso sappikumbha.m vaa telakumbha.m vaa gambhiire {gambhiira.m (sii0 ka0) passa sa.m0 ni0 4.358} udakarahade ogaahetvaa bhindeyya. tatra yaassa sakkharaa vaa ka.thalaa {kathalaa (ka0)}, saa adhogaamii assa. ya~nca khvassa tatra sappi vaa tela.m vaa, ta.m uddha.mgaami assa. tamena.m mahaajanakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma ^a^V0.0040^ea^ aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya `osiida, bho sappitela, sa.msiida, bho sappitela, adho gaccha {ava.mgaccha (sii0 ka0)}`bho sappitelaa'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi gaama.ni, api nu ta.m ^a^P0.0047^ea^ sappitela.m mahato janakaayassa aayaacanahetu vaa thomanahetu vaa pa~njalika.m anuparisakkanahetu vaa `osiideyya vaa sa.msiideyya vaa adho vaa gaccheyyaa'ti. ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``evameva kho, gaama.ni, yo so puriso paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato...pe0... sammaadi.t.thiko, ki~ncaapi na.m mahaajanakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya `aya.m puriso kaayassa ^a^M0.0041^ea^ bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatuu'''ti. atha kho so puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyya. iti dhammo suci.n.no apaayehi rakkhati. tattha yaa maggassa tikkhataa adhimattataa, aya.m dhammo suci.n.no sabbaahi upapattiihi rakkhati. eva.m bhagavaa aaha --
[21] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa {passa udaa0 32}, sammaasa"nkappagocaro.
[27] sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro, ~natvaana udayabbaya.m.
[22] thinamiddhaabhibhuu bhikkhu, sabbaa duggatiyo jahe''ti..

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ tattha duggatiina.m hetu ta.nhaa ca avijjaa ca, taani cattaari upaadaanaani, tehi catuuhi upaadaanehi ye saupaadaanaa khandhaa, ida.m dukkha.m. cattaari upaadaanaani, aya.m samudayo. pa~ncakkhandhaa dukkha.m, tesa.m bhagavaa pari~n~naaya ca pahaanaaya ca dhamma.m deseti dukkhassa pari~n~naaya samudayassa pahaanaaya. tattha ta.nhaaya pa~ncindriyaani ruupiini pada.t.thaana.m. avijjaaya manindriya.m pada.t.thaana.m. pa~ncindriyaani ruupiini rakkhanto samaadhi.m bhaavayati, ta.nha~nca nigga.nhaati. manindriya.m rakkhanto vipassana.m bhaavayati, avijja~nca nigga.nhaati. ta.nhaaniggahena dve upaadaanaani pahiiyanti kaamupaadaana~nca siilabbatupaadaana~nca. avijjaaniggahena dve upaadaanaani pahiiyanti di.t.thupaadaana~nca attavaadupaadaana~nca. catuusu ^a^P0.0048^ea^ upaadaanesu pahiinesu dve dhammaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti samatho ca vipassanaa ca. ida.m vuccati brahmacariyanti.

[03] tattha brahmacariyassa phala.m cattaari saama~n~naphalaani sotaapattiphala.m sakadaagaamiphala.m anaagaamiphala.m arahatta.m {arahattaphala.m (ka0)} aggaphala.m. imaani cattaari brahmacariyassa phalaani {brahmacariyaphalaaniiti (sii0)}. iti purimakaani ca dve saccaani dukkha.m samudayo ca. samatho ca vipassanaa ca brahmacariya~nca maggo, brahmacariyassa ^a^V0.0041^ea^ phalaani ca tadaaramma.naa ca asa"nkhataadhaatu nirodho. imaani cattaari saccaani. tenaaha bhagavaa ``dhammo have rakkhatii''ti.

[03] tattha ya.m pa.tivedhena rakkhati, ida.m dukkha.m. yato rakkhati, aya.m samudayo. yena rakkhati, aya.m maggo. ya.m rakkhati, aya.m nirodho. imaani cattaari saccaani. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano ``ekamhi pada.t.thaane''ti.
[06] niyutto aava.t.to haaro.
[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0042^ea^ katamo vibhattihaaro? ``dhamma~nca pada.t.thaana.m bhuumi~ncaa''ti.

[03] dve suttaani vaasanaabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca. dve pa.tipadaa pu~n~nabhaagiyaa ca phalabhaagiyaa ca. dve siilaani sa.mvarasiila~nca pahaanasiila~nca, tattha bhagavaa vaasanaabhaagiya.m sutta.m pu~n~nabhaagiyaaya pa.tipadaaya desayati, so sa.mvarasiile .thito tena brahmacariyena brahmacaarii bhavati, tattha ^a^P0.0049^ea^ bhagavaa nibbedhabhaagiya.m sutta.m phalabhaagiyaaya pa.tipadaaya desayati, so pahaanasiile .thito tena brahmacariyena brahmacaarii bhavati.
[03] tattha katama.m vaasanaabhaagiya.m sutta.m? vaasanaabhaagiya.m naama sutta.m daanakathaa siilakathaa saggakathaa kaamaana.m aadiinavo nekkhamme aanisa.msoti.

[03] tattha katama.m nibbedhabhaagiya.m sutta.m? nibbedhabhaagiya.m naama sutta.m yaa catusaccappakaasanaa, vaasanaabhaagiye sutte natthi pajaananaa, natthi maggo, natthi phala.m. nibbedhabhaagiye sutte atthi pajaananaa, atthi maggo, atthi phala.m. imaani cattaari suttaani. imesa.m catunna.m suttaana.m desanaaya phalena siilena brahmacariyena sabbato vicayena haarena vicinitvaa yuttihaarena yojayitabbaa yaavatikaa ~naa.nassa bhuumi.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ tattha katame dhammaa saadhaara.naa? dve dhammaa saadhaara.naa naamasaadhaara.naa vatthusaadhaara.naa ca. ya.m vaa pana ki~nci a~n~nampi eva.m jaatiya.m, micchattaniyataana.m sattaana.m aniyataana~nca sattaana.m ^a^V0.0042^ea^ dassanappahaatabbaa kilesaa saadhaara.naa, puthujjanassa sotaapannassa ca kaamaraagabyaapaadaa saadhaara.naa, puthujjanassa anaagaamissa ca uddha.mbhaagiyaa sa.myojanaa saadhaara.naa, ya.m ki~nci ariyasaavako lokiya.m samaapatti.m samaapajjati, sabbaa saa aviitaraagehi {avigataraagehi (ka0)} saadhaara.naa, saadhaara.naa hi dhammaa eva.m a~n~nama~n~na.m para.m para.m saka.m saka.m visaya.m naativattanti. yopi imehi dhammehi samannaagato na so ta.m dhamma.m upaativattati. ime dhammaa saadhaara.naa.

[03] tattha katame dhammaa asaadhaara.naa? yaava desana.m upaadaaya gavesitabbaa sekkhaasekkhaa bhabbaabhabbaati, a.t.thamakassa sotaapannassa ca kaamaraagabyaapaadaa saadhaara.naa ^a^P0.0050^ea^ dhammataa asaadhaara.naa, a.t.thamakassa anaagaamissa ca uddhambhaagiyaa ^a^M0.0043^ea^ sa.myojanaa saadhaara.naa dhammataa asaadhaara.naa. sabbesa.m sekkhaana.m naama.m saadhaara.na.m dhammataa asaadhaara.naa. sabbesa.m pa.tipannakaana.m naama.m saadhaara.na.m dhammataa asaadhaara.naa. sabbesa.m sekkhaana.m sekkhasiila.m saadhaara.na.m dhammataa asaadhaara.naa. eva.m visesaanupassinaa hiinukka.t.thamajjhima.m upaadaaya gavesitabba.m.

[03] dassanabhuumi niyaamaavakkantiyaa pada.t.thaana.m, bhaavanaabhuumi uttarikaana.m phalaana.m pattiyaa pada.t.thaana.m, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa samathassa pada.t.thaana.m, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa vipassanaaya pada.t.thaana.m, daanamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu parato ghosassa saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, siilamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu cintaamayiyaa pa~n~naaya saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, bhaavanaamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu bhaavanaamayiyaa pa~n~naaya saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m. daanamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu parato ca ghosassa sutamayiyaa ca pa~n~naaya saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m siilamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu cintaamayiyaa ca pa~n~naaya yoniso ca manasikaarassa saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, bhaavanaamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu bhaavanaamayiyaa ca pa~n~naaya sammaadi.t.thiyaa ca saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m. patiruupadesavaaso vivekassa ca samaadhissa ca saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, sappurisuupanissayo ti.n.na~nca aveccappasaadaana.m samathassa ca saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, attasammaapa.nidhaana.m hiriyaa ca vipassanaaya ca saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, akusalapariccaago kusalaviima.msaaya ca samaadhindriyassa ca saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, dhammasvaakkhaatataa kusalamuularopanaaya ca phalasamaapattiyaa ca saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, sa"nghasuppa.tipannataa sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, satthusampadaa appasannaana~nca pasaadaaya pasannaana~nca bhiyyobhaavaaya saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m, appa.tihatapaatimokkhataa dumma"nkuuna~nca ^a^P0.0051^ea^ puggalaana.m niggahaaya pesalaana~nca puggalaana.m phaasuvihaaraaya saadhaara.na.m pada.t.thaana.m. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano ``dhamma~nca pada.t.thaana''nti.
[06] niyutto vibhatti haaro.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0043^ea^ ^a^M0.0044^ea^ katamo parivattano haaro? ``kusalaakusale dhamme''ti. sammaadi.t.thissa purisapuggalassa micchaadi.t.thi nijji.n.naa bhavati. ye cassa micchaadi.t.thipaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aneke {anekaa (ka0)} paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa, te cassa nijji.n.naa honti. sammaadi.t.thipaccayaa cassa aneke kusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti, te cassa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. sammaasa"nkappassa purisapuggalassa micchaasa"nkappo nijji.n.no bhavati. ye cassa micchaasa"nkappapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa, te cassa nijji.n.naa honti. sammaasa"nkappapaccayaa cassa aneke kusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti. te cassa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. eva.m sammaavaacassa sammaakammantassa sammaaaajiivassa sammaavaayaamassa sammaasatissa sammaasamaadhissa sammaavimuttassa sammaavimutti~naa.nadassanassa purisapuggalassa micchaavimutti~naa.nadassana.m nijji.n.na.m bhavati. ye cassa micchaavimutti~naa.nadassanapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa, te cassa nijji.n.naa honti. sammaavimutti~naa.nadassanapaccayaa cassa aneke kusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti, te cassa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ yassa vaa paa.naatipaataa pa.tiviratassa paa.naatipaato pahiino hoti. adinnaadaanaa pa.tiviratassa adinnaadaana.m pahiina.m hoti. brahmacaarissa abrahmacariya.m pahiina.m hoti. saccavaadissa musaavaado pahiino hoti. apisu.navaacassa pisu.naa vaacaa pahiinaa hoti. sa.nhavaacassa pharusaa vaacaa pahiinaa hoti. kaalavaadissa samphappalaapo pahiino hoti. anabhijjhaalussa {anabhijjhaamanassa (ka0)} abhijjhaa pahiinaa ^a^P0.0052^ea^ hoti. abyaapannacittassa byaapaado pahiino hoti. sammaadi.t.thissa micchaadi.t.thi pahiinaa hoti.

[03] ye ca kho keci ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m garahanti, nesa.m sandi.t.thikaa sahadhammikaa gaarayhaa vaadaanuvaadaa aagacchanti. sammaadi.t.thi~nca te bhavanto dhamma.m garahanti. tena hi ye micchaadi.t.thikaa, tesa.m bhavantaana.m pujjaa ca paasa.msaa ca. eva.m sammaasa"nkappa.m sammaavaaca.m sammaakammanta.m sammaaaajiiva.m sammaavaayaama.m sammaasati.m sammaasamaadhi.m sammaavimutti.m sammaavimutti~naa.nadassana~nca te bhavanto dhamma.m garahanti. tena hi ye micchaavimutti~naa.nadassanaa, tesa.m bhavantaana.m pujjaa ca paasa.msaa ca.

[03] ye ^a^V0.0044^ea^ ^a^M0.0045^ea^ ca kho keci evamaaha.msu ``bhu~njitabbaa kaamaa, paribhu~njitabbaa kaamaa, aasevitabbaa kaamaa, nisevitabbaa kaamaa, bhaavayitabbaa kaamaa, bahuliikaatabbaa kaamaa''ti. kaamehi verama.nii tesa.m adhammo.

[03] ye vaa pana keci evamaaha.msu ``attakilamathaanuyogo dhammo''ti. niyyaaniko tesa.m dhammo adhammo. ye ca kho keci evamaaha.msu ``dukkho dhammo''ti. sukho tesa.m dhammo adhammo. yathaa vaa pana bhikkhuno sabbasa"nkhaaresu asubhaanupassino viharato subhasa~n~naa pahiiyanti. dukkhaanupassino viharato sukhasa~n~naa pahiiyanti. aniccaanupassino viharato niccasa~n~naa pahiiyanti. anattaanupassino viharato attasa~n~naa pahiiyanti. ya.m ya.m vaa pana dhamma.m rocayati vaa upagacchati vaa, tassa tassa dhammassa yo pa.tipakkho, svassa ani.t.thato ajjhaapanno bhavati. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano ``kusalaakusaladhamme''ti.
[06] niyutto parivattano haaro.
[03] 37^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0053^ea^ katamo vevacano haaro? ``vevacanaani bahuunii''ti. yathaa eka.m bhagavaa dhamma.m a~n~nama~n~nehi vevacanehi niddisati. yathaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``aasaa ca pihaa abhinandanaa ca, anekadhaatuusu saraa pati.t.thitaa.
[22] a~n~naa.namuulappabhavaa pajappitaa, sabbaa mayaa byantikataa samuulikaa''ti..

[03] ^b^aasaa^eb^ naama vuccati yaa bhavissassa atthassa aasiisanaa {aasi.msanaa (sii0)} avassa.m aagamissatiiti aasaassa uppajjati. pihaa naama yaa vattamaanassa {vattamaanakassa (sii0)} atthassa patthanaa, seyyatara.m vaa disvaa ``ediso bhaveyya''nti pihaassa uppajjati. atthanipphattipa.tipaalanaa abhinandanaa naama, piya.m vaa ~naati.m abhinandati, piya.m vaa dhamma.m abhinandati, appa.tikuulato vaa abhinandati.

[03] ^b^anekadhaatuu^eb^ti ^a^M0.0046^ea^ cakkhudhaatu ruupadhaatu cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu, sotadhaatu saddadhaatu sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, ghaanadhaatu gandhadhaatu ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, jivhaadhaatu rasadhaatu jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^V0.0045^ea^, kaayadhaatu pho.t.thabbadhaatu kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, manodhaatu dhammadhaatu manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu.

[03] ^b^saraa^eb^ti keci ruupaadhimuttaa keci saddaadhimuttaa keci gandhaadhimuttaa keci rasaadhimuttaa keci pho.t.thabbaadhimuttaa keci dhammaadhimuttaa. tattha yaani cha gehasitaani domanassaani yaani ca cha gehasitaani somanassaani yaani ca cha nekkhammasitaani domanassaani yaani ca cha nekkhammasitaani somanassaani, imaani catuviisapadaani ta.nhaapakkho, ta.nhaaya eta.m vevacana.m. yaa cha upekkhaa gehasitaa, aya.m di.t.thipakkho.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ saayeva patthanaakaarena dhammanandii dhammapema.m dhammajjhosaananti ta.nhaaya eta.m vevacana.m. citta.m mano vi~n~naa.nanti ^a^P0.0054^ea^ cittassa eta.m vevacana.m. manindriya.m manodhaatu manaayatana.m vijaananaati manasseta.m vevacana.m. pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m adhipa~n~naa sikkhaa pa~n~naa pa~n~naakkhandho dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo ~naa.na.m sammaadi.t.thi tiira.naa vipassanaa dhamme ~naa.na.m atthe ~naa.na.m anvaye ~naa.na.m khaye ~naa.na.m anuppaade ~naa.na.m ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m a~n~nindriya.m a~n~naataavindriya.m cakkhu vijjaa buddhi bhuuri medhaa aaloko, ya.m vaa pana ya.m ki~nci a~n~na.mpi eva.m jaatiya.m, pa~n~naaya eta.m vevacana.m. pa~ncindriyaani lokuttaraani, sabbaa pa~n~naa. api ca aadhipateyya.t.thena saddhaa, aarambha.t.thena viiriya.m, apilaapana.t.thena sati, avikkhepa.t.thena samaadhi, pajaanana.t.thena pa~n~naa.

[03] yathaa ca buddhaanussatiya.m vutta.m itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. balanipphattigato vesaarajjappatto adhigatappa.tisambhido catuyogavippahiino agatigamanaviitivatto uddha.tasallo niruu.lhava.no madditaka.n.dako nibbaapitapariyu.t.thaano {nibbaahita ... (ka0)} bandhanaatiito ganthavinive.thano ajjhaasayaviitivatto bhinnandhakaaro cakkhumaa lokadhammasamatikkanto anurodhavirodhavippayutto i.t.thaani.t.thesu dhammesu asa"nkhepagato bandhanaativatto .thapitasa"ngaamo abhikkantataro ukkaadharo aalokakaro pajjotakaro tamonudo ra.na~njaho aparimaa.nava.n.no appameyyava.n.no asa"nkheyyava.n.no aabha.mkaro pabha.mkaro dhammobhaasapajjotakaroti ^a^M0.0047^ea^ ca buddhaa bhagavantoti ca buddhaanussatiyaa eta.m vevacana.m.
