[03] yo dhammo ya.m dhamma.m janayati, tassa so parikkhaaro. ki.mlakkha.no parikkhaaro? janakalakkha.no parikkhaaro. dve dhammaa janayanti hetu ca paccayo ca. tattha ki.mlakkha.no hetu, ki.mlakkha.no paccayo? asaadhaara.nalakkha.no hetu, saadhaara.nalakkha.no paccayo. yathaa ki.m bhave? yathaa a"nkurassa nibbattiyaa biija.m asaadhaara.na.m, pathavii aapo ^a^P0.0079^ea^ ca saadhaara.naa. a"nkurassa hi pathavii aapo ca paccayo sabhaavo hetu. yathaa vaa pana gha.te duddha.m pakkhitta.m dadhi bhavati, na ^a^V0.0066^ea^ catthi ekakaalasamavadhaana.m duddhassa ca dadhissa ca. evameva.m natthi ekakaalasamavadhaana.m hetussa ca paccayassa ca.

[03] aya~nhi sa.msaaro sahetu sappaccayo nibbatto. vutta.m hi avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, eva.m sabbo pa.ticcasamuppaado. iti avijjaa avijjaaya hetu ayoniso manasikaaro paccayo. purimikaa avijjaa pacchimikaaya avijjaaya hetu. tattha purimikaa avijjaa avijjaanusayo ^a^M0.0067^ea^ pacchimikaa avijjaa avijjaapariyu.t.thaana.m, purimiko avijjaanusayo pacchimikassa avijjaapariyu.t.thaanassa hetubhuuto paribruuhanaaya, biija"nkuro viya samanantarahetutaaya. ya.m pana yattha phala.m nibbattati, idamassa paramparahetutaaya hetubhuuta.m. duvidho hi hetu samanantarahetu paramparahetu ca, eva.m avijjaayapi duvidho hetu samanantarahetu paramparahetu ca.

[03] yathaa vaa pana thaalaka~nca va.t.ti ca tela~nca padiipassa paccayabhuuta.m na sabhaavahetu, na hi sakkaa thaalaka~nca va.t.ti~nca tela~nca anaggika.m diipetu.m padiipassa paccayabhuuta.m. padiipo viya sabhaavo hetu hoti. iti sabhaavo hetu, parabhaavo paccayo. ajjhattiko hetu, baahiro paccayo. janako hetu, pariggaahako paccayo. asaadhaara.no hetu, saadhaara.no paccayo.

[03] avupacchedattho santati attho, nibbatti attho phalattho, pa.tisandhi attho punabbhavattho, palibodhattho pariyu.t.thaanattho, asamugghaatattho anusayattho, asampa.tivedhattho avijjattho, apari~n~naatattho vi~n~naa.nassa biijattho. yattha avupacchedo tattha santati, yattha santati tattha nibbatti ^a^P0.0080^ea^, yattha nibbatti tattha phala.m, yattha phala.m tattha pa.tisandhi, yattha pa.tisandhi tattha punabbhavo, yattha punabbhavo tattha palibodho, yattha palibodho tattha pariyu.t.thaana.m, yattha pariyu.t.thaana.m tattha asamugghaato. yattha asamugghaato tattha anusayo, yattha anusayo tattha asampa.tivedho, yattha asampa.tivedho tattha avijjaa, yattha avijjaa tattha saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m apari~n~naata.m, yattha saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m apari~n~naata.m tattha biijattho.

[03] siilakkhandho samaadhikkhandhassa paccayo, samaadhikkhandho pa~n~naakkhandhassa paccayo, pa~n~naakkhandho vimuttikkhandhassa paccayo, vimuttikkhandho vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhassa paccayo. tittha~n~nutaa piita~n~nutaaya paccayo, piita~n~nutaa patta~n~nutaaya paccayo, patta~n~nutaa atta~n~nutaaya paccayo.

[03] yathaa ^a^V0.0067^ea^ vaa pana cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m. tattha cakkhu aadhipateyyapaccayataaya paccayo, ruupaa aaramma.napaccayataaya paccayo. aaloko sannissayataaya paccayo, manasikaaro sabhaavo hetu ^a^M0.0068^ea^. sa"nkhaaraa vi~n~naa.nassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. vi~n~naa.na.m naamaruupassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. naamaruupa.m sa.laayatanassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. sa.laayatana.m phassassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. phasso vedanaaya paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. vedanaa ta.nhaaya paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. ta.nhaa upaadaanassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. upaadaana.m bhavassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. bhavo jaatiyaa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. jaati jaraamara.nassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. jaraamara.na.m sokassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. soko paridevassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. paridevo dukkhassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. dukkha.m domanassassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. domanassa.m upaayaasassa paccayo, sabhaavo hetu. eva.m yo koci upanissayo sabbo so parikkhaaro. tenaaha aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano ``ye dhammaa ya.m dhamma.m janayantii''ti.
[06] niyutto parikkhaaro haaro.
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0081^ea^ katamo samaaropano haaro? ``ye dhammaa ya.mmuulaa, ye cekatthaa pakaasitaa muninaa''ti.

[03] ekasmi.m pada.t.thaane yattakaani pada.t.thaanaani otaranti, sabbaani taani samaaropayitabbaani. yathaa aava.t.te haare bahukaani pada.t.thaanaani otarantiiti. tattha samaaropanaa catubbidhaa pada.t.thaana.m, vevacana.m, bhaavanaa, pahaanamiti.
[03] tattha katamaa pada.t.thaanena samaaropanaa?
[21] ``sabbapaapassa akara.na.m, kusalassa upasampadaa.
[22] sacittapariyodapana.m, eta.m buddhaana saasana''nti..

[03] tassa ki.m pada.t.thaana.m? tii.ni sucaritaani -- kaayasucarita.m vaciisucarita.m manosucarita.m -- ida.m pada.t.thaana.m; tattha ya.m kaayika~nca vaacasika~nca sucarita.m, aya.m siilakkhandho. manosucarite yaa ^a^V0.0068^ea^ anabhijjhaa abyaapaado ca, aya.m samaadhikkhandho. yaa sammaadi.t.thi, aya.m pa~n~naakkhandho. ida.m pada.t.thaana.m, tattha siilakkhandho ^a^M0.0069^ea^ ca samaadhikkhandho ca samatho, pa~n~naakkhandho vipassanaa. ida.m pada.t.thaana.m, tattha samathassa phala.m raagaviraagaa cetovimutti, vipassanaa phala.m avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti. ida.m pada.t.thaana.m.

[03] vana.m vanathassa pada.t.thaana.m. ki~nca vana.m? ko ca vanatho? vana.m naama pa~nca kaamagu.naa, ta.nhaa vanatho. ida.m pada.t.thaana.m. vana.m ^a^P0.0082^ea^ naama nimittaggaaho ``itthii''ti vaa ``puriso''ti vaa. vanatho naama tesa.m tesa.m a"ngapacca"ngaana.m anubya~njanaggaaho ``aho cakkhu, aho sota.m, aho ghaana.m, aho jivhaa, aho kaayo, iti. ida.m pada.t.thaana.m. vana.m naama cha ajjhattikabaahiraani aayatanaani apari~n~naataani. ya.m tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati sa.myojana.m, aya.m vanatho. ida.m pada.t.thaana.m. vana.m naama anusayo. vanatho naama pariyu.t.thaana.m. ida.m pada.t.thaana.m. tenaaha bhagavaa ``chetvaa vana~nca vanatha~ncaa''ti. aya.m pada.t.thaanena samaaropanaa.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa vevacanena samaaropanaa? raagaviraagaa cetovimutti sekkhaphala.m; avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti asekkhaphala.m. ida.m vevacana.m. raagaviraagaa cetovimutti anaagaamiphala.m; avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti aggaphala.m arahatta.m. ida.m vevacana.m. raagaviraagaa cetovimutti kaamadhaatusamatikkamana.m; avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti tedhaatusamatikkamana.m. ida.m vevacana.m. pa~n~nindriya.m, pa~n~naabala.m, adhipa~n~naasikkhaa, pa~n~naakkhandho, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo, ~naa.na.m, sammaadi.t.thi, tiira.naa, santiira.naa, hirii, vipassanaa, dhamme ~naa.na.m, sabba.m, ida.m vevacana.m. aya.m vevacanena samaaropanaa.

[03] tattha katamaa bhaavanaaya samaaropanaa? yathaaha bhagavaa ``tasmaatiha tva.m bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi, aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m''. aataapiiti ^a^P0.0083^ea^ viiriyindriya.m. sampajaanoti pa~n~nindriya.m. satimaati satindriya.m. vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassanti samaadhindriya.m. eva.m kaaye kaayaanupassino viharato cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. kena kaara.nena? ekalakkha.nattaa catunna.m indriyaana.m. catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu bhaaviyamaanesu cattaaro sammappadhaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. catuusu sammappadhaanesu bhaaviyamaanesu cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. catuusu iddhipaadesu bhaaviyamaanesu pa~ncindriyaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. eva.m sabbe ^a^M0.0070^ea^. kena kaara.nena? sabbe hi ^a^V0.0069^ea^ bodha"ngamaa dhammaa bodhipakkhiyaa niyyaanikalakkha.nena ekalakkha.naa, te ekalakkha.nattaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. aya.m bhaavanaaya samaaropanaa.

[03] tattha katamaa pahaanena samaaropanaa? kaaye kaayaanupassii viharanto ``asubhe subha''nti vipallaasa.m pajahati, kaba.liikaaro cassa aahaaro pari~n~na.m gacchati, kaamupaadaanena ca anupaadaano bhavati, kaamayogena ca visa.myutto bhavati, abhijjhaakaayaganthena ca vippayujjati, kaamaasavena ca anaasavo bhavati, kaamogha~nca utti.n.no bhavati, raagasallena ca visallo bhavati, ruupuupikaa {ruupupikaa (ka0) evamuparipi} cassa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti pari~n~na.m gacchati, ruupadhaatuya.m cassa raago pahiino bhavati, na ca chandaagati.m gacchati.

[03] vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharanto ``dukkhe sukha''nti vipallaasa.m pajahati, phasso cassa aahaaro pari~n~na.m gacchati, bhavuupaadaanena ca anupaadaano bhavati, bhavayogena ca visa.myutto bhavati, byaapaadakaayaganthena ca vippayujjati, bhavaasavena ca anaasavo bhavati, bhavogha~nca ^a^P0.0084^ea^ utti.n.no bhavati, dosasallena ca visallo bhavati, vedanuupikaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti pari~n~na.m gacchati, vedanaadhaatuya.m cassa raago pahiino bhavati, na ca dosaagati.m gacchati.

[03] citte cittaanupassii viharanto ``anicce nicca''nti vipallaasa.m pajahati, vi~n~naa.na.m cassa aahaaro pari~n~na.m gacchati, di.t.thupaadaanena ca anupaadaano bhavati, di.t.thiyogena ca visa.myutto bhavati, siilabbataparaamaasakaayaganthena ca vippayujjati, di.t.thaasavena ca anaasavo bhavati, di.t.thogha~nca utti.n.no bhavati, maanasallena ca visallo bhavati, sa~n~nuupikaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti pari~n~na.m gacchati, sa~n~naadhaatuya.m cassa raago pahiino bhavati, na ca bhayaagati.m gacchati.

[03] dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharanto ``anattani {anattaniye (sii0) passa a0 ni0 4.49} attaa''ti vipallaasa.m pajahati, manosa~ncetanaa cassa aahaaro pari~n~na.m gacchati, attavaadupaadaanena ca anupaadaano bhavati, avijjaayogena ca visa.myutto bhavati, ida.msaccaabhinivesakaayaganthena ca vippayujjati, avijjaasavena ca anaasavo bhavati, avijjogha~nca utti.n.no bhavati, mohasallena ca visallo bhavati ^a^M0.0071^ea^, sa"nkhaaruupikaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti pari~n~na.m gacchati, sa"nkhaaradhaatuya.m cassa raago pahiino bhavati, na ca mohaagati.m gacchati. aya.m pahaanena samaaropanaa.
[03] tenaaha ^a^V0.0070^ea^ aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano --
[21] ``ye dhammaa ya.m muulaa, ye cekatthaa pakaasitaa muninaa.
[22] te samaaropayitabbaa, esa samaaropano haaro''ti..
[06] niyutto samaaropano haaro.
[06] ni.t.thito ca haaravibha"ngo.
[24] ``so.lasa ^a^V0.0071^ea^ ^a^P0.0085^ea^ haaraa pa.thama.m, disalocanato disaa viloketvaa.
[22] sa"nkhipiya a"nkusena hi, nayehi tiihi niddise sutta''nti..
[03] vuttaa, tassaa niddeso kuhi.m da.t.thabbo? haarasampaate. tattha katamo desanaahaarasampaato?
[21] ``arakkhitena cittena {kaayena (udaa0 32)}, micchaadi.t.thihatena ca.
[22] thinamiddhaabhibhuutena, vasa.m maarassa gacchatii''ti..

[03] ^b^arakkhitena cittenaa^eb^ti ki.m desayati, pamaada.m ta.m maccuno pada.m. ^b^micchaadi.t.thihatena caa^eb^ti micchaadi.t.thihata.m naama vuccati yadaa ``anicce nicca''nti passati, so vipallaaso. so pana vipallaaso ki.mlakkha.no? vipariitaggaahalakkha.no vipallaaso. so ki.m vipallaasayati? tayo dhamme sa~n~na.m citta.m di.t.thimiti. so kuhi.m vipallaasayati? catuusu attabhaavavatthuusu, ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. eva.m vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m...pe0... sa"nkhaare...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0072^ea^ ruupa.m pa.thama.m vipallaasavatthu ``asubhe subha''nti. vedanaa dutiya.m vipallaasavatthu ``dukkhe sukha''nti. sa~n~naa sa"nkhaaraa ca tatiya.m vipallaasavatthu ``anattani attaa''ti. vi~n~naa.na.m catuttha.m vipallaasavatthu ``anicce nicca''nti. dve ^a^P0.0086^ea^ dhammaa cittassa sa.mkilesaa -- ta.nhaa ca avijjaa ca. ta.nhaanivuta.m citta.m dviihi vipallaasehi vipallaasiiyati ``asubhe subha''nti ``dukkhe sukha''nti. di.t.thinivuta.m citta.m dviihi vipallaasehi vipallaasiiyati ``anicce nicca''nti ``anattani attaa''ti.

[03] tattha yo di.t.thivipallaaso, so atiita.m ruupa.m attato samanupassati, atiita.m vedana.m...pe0... atiita.m sa~n~na.m, atiite sa"nkhaare...pe0... atiita.m vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati. tattha yo ta.nhaavipallaaso, so anaagata.m ruupa.m abhinandati, anaagata.m vedana.m...pe0... anaagata.m sa~n~na.m, anaagate sa"nkhaare, anaagata.m vi~n~naa.na.m abhinandati. dve dhammaa cittassa ^a^V0.0072^ea^ upakkilesaa -- ta.nhaa ca avijjaa ca. taahi visujjhanta.m citta.m visujjhati. tesa.m avijjaaniivara.naana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati sandhaavantaana.m sa.msarantaana.m saki.m niraya.m saki.m tiracchaanayoni.m saki.m pettivisaya.m saki.m asurakaaya.m saki.m deve saki.m manusse.

[03] ^b^thinamiddhaabhibhuutenaa^eb^ti. thina.m {thiina.m (sii0)} naama yaa cittassa akallataa akammaniyataa; middha.m naama ya.m kaayassa liinatta.m. ^b^vasa.m maarassa gacchatii^eb^ti kilesamaarassa ca sattamaarassa ca vasa.m gacchati, so hi nivuto sa.msaaraabhimukho hoti. imaani bhagavataa dve saccaani desitaani dukkha.m samudayo ca. tesa.m bhagavaa pari~n~naaya ca pahaanaaya ca dhamma.m deseti dukkhassa pari~n~naaya samudayassa pahaanaaya. yena ca parijaanaati yena ca pajahati, aya.m maggo. ya.m ta.nhaaya avijjaaya ca pahaana.m, aya.m nirodho. imaani cattaari saccaani. tenaaha bhagavaa ``arakkhitena cittenaa''ti. tenaahaayasmaa mahaakaccaayano ``assaadaadiinavataa''ti.
[06] niyutto desanaa haarasampaato.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0087^ea^ ^a^M0.0073^ea^ katamo vicayo haarasampaato? tattha ta.nhaa duvidhaa kusalaapi akusalaapi. akusalaa sa.msaaragaaminii, kusalaa apacayagaaminii pahaanata.nhaa. maanopi duvidho kusalopi akusalopi. ya.m maana.m nissaaya maana.m pajahati, aya.m maano kusalo. yo pana maano dukkha.m nibbattayati, aya.m maano akusalo. tattha ya.m nekkhammasita.m domanassa.m kudaassunaamaaha.m ta.m aayatana.m sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissa.m ya.m ariyaa santa.m aayatana.m sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantiiti tassa uppajjati pihaa, pihaapaccayaa domanassa.m, aya.m ta.nhaa kusalaa raagaviraagaa cetovimutti, tadaaramma.naa kusalaa avijjaaviraagaa pa~n~naavimutti.

[03] tassaa ko pavicayo? a.t.tha magga"ngaani sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. so kattha da.t.thabbo? catutthe jhaane paaramitaaya. catutthe hi jhaane a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m citta.m bhaavayati parisuddha.m pariyodaata.m ana"nga.na.m vigatuupakkilesa.m mudu kammaniya.m .thita.m aane~njappatta.m. so tattha a.t.thavidha.m adhigacchati cha abhi~n~naa dve ca visese, ta.m citta.m yato parisuddha.m, tato pariyodaata.m, yato pariyodaata.m ^a^V0.0073^ea^, tato ana"nga.na.m, yato ana"nga.na.m, tato vigatuupakkilesa.m, yato vigatuupakkilesa.m, tato mudu, yato mudu, tato kammaniya.m, yato kammaniya.m, tato .thita.m, yato .thita.m, tato aane~njappatta.m. tattha ^a^P0.0088^ea^ a"nga.naa ca upakkilesaa ca tadubhaya.m ta.nhaapakkho. yaa ca i~njanaa yaa ca cittassa a.t.thiti, aya.m di.t.thipakkho.

[03] cattaari indriyaani dukkhindriya.m domanassindriya.m sukhindriya.m somanassindriya~nca catutthajjhaane nirujjhanti, tassa upekkhindriya.m avasi.t.tha.m bhavati. so uparima.m samaapatti.m santato manasikaroti, tassa uparima.m samaapatti.m santato manasikaroto catutthajjhaane o.laarikaa sa~n~naa sa.n.thahati ukka.n.thaa ca pa.tighasa~n~naa, so sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa ``ananta.m aakaasa''nti aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapatti.m sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. abhi~n~naabhiniihaaro ruupasa~n~naa vokaaro naanattasa~n~naa samatikkamati pa.tighasa~n~naa cassa abbhattha.m gacchati, eva.m samaadhi tassa samaahitassa obhaaso antaradhaayati dassana~nca ruupaana.m, so samaadhi cha.la"ngasamannaagato paccavekkhitabbo ^a^M0.0074^ea^. anabhijjhaasahagata.m me maanasa.m sabbaloke, abyaapanna.m me citta.m sabbasattesu, aaraddha.m me viiriya.m paggahita.m, passaddho me kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m me citta.m avikkhitta.m, upa.t.thitaa me sati asammu.t.thaa {appammu.t.thaa (sii0)}, tattha ya~nca anabhijjhaasahagata.m maanasa.m sabbaloke ya~nca abyaapanna.m citta.m sabbasattesu ya~nca aaraddha.m viiriya.m paggahita.m ya~nca samaahita.m citta.m avikkhitta.m, aya.m samatho. yo passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, aya.m samaadhiparikkhaaro. yaa upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa aya.m vipassanaa.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ so samaadhi pa~ncavidhena veditabbo. aya.m samaadhi ``paccuppannasukho''ti itissa paccattameva ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita.m bhavati, aya.m samaadhi ``aayati.m sukhavipaako''ti itissa paccattameva ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita.m bhavati, aya.m samaadhi ``ariyo niraamiso''ti itissa ^a^P0.0089^ea^ paccattameva ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita.m bhavati, aya.m samaadhi ``akaapurisasevito''ti itissa paccattameva ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita.m bhavati, aya.m samaadhi ``santo ceva pa.niito ca pa.tippassaddhiladdho ca ekodibhaavaadhigato ca na sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritagato {sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritavato (sii0), sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaarivaava.to (ka0)} caa''ti itissa paccattameva ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita.m bhavati. ta.m kho panima.m samaadhi.m ``sato samaapajjaami sato vu.t.thahaamii''ti itissa paccattameva ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita.m bhavati. tattha yo ca samaadhi paccuppannasukho yo ca samaadhi aayati.m sukhavipaako aya.m samatho. yo ca samaadhi ariyo niraamiso, yo ca samaadhi akaapurisasevito, yo ca samaadhi santo ceva pa.niito pa.tippassaddhiladdho ^a^V0.0074^ea^ ca ekodibhaavaadhigato ca na sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritagato ca ya~ncaaha.m ta.m kho panima.m samaadhi.m sato samaapajjaami sato vu.t.thahaamiiti, aya.m vipassanaa.

[03] so samaadhi pa~ncavidhena veditabbo piitiphara.nataa sukhaphara.nataa cetophara.nataa aalokaphara.nataa paccavekkha.naanimitta.m. tattha yo ca piitiphara.no yo ca sukhaphara.no yo ca cetophara.no, aya.m samatho. yo ca aalokaphara.no ya~nca paccavekkha.naanimitta.m. aya.m vipassanaa.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ dasa ^a^M0.0075^ea^ kasi.naayatanaani pathaviikasi.na.m aapokasi.na.m tejokasi.na.m vaayokasi.na.m niilakasi.na.m piitakasi.na.m lohitakasi.na.m odaatakasi.na.m aakaasakasi.na.m vi~n~naa.nakasi.na.m. tattha ya~nca pathaviikasi.na.m ya~nca aapokasi.na.m eva.m sabba.m, ya~nca odaatakasi.na.m. imaani a.t.tha kasi.naani samatho. ya~nca aakaasakasi.na.m ya~nca vi~n~naa.nakasi.na.m, aya.m vipassanaa. eva.m sabbo ariyo maggo yena yena aakaarena vutto, tena tena samathavipassanena yojayitabbo. te ^a^P0.0090^ea^ tiihi dhammehi sa"ngahitaa aniccataaya dukkhataaya anattataaya. so samathavipassana.m bhaavayamaano tii.ni vimokkhamukhaani bhaavayati. tii.ni vimokkhamukhaani bhaavayanto tayo khandhe bhaavayati. tayo khandhe bhaavayanto ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavayati.

[03] raagacarito puggalo animittena vimokkhamukhena niyyaati {niiyaati (sii0)} adhicittasikkhaaya sikkhanto lobha.m akusalamuula.m pajahanto sukhavedaniiya.m phassa.m anupagacchanto sukha.m vedana.m parijaananto raagamala.m pavaahento raagaraja.m niddhunanto raagavisa.m vamento raagaggi.m nibbaapento raagasalla.m uppaa.tento raagaja.ta.m vija.tento. dosacarito puggalo appa.nihitena vimokkhamukhena niyyaati adhisiilasikkhaaya sikkhanto dosa.m akusalamuula.m pajahanto dukkhavedaniiya.m phassa.m anupagacchanto dukkhavedana.m parijaananto dosamala.m pavaahento dosaraja.m niddhunanto dosavisa.m vamento dosaggi.m nibbaapento dosasalla.m uppaa.tento dosaja.ta.m vija.tento. mohacarito puggalo su~n~natavimokkhamukhena niyyaati adhipa~n~naasikkhaaya sikkhanto moha.m akusalamuula.m pajahanto adukkhamasukhavedaniiya.m phassa.m anupagacchanto adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m parijaananto mohamala.m pavaahento moharaja.m niddhunanto mohavisa.m vamento mohaggi.m nibbaapento mohasalla.m uppaa.tento mohaja.ta.m vija.tento.

[03] tattha su~n~natavimokkhamukha.m pa~n~naakkhandho, animittavimokkhamukha.m samaadhikkhandho, appa.nihitavimokkhamukha.m ^a^V0.0075^ea^ siilakkhandho. so tii.ni vimokkhamukhaani bhaavayanto tayo khandhe bhaavayati, tayo khandhe bhaavayanto ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavayati. tattha ^a^P0.0091^ea^ yaa ca sammaavaacaa yo ca sammaakammanto yo ca sammaaaajiivo, aya.m siilakkhandho, yo ca sammaavaayaamo ^a^M0.0076^ea^ yaa ca sammaasati yo ca sammaasamaadhi, aya.m samaadhikkhandho, yaa ca sammaadi.t.thi yo ca sammaasa"nkappo, aya.m pa~n~naakkhandho.

[03] tattha siilakkhandho ca samaadhikkhandho ca samatho, pa~n~naakkhandho vipassanaa. yo samathavipassana.m bhaaveti, tassa dve bhava"ngaani bhaavana.m gacchanti kaayo citta~nca, bhavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa dve padaani siila.m samaadhi ca. so hoti bhikkhu bhaavitakaayo bhaavitasiilo bhaavitacitto bhaavitapa~n~no. kaaye bhaaviyamaane dve dhammaa bhaavana.m gacchanti sammaakammanto sammaavaayaamo ca, siile bhaaviyamaane dve dhammaa bhaavana.m gacchanti sammaavaacaa sammaaaajiivo ca, citte bhaaviyamaane dve dhammaa bhaavana.m gacchanti sammaasati sammaasamaadhi ca, pa~n~naaya bhaaviyamaanaaya dve dhammaa bhaavana.m gacchanti sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo ca.

[03] tattha yo ca sammaakammanto yo ca sammaavaayaamo siyaa kaayiko siyaa cetasiko, tattha yo kaayasa"ngaho, so kaaye bhaavite bhaavana.m gacchati, yo cittasa"ngaho, so citte bhaavite bhaavana.m gacchati. so samathavipassana.m bhaavayanto pa~ncavidha.m adhigama.m gacchati {adhigacchati (sii0)} khippaadhigamo ca hoti, vimuttaadhigamo ca hoti, mahaadhigamo ca hoti, vipulaadhigamo ca hoti, anavasesaadhigamo ca hoti. tattha samathena khippaadhigamo ca mahaadhigamo ca vipulaadhigamo ca hoti, vipassanaaya vimuttaadhigamo ca anavasesaadhigamo ca hoti.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ tattha yo desayati, so dasabalasamannaagato satthaa ovaadena saavake na visa.mvaadayati. so tividha.m ida.m karotha ^a^P0.0092^ea^ iminaa upaayena karotha ida.m vo kurumaanaana.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati, so tathaa ovadito tathaanusi.t.tho tathaakaronto tathaapa.tipajjanto ta.m bhuumi.m na paapu.nissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. so tathaa ovadito tathaanusi.t.tho siilakkhandha.m aparipuurayanto ta.m bhuumi.m anupaapu.nissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. so tathaa ovadito tathaanusi.t.tho siilakkhandha.m paripuurayanto ta.m bhuumi.m anupaapu.nissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] sammaasambuddhassa te sato ime dhammaa anabhisambuddhaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. sabbaasavaparikkhii.nassa te sato ime aasavaa aparikkhii.naati neta.m ^a^M0.0077^ea^ .thaana.m vijjati. yassa te ^a^V0.0076^ea^ atthaaya dhammo desito, so na niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. saavako kho pana te dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii so pubbena apara.m u.laara.m visesaadhigama.m na sacchikarissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ye kho pana dhammaa antaraayikaa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ye kho pana dhammaa aniyyaanikaa, te niyyanti takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ye kho pana dhammaa niyyaanikaa, te niyyanti takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaati .thaanameta.m vijjati. saavako kho pana te saupaadiseso anupaadisesa.m nibbaanadhaatu.m anupaapu.nissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] di.t.thisampanno maatara.m jiivitaa voropeyya hatthehi vaa paadehi vaa suhata.m kareyyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puthujjano maatara.m jiivitaa voropeyya hatthehi vaa paadehi vaa suhata.m kareyyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati. eva.m pitara.m, arahanta.m, bhikkhu.m. di.t.thisampanno puggalo sa"ngha.m bhindeyya sa"nghe vaa sa"ngharaaji.m janeyyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puthujjano sa"ngha.m ^a^P0.0093^ea^ bhindeyya sa"nghe vaa sa"ngharaaji.m janeyyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati, di.t.thisampanno tathaagatassa du.t.thacitto lohita.m uppaadeyya, parinibbutassa vaa tathaagatassa du.t.thacitto thuupa.m bhindeyyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. puthujjano tathaagatassa du.t.thacitto lohita.m uppaadeyya, parinibbutassa vaa tathaagatassa du.t.thacitto thuupa.m bhindeyyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati. di.t.thisampanno a~n~na.m satthaara.m apadiseyya api jiivitahetuuti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puthujjano a~n~na.m satthaara.m apadiseyyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati. di.t.thisampanno ito bahiddhaa a~n~na.m dakkhi.neyya.m pariyeseyyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puthujjano ito bahiddhaa a~n~na.m dakkhi.neyya.m pariyeseyyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati, di.t.thisampanno kutuuhalama"ngalena suddhi.m pacceyyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. puthujjano kutuuhalama"ngalena suddhi.m pacceyyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ itthii raajaa cakkavattii siyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puriso raajaa cakkavattii siyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati; itthii sakko devaanamindo siyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puriso sakko devaanamindo siyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati; itthii maaro paapimaa siyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puriso maaro paapimaa ^a^M0.0078^ea^ siyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati; itthii mahaabrahmaa siyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puriso mahaabrahmaa siyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati; itthii tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho ^a^V0.0077^ea^ siyaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, puriso tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho siyaati .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] dve tathaagataa arahanto sammaasambuddhaa apubba.m acarima.m ekissaa lokadhaatuyaa uppajjeyyu.m vaa dhamma.m vaa deseyyunti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, ekova tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho ekissaa lokadhaatuyaa uppajjissati vaa dhamma.m vaa desessatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] ti.n.na.m duccaritaana.m i.t.tho kanto piyo manaapo vipaako bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, ti.n.na.m duccaritaana.m ani.t.tho akanto appiyo amanaapo vipaako bhavissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati ^a^P0.0094^ea^. ti.n.na.m sucaritaana.m ani.t.tho akanto appiyo amanaapo vipaako bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, ti.n.na.m sucaritaana.m i.t.tho kanto piyo manaapo vipaako bhavissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] a~n~nataro sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa kuhako lapako nemittako kuhanalapananemittakatta.m pubba"ngama.m katvaa pa~nca niivara.ne appahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu anupa.t.thitassati {anupa.t.thitasati (sii0)} viharanto satta bojjha"nge abhaavayitvaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati, a~n~nataro sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa sabbadosaapagato pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu upa.t.thitassati viharanto satta bojjha"nge bhaavayitvaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati. ya.m ettha ~naa.na.m hetuso .thaanaso anodhiso ida.m vuccati .thaanaa.t.thaana~naa.na.m pa.thama.m tathaagatabala.m.
[03] iti .thaanaa.t.thaanagataa sabbe khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa keci sagguupagaa keci apaayuupagaa keci nibbaanuupagaa, eva.m bhagavaa aaha --
[24] sabbe ^a^M0.0079^ea^ sattaa {passa sa.m0 ni0 1.133} marissanti, mara.nanta.m hi jiivita.m.
[27] yathaakamma.m gamissanti, pu~n~napaapaphaluupagaa.
[26] niraya.m paapakammantaa, pu~n~nakammaa ca suggati.m.
[22] apare ca magga.m bhaavetvaa, parinibbantinaasavaati {parinibbanti anaasavaati (sii0 ka0)}..

[03] ^b^sabbe^eb^ ^a^V0.0078^ea^ ^b^sattaa^eb^ti ariyaa ca anariyaa ca sakkaayapariyaapannaa ca sakkaayaviitivattaa ca. ^b^marissantii^eb^ti dviihi mara.nehi dandhamara.nena ca adandhamara.nena ca, sakkaayapariyaapannaana.m adandhamara.na.m sakkaayaviitivattaana.m dandhamara.na.m. ^b^mara.nanta.m hi jiivita^eb^nti khayaa aayussa indriyaana.m uparodhaa jiivitapariyanto mara.napariyanto. ^b^yathaakamma.m gamissantii^eb^ti kammassakataa. ^b^pu~n~napaapaphaluupagaa^eb^ti kammaana.m phaladassaavitaa ca avippavaaso ca.

[03] ^b^niraya.m paapakammantaa^eb^ti apu~n~nasa"nkhaaraa. ^b^pu~n~nakammaa ca suggati^eb^nti pu~n~nasa"nkhaaraa ^a^P0.0095^ea^ sugati.m gamissanti. ^b^apare ca magga.m bhaavetvaa, parinibbantinaasavaa^eb^ti sabbasa"nkhaaraana.m samatikkamana.m. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``sabbe...pe0... naasavaa''ti.

[03] ``sabbe sattaa marissanti, mara.nanta.m hi jiivita.m. yathaakamma.m gamissanti, pu~n~napaapaphaluupagaa. niraya.m paapakammantaa''ti aagaa.lhaa ca nijjhaamaa ca pa.tipadaa. ``apare ca magga.m bhaavetvaa, parinibbantinaasavaa''ti majjhimaa pa.tipadaa. ``sabbe sattaa marissanti, mara.nanta.m hi jiivita.m, yathaakamma.m gamissanti, pu~n~napaapaphaluupagaa, niraya.m paapakammantaa''ti aya.m sa.mkileso. eva.m sa.msaara.m nibbattayati. ``sabbe sattaa marissanti...pe0... niraya.m paapakammantaa''ti ime tayo va.t.taa dukkhava.t.to kammava.t.to kilesava.t.to. ``apare ca magga.m bhaavetvaa, parinibbantinaasavaa''ti ti.n.na.m va.t.taana.m viva.t.tanaa. ``sabbe sattaa marissanti...pe0... niraya.m paapakammantaa''ti aadiinavo, ``pu~n~nakammaa ca suggati''nti assaado, ``apare ca magga.m bhaavetvaa, parinibbantinaasavaa''ti nissara.na.m. ``sabbe sattaa marissanti...pe0... niraya.m paapakammantaa''ti hetu ca phala~nca, pa~ncakkhandhaa phala.m, ta.nhaa hetu, ``apare ca magga.m bhaavetvaa, parinibbantinaasavaa''ti maggo ca phala~nca. ``sabbe sattaa marissanti, mara.nanta.m hi jiivita.m. yathaakamma.m gamissanti, pu~n~napaapaphaluupagaa, niraya.m paapakammantaa''ti aya.m sa.mkileso, so sa.mkileso tividho ta.nhaasa.mkileso di.t.thisa.mkileso duccaritasa.mkilesoti.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0080^ea^ ta.nhaasa.mkileso tiihi ta.nhaahi niddisitabbo -- kaamata.nhaaya bhavata.nhaaya vibhavata.nhaaya. yena yena vaa pana vatthunaa ajjhosito, tena teneva niddisitabbo, tassaa vitthaaro chatti.msaaya ta.nhaaya jaaliniyaa vicaritaani. tattha di.t.thisa.mkileso ucchedasassatena niddisitabbo, yena yena vaa pana vatthunaa di.t.thivasena abhinivisati, ``idameva ^a^P0.0096^ea^ sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti tena teneva niddisitabbo, tassaa vitthaaro dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani. tattha duccaritasa.mkileso cetanaa cetasikakammena niddisitabbo, tiihi duccaritehi kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena ^a^V0.0079^ea^ manoduccaritena, tassaa vitthaaro dasa akusalakammapathaa. apare ca magga.m bhaavetvaa, parinibbantinaasavaati ida.m vodaana.m.

[03] tayida.m vodaana.m tividha.m; ta.nhaasa.mkileso samathena visujjhati, so samatho samaadhikkhandho, di.t.thisa.mkileso vipassanaaya visujjhati, saa vipassanaa pa~n~naakkhandho, duccaritasa.mkileso sucaritena visujjhati, ta.m sucarita.m siilakkhandho.

[03] ``sabbe sattaa marissanti, mara.nanta.m hi jiivita.m, yathaakamma.m gamissanti, pu~n~napaapaphaluupagaa, niraya.m paapakammantaa''ti apu~n~nappa.tipadaa, ``pu~n~nakammaa ca suggati''nti pu~n~nappa.tipadaa, ``apare ca magga.m bhaavetvaa, parinibbantinaasavaa''ti pu~n~napaapasamatikkamappa.tipadaa, tattha yaa ca pu~n~nappa.tipadaa yaa ca apu~n~nappa.tipadaa, aya.m ekaa pa.tipadaa sabbatthagaaminii ekaa apaayesu, ekaa devesu, yaa ca pu~n~napaapasamatikkamaa pa.tipadaa aya.m tattha tattha gaaminii pa.tipadaa.

[03] tayo raasii -- micchattaniyato raasi, sammattaniyato raasi, aniyato raasi, tattha yo ca micchattaniyato raasi yo ca sammattaniyato raasi ekaa pa.tipadaa tattha tattha gaaminii, tattha yo aniyato raasi, aya.m sabbatthagaaminii pa.tipadaa. kena kaara.nena? paccaya.m labhanto niraye upapajjeyya, paccaya.m labhanto tiracchaanayoniisu upapajjeyya, paccaya.m labhanto pettivisayesu ^a^P0.0097^ea^ upapajjeyya, paccaya.m labhanto asuresu upapajjeyya, paccaya.m labhanto devesu upapajjeyya, paccaya.m labhanto manussesu upapajjeyya, paccaya.m labhanto parinibbaayeyya, tasmaaya.m sabbatthagaaminii pa.tipadaa, ya.m ettha ~naa.na.m hetuso .thaanaso anodhiso, ida.m vuccati sabbatthagaaminii pa.tipadaa ~naa.na.m dutiya.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] iti ^a^M0.0081^ea^ sabbatthagaaminii pa.tipadaa anekadhaatuloko, tattha tattha gaaminii pa.tipadaa naanaadhaatuloko. tattha katamo anekadhaatuloko? cakkhudhaatu ruupadhaatu cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu, sotadhaatu saddadhaatu sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, ghaanadhaatu gandhadhaatu ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, jivhaadhaatu rasadhaatu jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, kaayadhaatu pho.t.thabbadhaatu kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, manodhaatu dhammadhaatu manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, aakaasadhaatu, vi~n~naa.nadhaatu, kaamadhaatu, byaapaadadhaatu, vihi.msaadhaatu, nekkhammadhaatu, abyaapaadadhaatu, avihi.msaadhaatu, dukkhadhaatu, domanassadhaatu ^a^V0.0080^ea^, avijjaadhaatu, sukhadhaatu, somanassadhaatu, upekkhaadhaatu, ruupadhaatu, aruupadhaatu, nirodhadhaatu, sa"nkhaaradhaatu, nibbaanadhaatu, aya.m anekadhaatuloko.

[03] tattha katamo naanaadhaatuloko? a~n~naa cakkhudhaatu, a~n~naa ruupadhaatu, a~n~naa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu. eva.m sabbaa. a~n~naa nibbaanadhaatu. ya.m ettha ~naa.na.m hetuso .thaanaso anodhiso, ida.m vuccati anekadhaatu naanaadhaatu ~naa.na.m tatiya.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ iti anekadhaatu naanaadhaatukassa lokassa ya.m yadeva dhaatu.m sattaa adhimuccanti, ta.m tadeva adhi.t.thahanti abhinivisanti, keci ruupaadhimuttaa, keci saddaadhimuttaa, keci gandhaadhimuttaa, keci rasaadhimuttaa, keci pho.t.thabbaadhimuttaa, keci dhammaadhimuttaa, keci itthaadhimuttaa, keci purisaadhimuttaa, keci caagaadhimuttaa, keci hiinaadhimuttaa ^a^P0.0098^ea^, keci pa.niitaadhimuttaa, keci devaadhimuttaa, keci manussaadhimuttaa, keci nibbaanaadhimuttaa. ya.m ettha ~naa.na.m hetuso .thaanaso anodhiso, aya.m veneyyo, aya.m na veneyyo, aya.m saggagaamii, aya.m duggatigaamiiti, ida.m vuccati sattaana.m naanaadhimuttikataa ~naa.na.m catuttha.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] iti te yathaadhimuttaa ca bhavanti, ta.m ta.m kammasamaadaana.m samaadiyanti. te chabbidha.m kamma.m samaadiyanti -- keci lobhavasena, keci dosavasena, keci mohavasena, keci saddhaavasena, keci viiriyavasena, keci pa~n~naavasena. ta.m vibhajjamaana.m duvidha.m -- sa.msaaragaami ca nibbaanagaami ca.

[03] tattha ya.m lobhavasena dosavasena mohavasena ca kamma.m karoti, ida.m kamma.m ka.nha.m ka.nhavipaaka.m. tattha ya.m saddhaavasena kamma.m karoti, ida.m kamma.m sukka.m ^a^M0.0082^ea^ sukkavipaaka.m. tattha ya.m lobhavasena dosavasena mohavasena saddhaavasena ca kamma.m karoti, ida.m kamma.m ka.nhasukka.m ka.nhasukkavipaaka.m. tattha ya.m viiriyavasena pa~n~naavasena ca kamma.m karoti, ida.m kamma.m aka.nha.m asukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m kammuttama.m kammase.t.tha.m kammakkhayaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] cattaari kammasamaadaanaani. atthi kammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m, atthi kammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m, atthi kammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati.m ca dukkhavipaaka.m, atthi kammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati.m ca sukhavipaaka.m. ya.m eva.m jaatiya.m kammasamaadaana.m, iminaa puggalena akusalakammasamaadaana.m ^a^V0.0081^ea^ upacita.m avipakka.m vipaakaaya paccupa.t.thita.m na ca bhabbo abhinibbidhaa gantunti ta.m ^a^P0.0099^ea^ bhagavaa na ovadati. yathaa devadatta.m kokaalika.m sunakkhatta.m licchaviputta.m, ye vaa pana~n~nepi sattaa micchattaniyataa imesa~nca puggalaana.m upacita.m akusala.m na ca taava paaripuuri.m gata.m, puraa paaripuuri.m gacchati. puraa phala.m nibbattayati, puraa maggamaavaarayati, puraa veneyyatta.m samatikkamatiiti te bhagavaa asamatte ovadati. yathaa pu.n.na~nca govatika.m acela~nca kukkuravatika.m.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ imassa ca puggalassa akusalakammasamaadaana.m paripuuramaana.m magga.m aavaarayissati puraa paaripuuri.m gacchati, puraa phala.m nibbattayati, puraa maggamaavaarayati, puraa veneyyatta.m samatikkamatiiti ta.m bhagavaa asamatta.m ovadati. yathaa aayasmanta.m a"ngulimaala.m.

[03] sabbesa.m mudumajjhaadhimattataa. tattha mudu aane~njaabhisa"nkhaaraa majjha.m avasesakusalasa"nkhaaraa, adhimatta.m akusalasa"nkhaaraa, ya.m ettha ~naa.na.m hetuso .thaanaso anodhiso, ida.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m, ida.m upapajjavedaniiya.m, ida.m aparaapariyavedaniiya.m, ida.m nirayavedaniiya.m, ida.m tiracchaanavedaniiya.m, ida.m pettivisayavedaniiya.m, ida.m asuravedaniiya.m, ida.m devavedaniiya.m, ida.m manussavedaniiyanti, ida.m vuccati atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m hetuso .thaanaso anodhiso vipaakavemattataa ~naa.na.m pa~ncama.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ iti tathaa samaadinnaana.m kammaana.m samaadinnaana.m jhaanaana.m vimokkhaana.m samaadhiina.m samaapattiina.m aya.m sa.mkileso, ida.m vodaana.m, ida.m vu.t.thaana.m, eva.m sa.mkilissati, eva.m vodaayati, eva.m vu.t.thahatiiti ~naa.na.m anaavara.na.m.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0083^ea^ kati jhaanaani? cattaari ^a^P0.0100^ea^ jhaanaani. kati vimokkhaa? ekaadasa ca a.t.tha ca satta ca tayo ca dve ca. kati samaadhii? tayo samaadhii -- savitakko savicaaro samaadhi, avitakko vicaaramatto samaadhi, avitakko avicaaro samaadhi. kati samaapattiyo? pa~nca samaapattiyo -- sa~n~naasamaapatti asa~n~naasamaapatti nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naasamaapatti vibhuutasa~n~naasamaapatti {vibhuutasamaapatti (sii0 ka0)} nirodhasamaapatti.

[03] tattha katamo sa.mkileso? pa.thamajjhaanassa kaamaraagabyaapaadaa sa.mkileso. ye ca kukku.tajhaayii dve pa.thamakaa yo vaa pana koci haanabhaagiyo samaadhi, aya.m sa.mkileso. tattha katama.m ^a^V0.0082^ea^ vodaana.m, niivara.napaarisuddhi, pa.thamassa jhaanassa ye ca kukku.tajhaayii dve pacchimakaa yo vaa pana koci visesabhaagiyo samaadhi, ida.m vodaana.m. tattha katama.m vu.t.thaana.m? ya.m samaapattivu.t.thaanakosalla.m, ida.m vu.t.thaana.m. ya.m ettha ~naa.na.m hetuso .thaanaso anodhiso, ida.m vuccati sabbesa.m jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiina.m sa.mkilesavodaanavu.t.thaana~naa.na.m cha.t.tha.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ iti tasseva samaadhissa tayo dhammaa parivaaraa indriyaani balaani viiriyamiti, taaniyeva indriyaani viiriyavasena balaani bhavanti, aadhipateyya.t.thena indriyaani, akampiya.t.thena balaani, iti tesa.m mudumajjhaadhimattataa aya.m mudindriyo aya.m majjhindriyo aya.m tikkhindriyoti. tattha bhagavaa tikkhindriya.m sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovadati, majjhindriya.m bhagavaa sa.mkhittavitthaarena ovadati, mudindriya.m bhagavaa vitthaarena ovadati. tattha bhagavaa tikkhindriyassa muduka.m dhammadesana.m upadisati, majjhindriyassa bhagavaa mudutikkhadhammadesana.m ^a^P0.0101^ea^ upadisati, mudindriyassa bhagavaa tikkha.m dhammadesana.m upadisati. tattha bhagavaa tikkhindriyassa samatha.m upadisati, majjhindriyassa bhagavaa samathavipassana.m upadisati, mudindriyassa bhagavaa vipassana.m upadisati. tattha bhagavaa tikkhindriyassa nissara.na.m upadisati, majjhindriyassa bhagavaa aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca upadisati, mudindriyassa bhagavaa assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca upadisati. tattha bhagavaa tikkhindriyassa adhipa~n~naasikkhaaya pa~n~naapayati, majjhindriyassa bhagavaa adhicittasikkhaaya pa~n~naapayati, mudindriyassa bhagavaa adhisiilasikkhaaya pa~n~naapayati.

[01] ya.m ^a^M0.0084^ea^ ettha ~naa.na.m hetuso .thaanaso anodhiso aya.m ima.m bhuumi.m bhaavana~nca gato, imaaya velaaya imaaya anusaasaniyaa eva.m dhaatuko caaya.m aya.m cassa aasayo aya~nca anusayo iti, ida.m vuccati parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m indriyaparopariyattavemattataa ~naa.na.m sattama.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] iti tattha ya.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. seyyathida.m, ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaariisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekaanipi jaatisataani anekaanipi jaatisahassaani anekaanipi jaatisatasahassaani anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe. amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m. tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo ^a^V0.0083^ea^ eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so ^a^P0.0102^ea^ tato cuto idhuupapannoti, iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ tattha sagguupagesu ca sattesu manussuupagesu ca sattesu apaayuupagesu ca sattesu imassa puggalassa lobhaadayo ussannaa alobhaadayo mandaa, imassa puggalassa alobhaadayo ussannaa lobhaadayo mandaa, ye vaa pana ussannaa ye vaa pana mandaa imassa puggalassa imaani indriyaani upacitaani imassa puggalassa imaani indriyaani anupacitaani amukaaya vaa kappako.tiya.m kappasatasahasse vaa kappasahasse vaa kappasate vaa kappe vaa antarakappe vaa upa.d.dhakappe vaa sa.mvacchare vaa upa.d.dhasa.mvacchare vaa maase vaa pakkhe vaa divase vaa muhutte vaa iminaa pamaadena vaa pasaadena vaati. ta.m ta.m bhava.m bhagavaa anussaranto asesa.m jaanaati, tattha ya.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa ^a^M0.0085^ea^ micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa.

[03] ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa, tattha sagguupagesu ca sattesu manussuupagesu ca sattesu apaayuupagesu ca sattesu iminaa puggalena evaruupa.m kamma.m amukaaya kappako.tiya.m upacita.m kappasatasahasse vaa kappasahasse vaa ^a^P0.0103^ea^ kappasate vaa kappe vaa antarakappe vaa upa.d.dhakappe vaa sa.mvacchare vaa upa.d.dhasa.mvacchare vaa maase vaa pakkhe vaa divase vaa muhutte vaa iminaa pamaadena vaa pasaadena vaati. imaani bhagavato dve ~naa.naani -- pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na~nca dibbacakkhu ca a.t.thama.m navama.m tathaagatabala.m.

[03] iti tattha ya.m sabba~n~nutaa pattaa viditaa sabbadhammaa viraja.m viitamala.m uppanna.m sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m nihato maaro bodhimuule, ida.m bhagavato dasama.m bala.m sabbaasavaparikkhaya.m ~naa.na.m. dasabalasamannaagataa hi buddhaa bhagavantoti.
[06] niyutto vicayo haarasampaato.
[21] tattha ^a^V0.0084^ea^ katamo yuttihaarasampaato?
[27] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro.
[26] sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro, ~natvaana udayabbaya.m.
[22] thinamiddhaabhibhuu bhikkhu, sabbaa duggatiyo jahe''ti..

[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti rakkhitacittassa sammaasa"nkappagocaro bhavissatiiti yujjati, sammaasa"nkappagocaro sammaadi.t.thi bhavissatiiti yujjati, sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro viharanto udayabbaya.m pa.tivijjhissatiiti yujjati, udayabbaya.m pa.tivijjhanto sabbaa duggatiyo jahissatiiti yujjati. sabbaa duggatiyo jahanto sabbaani duggativinipaatabhayaani samatikkamissatiiti yujjatiiti.
[06] niyutto yuttihaarasampaato.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0104^ea^ ^a^M0.0086^ea^ katamo pada.t.thaano haarasampaato?

[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassaa''ti ti.n.na.m sucaritaana.m pada.t.thaana.m. ``sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti samathassa pada.t.thaana.m. ``sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro''ti vipassanaaya pada.t.thaana.m. ``~natvaana udayabbaya''nti dassanabhuumiyaa pada.t.thaana.m. ``thinamiddhaabhibhuu bhikkhuu''ti viiriyassa pada.t.thaana.m. ``sabbaa duggatiyo jahe''ti bhaavanaaya pada.t.thaana.m.
[06] niyutto pada.t.thaano haarasampaato.
[03] 67^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0085^ea^ katamo lakkha.no haarasampaato?

[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti ida.m satindriya.m, satindriye gahite gahitaani bhavanti pa~ncindriyaani. ``sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro''ti sammaadi.t.thiyaa gahitaaya gahito bhavati ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. ta.m kissa hetu? sammaadi.t.thito hi sammaasa"nkappo pabhavati, sammaasa"nkappato sammaavaacaa pabhavati, sammaavaacaato sammaakammanto pabhavati, sammaakammantato sammaaaajiivo pabhavati, sammaaaajiivato sammaavaayaamo pabhavati, sammaavaayaamato sammaasati pabhavati, sammaasatito sammaasamaadhi pabhavati, sammaasamaadhito sammaavimutti pabhavati, sammaavimuttito sammaavimutti~naa.nadassana.m pabhavati.
[06] niyutto lakkha.no haarasampaato.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0105^ea^ katamo catubyuuho haarasampaato.

[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassaa''ti rakkhita.m paripaaliiyatiiti esaa nirutti. idha bhagavato ko adhippaayo? ye duggatiihi parimuccitukaamaa bhavissanti, te dhammacaarino bhavissantiiti aya.m ettha bhagavato adhippaayo. kokaaliko hi saariputtamoggallaanesu ^a^M0.0087^ea^ theresu citta.m padosayitvaa mahaapadumaniraye upapanno. bhagavaa ca satiaarakkhena cetasaa samannaagato, suttamhi vutta.m ``satiyaa citta.m rakkhitabba''nti.
[06] niyutto catubyuuho haarasampaato.
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0086^ea^ katamo aava.t.to haarasampaato?

[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti samatho {aya.m samatho (sii0 ka0)}. ``sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro''ti vipassanaa. ``~natvaana udayabbaya''nti dukkhapari~n~naa. ``thinamiddhaabhibhuu bhikkhuu''ti samudayapahaana.m. ``sabbaa duggatiyo jahe''ti nirodho {aya.m nirodho (sii0 ka0)}. imaani cattaari saccaani.
[06] niyutto aava.t.to haarasampaato.
[03] 70^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vibhattihaarasampaato?
[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. kusalapakkho kusalapakkhena niddisitabbo. akusalapakkho akusalapakkhena niddisitabbo.
[06] niyutto vibhattihaarasampaato.
[03] 71^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0106^ea^ katamo parivattano haarasampaato?
[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. samathavipassanaaya bhaavitaaya nirodho phala.m, pari~n~naata.m dukkha.m, samudayo pahiino, maggo bhaavito pa.tipakkhena.
[06] niyutto parivattano haarasampaato.
[03] 72^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0087^ea^ ^a^M0.0088^ea^ katamo vevacano haarasampaato?

[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassaa''ti citta.m mano vi~n~naa.na.m manindriya.m manaayatana.m vijaananaa vijaanitatta.m, ida.m vevacana.m. ``sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti nekkhammasa"nkappo abyaapaadasa"nkappo avihi.msaasa"nkappo, ida.m vevacana.m. ``sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro''ti sammaadi.t.thi naama pa~n~naasattha.m pa~n~naakhaggo pa~n~naaratana.m pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naapatodo pa~n~naapaasaado, ida.m vevacana.m.
[06] niyutto vevacano haarasampaato.
[03] 73^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo pa~n~nattihaarasampaato?

[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassaa''ti pada.t.thaanapa~n~natti satiyaa. ``sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti bhaavanaapa~n~natti samathassa. ``sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro, ~natvaana udayabbaya''nti dassanabhuumiyaa nikkhepapa~n~natti. ``thinamiddhaabhibhuu bhikkhuu''ti samudayassa anavasesappahaanapa~n~natti, ``sabbaa duggatiyo jahe''ti bhaavanaapa~n~natti maggassa.
[06] niyutto pa~n~nattihaarasampaato.
[03] 74^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0107^ea^ katamo otara.no haarasampaato?

[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro'' ^a^V0.0088^ea^. ``sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro''ti sammaadi.t.thiyaa gahitaaya gahitaani bhavanti pa~ncindriyaani, aya.m indriyehi otara.naa.
[03] taaniyeva indriyaani vijjaa, vijjuppaadaa avijjaanirodho, avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, eva.m sabba.m, aya.m pa.ticcasamuppaadena otara.naa.
[03] taaniyeva pa~ncindriyaani tiihi khandhehi sa"ngahitaani -- siilakkhandhena samaadhikkhandhena pa~n~naakkhandhena. aya.m khandhehi otara.naa.
[03] taani ^a^M0.0089^ea^ yeva pa~ncindriyaani sa"nkhaarapariyaapannaani. ye sa"nkhaaraa anaasavaa no ca bhava"ngaa, te sa"nkhaaraa dhammadhaatusa"ngahitaa, aya.m dhaatuuhi otara.naa.
[03] saa dhammadhaatu dhammaayatanapariyaapannaa, ya.m aayatana.m anaasava.m no ca bhava"nga.m, aya.m aayatanehi otara.naa.
[06] niyutto otara.no haarasampaato.
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo sodhano haarasampaato?
[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. yattha aarambho suddho, so pa~nho visajjito bhavati. yattha pana aarambho na suddho, na taava so pa~nho visajjito bhavati.
[06] niyutto sodhano haarasampaato.
[03] 76^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo adhi.t.thaano haarasampaato?

[03] tasmaa ^a^V0.0089^ea^ rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaroti gaathaa. tasmaa rakkhitacittassaati ekattataa. citta.m mano vi~n~naa.na.m, aya.m vemattataa. sammaasa"nkappagocaroti ekattataa. nekkhammasa"nkappo abyaapaadasa"nkappo avihi.msaasa"nkappo ^a^P0.0108^ea^ aya.m vemattataa. sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaroti ekattataa. sammaadi.t.thi naama ya.m dukkhe ~naa.na.m dukkhasamudaye ~naa.na.m dukkhanirodhe ~naa.na.m dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ~naa.na.m magge ~naa.na.m hetumhi ~naa.na.m hetusamuppannesu dhammesu ~naa.na.m paccaye ~naa.na.m paccayasamuppannesu dhammesu ~naa.na.m, ya.m tattha tattha yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nadassana.m abhisamayo sampa.tivedho saccaagamana.m, aya.m vemattataa. ~natvaana udayabbayanti ekattataa, udayena avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, eva.m sabba.m samudayo bhavati. vayena avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho, eva.m sabba.m nirodho hoti, aya.m vemattataa. thinamiddhaabhibhuu bhikkhuuti ekattataa, thina.m naama yaa cittassa akallataa akammaniyataa, middha.m naama ya.m kaayassa liinatta.m, aya.m vemattataa. sabbaa duggatiyo jaheti ekattataa, devamanusse vaa upanidhaaya ^a^M0.0090^ea^ apaayaa duggati, nibbaana.m vaa upanidhaaya sabbaa upapattiyo duggati, aya.m vemattataa.
[06] niyutto adhi.t.thaano haarasampaato.
[03] 77^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo parikkhaaro haarasampaato?
[03] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro''ti gaathaa. aya.m samathavipassanaaya parikkhaaro.
[06] niyutto parikkhaaro haarasampaato.
[03] 78^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo samaaropano haarasampaato?
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^V0.0090^ea^ rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro.
[27] sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro, ~natvaana udayabbaya.m.
[22] thinamiddhaabhibhuu bhikkhu, sabbaa duggatiyo jahe''ti..

[03] tasmaa ^a^P0.0109^ea^ rakkhitacittassaati ti.n.na.m sucaritaana.m pada.t.thaana.m, citte rakkhite ta.m rakkhita.m bhavati kaayakamma.m vaciikamma.m manokamma.m. sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaroti sammaadi.t.thiyaa bhaavitaaya bhaavito bhavati ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. kena kaara.nena? sammaadi.t.thito hi sammaasa"nkappo pabhavati, sammaasa"nkappato sammaavaacaa pabhavati, sammaavaacaato sammaakammanto pabhavati, sammaakammantato sammaaaajiivo pabhavati, sammaaaajiivato sammaavaayaamo pabhavati, sammaavaayaamato sammaasati pabhavati, sammaasatito sammaasamaadhi pabhavati, sammaasamaadhito sammaavimutti pabhavati, sammaavimuttito sammaavimutti~naa.nadassana.m pabhavati. aya.m anupaadiseso puggalo anupaadisesaa ca nibbaanadhaatu.
[06] niyutto samaaropano haarasampaato.
[03] tenaaha ^a^M0.0091^ea^ aayasmaa mahaakaccaayano --
[21] ``so.lasa haaraa pa.thama.m, disalocanato disaa viloketvaa.
[22] sa"nkhipiya a"nkusena hi, nayehi tiihi niddise sutta''nti..
[06] niyutto haarasampaato.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m nayasamu.t.thaana.m? pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaayaca bhavata.nhaaya ca, tattha avijjaaniivara.na.m ta.nhaasa.myojana.m. avijjaaniivara.naa sattaa avijjaasa.myuttaa {avijjaaya sa.myuttaa (sii0 ka0)} avijjaapakkhena vicaranti, te vuccanti di.t.thicaritaati. ta.nhaasa.myojanaa sattaa ta.nhaasa.myuttaa ta.nhaapakkhena vicaranti, te vuccanti ta.nhaacaritaati. di.t.thicaritaa ^a^P0.0110^ea^ ito bahiddhaa pabbajitaa attakilamathaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti. ta.nhaacaritaa ito bahiddhaa pabbajitaa kaamesu kaamasukhallikaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0091^ea^ ki.mkaara.na.m ya.m di.t.thicaritaa ito bahiddhaa pabbajitaa attakilamathaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti, ta.nhaacaritaa ito bahiddhaa pabbajitaa kaamesu kaamasukhallikaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti? ito bahiddhaa natthi saccavavatthaana.m, kuto catusaccappakaasanaa vaa samathavipassanaakosalla.m vaa upasamasukhappatti vaa! te upasamasukhassa anabhi~n~naa vipariitacetaa evamaaha.msu ``natthi sukhena sukha.m, dukkhena naama sukha.m adhigantabba''nti. yo kaame pa.tisevati, so loka.m va.d.dhayati, yo loka.m va.d.dhayati, so bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavatiiti te eva.msa~n~nii eva.mdi.t.thii dukkhena sukha.m patthayamaanaa kaamesu pu~n~nasa~n~nii attakilamathaanuyogamanuyuttaa ca viharanti kaamasukhallikaanuyogamanuyuttaa ca, te tadabhi~n~naa santaa rogameva va.d.dhayanti, ga.n.dameva va.d.dhayanti, sallameva va.d.dhayanti, te rogaabhitunnaa ga.n.dapa.tipii.litaa sallaanuviddhaa nirayatiracchaanayonipetaasuresu ummujjanimujjaani karontaa ugghaatanigghaata.m paccanubhontaa rogaga.n.dasallabhesajja.m na vindanti. tattha attakilamathaanuyogo kaamasukhallikaanuyogo ca sa.mkileso, samathavipassanaa vodaana.m. attakilamathaanuyogo kaamasukhallikaanuyogo ca rogo, samathavipassanaa roganigghaatakabhesajja.m. attakilamathaanuyogo kaamasukhallikaanuyogo ca ga.n.do, samathavipassanaa ga.n.danigghaatakabhesajja.m ^a^M0.0092^ea^. attakilamathaanuyogo kaamasukhallikaanuyogo ca sallo, samathavipassanaa salluddhara.nabhesajja.m.

[03] tattha sa.mkileso dukkha.m, tadabhisa"ngo ta.nhaa samudayo, ta.nhaanirodho dukkhanirodho, samathavipassanaa dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, imaani ^a^P0.0111^ea^ cattaari saccaani. dukkha.m pari~n~neyya.m, samudayo pahaatabbo, maggo bhaavetabbo, nirodho sacchikaatabbo.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ tattha di.t.thicaritaa ruupa.m attato upagacchanti. vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m...pe0... sa"nkhaare...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m attato upagacchanti. ta.nhaacaritaa ruupavanta.m attaana.m upagacchanti. attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m, vedanaavanta.m...pe0... sa~n~naavanta.m...pe0... sa"nkhaaravanta.m...pe0... vi~n~naa.navanta.m attaana.m upagacchanti, attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m, aya.m vuccati viisativatthukaa sakkaayadi.t.thi.

[03] tassaa pa.tipakkho lokuttaraa sammaadi.t.thi, anvaayikaa sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi, aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. te tayo khandhaa siilakkhandho samaadhikkhandho pa~n~naakkhandho. siilakkhandho samaadhikkhandho ca samatho, pa~n~naakkhandho vipassanaa. tattha sakkaayo dukkha.m, sakkaayasamudayo dukkhasamudayo, sakkaayanirodho ^a^V0.0092^ea^ dukkhanirodho, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, imaani cattaari saccaani. dukkha.m pari~n~neyya.m, samudayo pahaatabbo, maggo bhaavetabbo, nirodho sacchikaatabbo.

[03] tattha ye ruupa.m attato upagacchanti. vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m...pe0... sa"nkhaare...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m attato upagacchanti. ime vuccanti ``ucchedavaadino''ti. ye ruupavanta.m attaana.m upagacchanti. attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. ye vedanaavanta.m...pe0... ye sa~n~naavanta.m...pe0... ye sa"nkhaaravanta.m...pe0... ye vi~n~naa.navanta.m attaana.m upagacchanti, attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. ime vuccanti ``sassatavaadino''ti, tattha ucchedasassatavaadaa ubho antaa, aya.m sa.msaarapavatti. tassa ^a^P0.0112^ea^ pa.tipakkho majjhimaa pa.tipadaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, aya.m sa.msaaranivatti. tattha pavatti dukkha.m, tadabhisa"ngo ta.nhaa samudayo, ta.nhaanirodho dukkhanirodho, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo dukkhanirodhagaaminii ^a^M0.0093^ea^ pa.tipadaa, imaani cattaari saccaani. dukkha.m pari~n~neyya.m, samudayo pahaatabbo, maggo bhaavetabbo, nirodho sacchikaatabbo.

[03] tattha ucchedasassata.m samaasato viisativatthukaa sakkaayadi.t.thi, vitthaarato dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani, tesa.m pa.tipakkho tecattaaliisa.m bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa a.t.tha vimokkhaa dasa kasi.naayatanaani. dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani mohajaala.m anaadianidhanappavatta.m. tecattaaliisa.m {tetaaliisa.m (sii0)} bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa ~naa.navajira.m mohajaalappadaalana.m. tattha moho avijjaa, jaala.m bhavata.nhaa, tena vuccati ``pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaya ca bhavata.nhaaya caa''ti.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ tattha di.t.thicarito asmi.m saasane pabbajito sallekhaanusantatavutti bhavati sallekhe tibbagaaravo. ta.nhaacarito asmi.m saasane pabbajito sikkhaanusantatavutti bhavati sikkhaaya tibbagaaravo. di.t.thicarito sammattaniyaama.m okkamanto dhammaanusaarii bhavati. ta.nhaacarito sammattaniyaama.m okkamanto saddhaanusaarii bhavati, di.t.thicarito sukhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya khippaabhi~n~naaya ca niyyaati. ta.nhaacarito dukkhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya khippaabhi~n~naaya ca niyyaati.

[03] tattha ki.mkaara.na.m, ya.m ta.nhaacarito dukkhaaya pa.tipadaaya dandhaabhi~n~naaya khippaabhi~n~naaya ca niyyaati, tassa hi kaamaa apariccattaa bhavanti, so ^a^P0.0113^ea^ kaamehi viveciyamaano dukkhena pa.tinissarati ^a^V0.0093^ea^ dandha~nca dhamma.m aajaanaati? yo panaaya.m di.t.thicarito aya.m aaditoyeva kaamehi anatthiko bhavati. so tato viveciyamaano khippa~nca pa.tinissarati, khippa~nca dhamma.m aajaanaati. dukkhaapi pa.tipadaa duvidhaa dandhaabhi~n~naa ca khippaabhi~n~naa ca. sukhaapi pa.tipadaa duvidhaa dandhaabhi~n~naa ca khippaabhi~n~naa ca. sattaapi duvidhaa mudindriyaapi tikkhindriyaapi. ye mudindriyaa, te dandha~nca pa.tinissaranti dandha~nca dhamma.m aajaananti. ye tikkhindriyaa, te khippa~nca pa.tinissaranti, khippa~nca dhamma.m aajaananti, imaa catasso pa.tipadaa. ye hi keci niyyi.msu vaa niyyanti vaa niyyissanti vaa, te imaahi eva catuuhi pa.tipadaahi. eva.m ariyaa catukkamagga.m pa~n~naapenti abudhajanasevitaaya baalakantaaya rattavaasiniyaa nandiyaa bhavata.nhaaya ava.t.tanattha.m {aava.t.tanattha.m (sii0 ka0)}. aya.m vuccati nandiyaava.t.tassa nayassa bhuumiiti, tenaaha ``ta.nha~nca avijjampi ca samathenaa''ti.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ veyyaakara.nesu ^a^M0.0094^ea^ hi ye kusalaakusalaati te duvidhaa upaparikkhitabbaa -- lokava.t.taanusaarii ca lokaviva.t.taanusaarii ca. va.t.ta.m naama sa.msaaro. viva.t.ta.m nibbaana.m. kammakilesaa hetu sa.msaarassa. tattha kamma.m cetanaa cetasika~nca niddisitabba.m. ta.m katha.m da.t.thabba.m? upacayena sabbepi kilesaa catuuhi vipallaasehi niddisitabbaa. te kattha da.t.thabbaa? dasa vatthuke kilesapu~nje. katamaani ^a^P0.0114^ea^ dasa vatthuuni? cattaaro aahaaraa, cattaaro vipallaasaa, cattaari upaadaanaani, cattaaro yogaa, cattaaro ganthaa, cattaaro aasavaa, cattaaro oghaa, cattaaro sallaa, catasso vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyo cattaari agatigamanaani. pa.thame aahaare pa.thamo vipallaaso, dutiye aahaare dutiyo vipallaaso, tatiye aahaare tatiyo vipallaaso, catutthe aahaare catuttho vipallaaso. pa.thame vipallaase pa.thama.m upaadaana.m. dutiye vipallaase dutiya.m upaadaana.m, tatiye vipallaase tatiya.m upaadaana.m, catutthe vipallaase catuttha.m upaadaana.m. pa.thame upaadaane pa.thamo yogo, dutiye upaadaane dutiyo yogo, tatiye upaadaane tatiyo yogo, catutthe upaadaane catuttho yogo. pa.thame yoge pa.thamo gantho, dutiye yoge dutiyo gantho, tatiye yoge tatiyo gantho, catutthe yoge catuttho gantho, pa.thame ganthe pa.thamo aasavo, dutiye ganthe dutiyo aasavo, tatiye ganthe tatiyo aasavo, catutthe ganthe catuttho aasavo. pa.thame aasave pa.thamo ogho, dutiye aasave dutiyo ogho, tatiye aasave tatiyo ogho, catutthe aasave catuttho ogho. pa.thame oghe pa.thamo sallo, dutiye oghe dutiyo sallo, tatiye oghe tatiyo sallo, catutthe oghe catuttho sallo. pa.thame salle pa.thamaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, dutiye salle dutiyaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, tatiye salle tatiyaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, catutthe salle catutthii {catutthaa (sii0)} vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, pa.thamaaya.m vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiya.m pa.thama.m agatigamana.m. dutiyaaya.m vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiya.m ^a^V0.0094^ea^ dutiya.m agatigamana.m. tatiyaaya.m vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiya.m tatiya.m agatigamana.m, catutthiya.m {catutthaaya.m (sii0)} vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiya.m catuttha.m agatigamana.m.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0095^ea^ yo ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro phasso aahaaro, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. yo ca manosa~ncetanaahaaro yo ca vi~n~naa.naahaaro, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. tattha yo ca ``asubhe subha''nti vipallaaso, yo ca ``dukkhe sukha''nti vipallaaso, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. yo ca ``anicce nicca''nti vipallaaso, yo ca ``anattani attaa''ti vipallaaso, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. tattha ^a^P0.0115^ea^ ya~nca kaamupaadaana.m ya~nca bhavupaadaana.m, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. ya~nca di.t.thupaadaana.m ya~nca attavaadupaadaana.m, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. tattha yo ca kaamayogo, yo ca bhavayogo, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. yo ca di.t.thiyogo, yo ca avijjaayogo, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. tattha yo ca abhijjhaakaayagantho, yo ca byaapaado kaayagantho, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. yo ca paraamaasakaayagantho, yo ca ida.msaccaabhinivesakaayagantho, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. tattha yo ca kaamaasavo, yo ca bhavaasavo, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. yo ca di.t.thaasavo, yo ca avijjaasavo, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. tattha yo ca kaamogho, yo ca bhavogho, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. yo ca di.t.thogho, yo ca avijjogho, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. tattha yo ca raagasallo, yo ca dosasallo, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. yo ca maanasallo, yo ca mohasallo, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. tattha yaa ca ruupuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, yaa ca vedanuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. yaa ca sa~n~nuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, yaa ca sa"nkhaaruupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. tattha ya~nca chandaa agatigamana.m ya~nca dosaa agatigamana.m, ime ta.nhaacaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa. ya~nca bhayaa agatigamana.m, ya~nca mohaa agatigamana.m, ime di.t.thicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesaa.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ tattha kaba.liikaare aahaare ``asubhe subha''nti vipallaaso, phasse aahaare ``dukkhe sukha''nti vipallaaso, vi~n~naa.ne aahaare ``anicce ^a^M0.0096^ea^ nicca''nti vipallaaso, manosa~ncetanaaya aahaare ``anattani attaa''ti vipallaaso. pa.thame vipallaase .thito kaame upaadiyati ^a^V0.0095^ea^, ida.m vuccati kaamupaadaana.m; dutiye vipallaase .thito anaagata.m bhava.m upaadiyati ^a^P0.0116^ea^, ida.m vuccati bhavupaadaana.m; tatiye vipallaase .thito sa.msaaraabhinandini.m di.t.thi.m upaadiyati, ida.m vuccati di.t.thupaadaana.m; catutthe vipallaase .thito attaana.m kappiya.m upaadiyati, ida.m vuccati attavaadupaadaana.m.

[03] kaamupaadaanena kaamehi sa.myujjati, aya.m vuccati kaamayogo; bhavupaadaanena bhavehi sa.myujjati, aya.m vuccati bhavayogo; di.t.thupaadaanena paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa sa.myujjati, aya.m vuccati di.t.thiyogo; attavaadupaadaanena avijjaaya sa.myujjati, aya.m vuccati avijjaayogo.

[03] pa.thame yoge .thito abhijjhaaya kaaya.m ganthati, aya.m vuccati abhijjhaakaayagantho; dutiye yoge .thito byaapaadena kaaya.m ganthati, aya.m vuccati byaapaadakaayagantho; tatiye yoge .thito paraamaasena kaaya.m ganthati, aya.m vuccati paraamaasakaayagantho; catutthe yoge .thito ida.msaccaabhinivesena kaaya.m ganthati, aya.m vuccati ida.msaccaabhinivesakaayagantho.

[03] tassa eva.mganthitaa kilesaa aasavanti. kuto ca vuccati aasavantiiti? anusayato vaa pariyu.t.thaanato vaa. tattha abhijjhaakaayaganthena kaamaasavo, byaapaadakaayaganthena bhavaasavo, paraamaasakaayaganthena di.t.thaasavo, ida.msaccaabhinivesakaayaganthena avijjaasavo.

[03] tassa ime cattaaro aasavaa vepulla.m gataa oghaa bhavanti. iti aasavavepullaa oghavepulla.m. tattha kaamaasavena kaamogho, bhavaasavena bhavogho, di.t.thaasavena di.t.thogho, avijjaasavena avijjogho.

[03] tassa ime cattaaro oghaa anusayasahagataa ajjhaasaya.m anupavi.t.thaa hadaya.m aahacca ti.t.thanti, tena vuccanti sallaaiti. tattha kaamoghena raagasallo, bhavoghena dosasallo, di.t.thoghena maanasallo, avijjoghena mohasallo.

[03] tassa ^a^M0.0097^ea^ imehi catuuhi sallehi pariyaadinna.m {pariyaadi.n.na.m (ka0)} vi~n~naa.na.m catuusu dhammesu sa.n.thahati ruupe vedanaaya sa~n~naaya sa"nkhaaresu. tattha raagasallena nanduupasecanena vi~n~naa.nena ruupuupagaa ^a^P0.0117^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, dosasallena nanduupasecanena vi~n~naa.nena vedanuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, maanasallena nanduupasecanena ^a^V0.0096^ea^ vi~n~naa.nena sa~n~nuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, mohasallena nanduupasecanena vi~n~naa.nena sa"nkhaaruupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.

[03] tassa imaahi catuuhi vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiihi upatthaddha.m vi~n~naa.na.m catuuhi dhammehi agati.m gacchati chandaa dosaa bhayaa mohaa. tattha raagena chandaagati.m gacchati, dosena dosaagati.m gacchati, bhayena bhayaagati.m gacchati, mohena mohaagati.m gacchati. iti kho ta~nca kamma.m ime ca kilesaa, esa hetu sa.msaarassa, eva.m sabbe kilesaa catuuhi vipallaasehi niddisitabbaa.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ tattha imaa catasso disaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ``asubhe subha''nti vipallaaso, kaamupaadaana.m, kaamayogo, abhijjhaakaayagantho, kaamaasavo, kaamogho, raagasallo, ruupuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, chandaa agatigamananti pa.thamaa disaa.

[03] phasso aahaaro, ``dukkhe sukha''nti vipallaaso, bhavupaadaana.m, bhavayogo, byaapaadakaayagantho, bhavaasavo, bhavogho, dosasallo, vedanuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, dosaa agatigamananti dutiyaa disaa.

[03] vi~n~naa.naahaaro ``anicce nicca''nti vipallaaso, di.t.thupaadaana.m, di.t.thiyogo paraamaasakaayagantho, di.t.thaasavo, di.t.thogho, maanasallo, sa~n~nuupagaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti, bhayaa agatigamananti tatiyaa disaa.

[03] ``no ce, bhikkhave, ceteti, no ce pakappeti, atha ce anuseti. aaramma.nameta.m hoti vi~n~naa.nassa .thitiyaa, aaramma.ne sati pati.t.thaa vi~n~naa.nassa {tassa vi~n~naa.nassa (sii0 ka0) passa sa.m0 ni0 2.38} hoti, tasmi.m pati.t.thite vi~n~naa.ne viruu.lhe aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti hoti, aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbattiyaa sati aayati.m ^a^V0.0132^ea^ jaatijaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii''ti. aya.m sa.mkileso.

[03] ``yato ca kho, bhikkhave, no ceva {ca (sii0 ka0)} ceteti, no ca pakappeti, no ca anuseti. aaramma.nameta.m na hoti vi~n~naa.nassa .thitiyaa, aaramma.ne asati pati.t.thaa vi~n~naa.nassa na hoti, tasmi.m appati.t.thite vi~n~naa.ne aviruu.lhe aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti na hoti, aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbattiyaa asati aayati.m jaatijaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti, aya.m nibbedho. ida.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m.
[03] 108^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya~nca asekkhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m?

[03] ```samuddo samuddo'ti kho, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati, neso, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye samuddo, mahaa eso bhikkhave, udakaraasi mahaaudaka.n.navo. cakkhu, bhikkhave, purisassa samuddo, tassa ruupamayo vego. aya.m sa.mkileso.

[03] ``yo ^a^M0.0134^ea^ ta.m ruupamaya.m vega.m sahati aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atari {ataari (sii0 ka0) passa sa.m0 ni0 4.228} cakkhusamudda.m sauumi.m saava.t.ta.m sagaha.m {sagaaha.m (sa.m0 ni0 4.228)} sarakkhasa.m ^a^P0.0155^ea^ ti.n.no paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no''ti. aya.m asekkho.
[03] ```sota.m, bhikkhave...pe0... ghaana.m...pe0... jivhaa...pe0... kaayo...pe0... mano, bhikkhave, purisassa samuddo tassa dhammamayo vegoti. aya.m sa.mkileso.

[03] ``yo ta.m dhammamaya.m vega.m sahati, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atari manosamudda.m sauumi.m saava.t.ta.m sagaha.m sarakkhasa.m ti.n.no paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no''ti. aya.m asekkho. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato, athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``yo ima.m samudda.m sagaha.m sarakkhasa.m,
[27] sauumi.m saava.t.ta.m sabhaya.m duttara.m accatari.
[22] sa vedantaguu vusitabrahmacariyo, lokantaguu paaragatoti vuccatii''ti..

[03] ``chayime, bhikkhave, ba.lisaa lokasmi.m anayaaya sattaana.m byaabaadhaaya {vadhaaya (sa.m0 ni0 4.230)} paa.niina.m. katame cha? santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitaba.liso {gilaba.liso (sii0 ka0) passa sa.m0 ni0 4.230} maarassa anaya.m aapanno, byasana.m aapanno, yathaakaama.m kara.niiyo paapimato.

[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa...pe0... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa...pe0... manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ^a^P0.0156^ea^ ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitaba.liso maarassa anaya.m aapanno, byasana.m aapanno, yathaakaama.m kara.niiyo {yathaakaamakara.niiyo (sii0) sa.m0 ni0 4.230} paapimato''ti. aya.m sa.mkileso.

[03] ``santi ^a^M0.0135^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitaba.liso maarassa, abhedi ba.lisa.m, paribhedi ba.lisa.m, na anaya.m aapanno, na byasana.m aapanno, na yathaakaama.m kara.niiyo paapimato.

[03] ``santi ca, bhikkhave, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati, naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitaba.liso maarassa, abhedi ba.lisa.m, paribhedi ba.lisa.m, na anaya.m aapanno, na byasana.m aapanno, na yathaakaama.m kara.niiyo paapimato''ti. aya.m asekkho. ida.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya~nca asekkhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m.
[03] 109^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca asekkhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m?
[21] ``aya.m loko santaapajaato, phassapareto roga.m vadati attato {attano (sii0 ka0) passa udaa0 30}.
[22] yena yena hi ma~n~nati {ma~n~nanti (sii0 ka0)}, tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa..
[21] ``a~n~nathaabhaavii ^a^V0.0134^ea^ bhavasatto loko, bhavapareto bhavamevaabhinandati.
[27] yadabhinandati ta.m bhaya.m.
[22] yassa bhaayati ta.m dukkha''nti. aya.m sa.mkileso..
[22] ``bhavavippahaanaaya kho panida.m brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti. aya.m nibbedho.

[03] ``ye ^a^P0.0157^ea^ hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamaaha.msu, sabbe te `avippamuttaa bhavasmaa'ti vadaami. ye vaa pana keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa vibhavena bhavassa nissara.namaaha.msu, sabbe te `anissa.taa bhavasmaa'ti vadaami. upadhi.m {upadhi (sii0 ka0) passa udaa0 30} hi pa.ticca dukkhamida.m sambhotii''ti. aya.m sa.mkileso.
[03] ``sabbupaadaanakkhayaa ^a^M0.0136^ea^ natthi dukkhassa sambhavo''ti. aya.m nibbedho.

[03] ``lokamima.m passa, puthuu avijjaaya paretaa bhuutaa bhuutarataa, bhavaa aparimuttaa, ye hi keci bhavaa sabbadhi sabbatthataaya, sabbe te bhavaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa''ti. aya.m sa.mkileso.
[21] ``evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m, sammappa~n~naaya passato.
[27] bhavata.nhaa pahiiyati, vibhava.m naabhinandati.
[26] sabbaso ta.nhaana.m khayaa, asesaviraaganirodho nibbaana''nti.
[22] aya.m nibbedho..
[21] ``tassa nibbutassa bhikkhuno, anupaadaa punabbhavo na hoti.
[22] abhibhuuto maaro vijitasa"ngaamo, upaccagaa sabbabhavaani taadii''ti..
[03] aya.m asekkho. ida.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca asekkhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m.

[03] ``cattaarome, bhikkhave {passa a0 ni0 4.5}, puggalaa. katame cattaaro? anusotagaamii pa.tisotagaamii .thitatto ti.n.no paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no''ti. tattha yoya.m puggalo anusotagaamii, aya.m puggalo sa.mkilesabhaagiyo. tattha yoya.m puggalo pa.tisotagaamii yo ca .thitatto, ime dve puggalaa ^a^V0.0135^ea^ nibbedhabhaagiyaa. tattha ^a^P0.0158^ea^ yoya.m puggalo ti.n.no paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no, aya.m asekkho. ida.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca asekkhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m.
[03] 110^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya~nca vaasanaabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m?

[03] cha.laabhijaatiko atthi puggalo ka.nho ka.nhaabhijaatiko ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati, atthi puggalo ka.nho ka.nhaabhijaatiko sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati, atthi puggalo ka.nho ka.nhaabhijaatiko aka.nha.m asukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m accantadi.t.tha.m {anta.m ni.t.tha.m (sii0)} nibbaana.m aaraadheti, atthi ^a^M0.0137^ea^ puggalo sukko sukkaabhijaatiko ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati, atthi puggalo sukko sukkaabhijaatiko sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati, atthi puggalo sukko sukkaabhijaatiko aka.nha.m asukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m accantadi.t.tha.m nibbaana.m aaraadheti.
[03] tattha yo ca puggalo ka.nho ka.nhaabhijaatiko ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati, yo ca puggalo sukko sukkaabhijaatiko ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati, ime dve puggalaa sa.mkilesabhaagiyaa.
[03] tattha yo ca puggalo ka.nho ka.nhaabhijaatiko sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati, yo ca puggalo sukko sukkaabhijaatiko sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati, ime dve puggalaa vaasanaabhaagiyaa.

[03] tattha yo ca puggalo ka.nho ka.nhaabhijaatiko aka.nha.m asukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m accantadi.t.tha.m nibbaana.m aaraadheti, yo ca puggalo sukko sukkaabhijaatiko aka.nha.m asukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m accantadi.t.tha.m nibbaana.m aaraadheti, ime dve puggalaa nibbedhabhaagiyaa, ida.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya~nca vaasanaabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m.

[03] ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave {passa a0 ni0 4.232-233}, kammaani. katamaani cattaari? atthi ^a^P0.0159^ea^ kamma.m ka.nha.m ka.nhavipaaka.m, atthi kamma.m sukka.m sukkavipaaka.m, atthi kamma.m ka.nhasukka.m ka.nhasukkavipaaka.m, atthi kamma.m aka.nha.m asukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m kammuttama.m kammase.t.tha.m kammakkhayaaya sa.mvattati''.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0136^ea^ ya~nca kamma.m ka.nha.m ka.nhavipaaka.m, ya~nca kamma.m ka.nhasukka.m ka.nhasukkavipaaka.m, aya.m sa.mkileso. ya~nca kamma.m sukka.m sukkavipaaka.m, aya.m vaasanaa. ya~nca kamma.m aka.nha.m asukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m kammuttama.m kammase.t.tha.m kammakkhayaaya sa.mvattati, aya.m nibbedho. ida.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya~nca vaasanaabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m.
[03] 111^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vaasanaabhaagiya~nca, nibbedhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m?
[21] ``laddhaana maanusatta.m dve, kicca.m akiccameva ca.
[22] sukicca.m ceva pu~n~naani, sa.myojanavippahaana.m vaa''ti..

[22] sa.myojanappahaanaa, jaraamara.naa vippamuccantii''ti..

[03] ``pu~n~naani karitvaana, saggaa sagga.m vajanti katapu~n~naa''ti vaasanaa. ``sa.myojanappahaanaa jaraamara.naa vippamuccantii''ti nibbedho. ida.m vaasanaabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m.

[03] ``dvemaani, bhikkhave, padhaanaani {passa a0 ni0 2.2}. katamaani dve? yo ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitesu ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m pariccajati, yo ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitesu sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana''nti. tattha ^a^P0.0160^ea^ yo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitesu ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m pariccajati, aya.m vaasanaa.
[03] yo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitesu sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m, aya.m nibbedho. ida.m vaasanaabhaagiya~nca nibbedhabhaagiya~nca sutta.m.

[03] tattha ta.nhaasa.mkilesabhaagiya.m sutta.m ta.nhaapakkheneva niddisitabba.m tiihi ta.nhaahi -- kaamata.nhaaya bhavata.nhaaya vibhavata.nhaaya. yena yena vaa pana vatthunaa ajjhositaa, tena teneva niddisitabba.m, tassaa vitthaaro chatti.msata.nhaajaaliniyaavicaritaani.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0137^ea^ di.t.thisa.mkilesabhaagiya.m sutta.m di.t.thipakkheneva niddisitabba.m ucchedasassatena, yena yena vaa pana vatthunaa di.t.thivasena abhinivisati ``idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti, tena teneva niddisitabba.m, tassaa vitthaaro dvaasa.t.thidi.t.thigataani.

[03] tattha duccaritasa.mkilesabhaagiya.m sutta.m cetanaaya cetasikakammena niddisitabba.m tiihi duccaritehi -- kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, tassa vitthaaro dasaakusalakammapathaa.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0139^ea^ ta.nhaavodaanabhaagiya.m sutta.m samathena niddisitabba.m, di.t.thivodaanabhaagiya.m sutta.m vipassanaa niddisitabba.m, duccaritavodaanabhaagiya.m sutta.m sucaritena niddisitabba.m. tii.ni akusalamuulaani. ta.m kissa hetu? sa.msaarassa nibbattiyaa. tathaa nibbatte sa.msaare kaayaduccarita.m kaayasucarita.m vaciiduccarita.m vaciisucarita.m manoduccarita.m manosucarita.m iminaa asubhena kammavipaakena ida.m baalalakkha.na.m nibbattatiiti. ida.m ^a^P0.0161^ea^ sa.mkilesabhaagiya.m sutta.m.
[03] iminaa subhena kammavipaakena ida.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m nibbattatiiti. ida.m vaasanaabhaagiya.m sutta.m.

[03] tattha sa.mkilesabhaagiya.m sutta.m catuuhi kilesabhuumiihi niddisitabba.m -- anusayabhuumiyaa pariyu.t.thaanabhuumiyaa sa.myojanabhuumiyaa upaadaanabhuumiyaa. saanusayassa pariyu.t.thaana.m jaayati, pariyu.t.thito sa.myujjati, sa.myujjanto upaadiyati, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. imaahi catuuhi kilesabhuumiihi sabbe kilesaa sa"ngaha.m samosara.na.m gacchanti, ida.m sa.mkilesabhaagiya.m sutta.m.

[03] vaasanaabhaagiya.m sutta.m tiihi sucaritehi niddisitabba.m, nibbedhabhaagiya.m sutta.m catuuhi saccehi niddisitabba.m, asekkhabhaagiya.m sutta.m tiihi dhammehi niddisitabba.m -- buddhadhammehi paccekabuddhadhammehi saavakabhuumiyaa. jhaayivisaye niddisitabbanti.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ tattha katame a.t.thaarasa muulapadaa? lokiya.m lokuttara.m lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca, sattaadhi.t.thaana.m dhammaadhi.t.thaana.m sattaadhi.t.thaana~nca dhammaadhi.t.thaana~nca, ~naa.na.m ~neyya.m ~naa.na~nca ~neyya~nca, dassana.m ^a^V0.0138^ea^ bhaavanaa dassana~nca bhaavanaa ca, sakavacana.m paravacana.m sakavacana~nca paravacana~nca, visajjaniiya.m avisajjaniiya.m visajjaniiya~nca avisajjaniiya~nca, kamma.m vipaako kamma~nca vipaako ca, kusala.m akusala.m kusala~nca akusala~nca, anu~n~naata.m pa.tikkhitta.m anu~n~naata~nca pa.tikkhitta~nca, thavo caati.
