[03] tattha katama.m lokuttara.m?
[21] ``yassindriyaani samatha"ngataani {samatha.m gataani (sii0) passa dha0 pa0 94}. assaa yathaa saarathinaa sudantaa.
[22] pahiinamaanassa anaasavassa, devaapi tassa pihayanti taadino''ti..
[06] ida.m lokuttara.m.

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani lokuttaraani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani lokuttaraanii''ti. ida.m lokuttara.m.
[03] tattha katama.m lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca?

[03] ``laddhaana maanusatta.m dve, kicca.m akiccameva caa''ti dve gaathaa. ya.m iha ``sukicca.m ceva ^a^V0.0139^ea^ pu~n~naanii''ti ca ``pu~n~naani karitvaana, saggaa sagga.m vajanti katapu~n~naa''ti ca. ida.m lokiya.m.
[03] ya.m iha ``sa.myojanavippahaana.m vaa''ti ca ``sa.myojanappahaanaa, jaraamara.naa vippamuccantii''ti ca, ida.m lokuttara.m. ida.m lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca.

[03] ``vi~n~naa.ne ^a^P0.0163^ea^ ^a^M0.0141^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, aahaare sati naamaruupassa avakkanti hoti, naamaruupassa avakkantiyaa sati punabbhavo hoti, punabbhave sati jaati hoti, jaatiyaa sati jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave {passa sa.m0 ni0 2.55}, mahaarukkho, tassa yaani ceva muulaani adhogamaani yaani ca tiriya.m gamaani, sabbaani taani uddha.m oja.m abhiharanti. eva.m hi so, bhikkhave, mahaarukkho tadaahaaro tadupaadaano cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.theyya. evameva kho, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne aahaare sati naamaruupassa avakkanti hoti sabba.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii''ti. ida.m lokiya.m.

[03] ``vi~n~naa.ne ce, bhikkhave, aahaare asati naamaruupassa avakkanti na hoti, naamaruupassa avakkantiyaa asati punabbhavo na hoti, punabbhave asati jaati na hoti, jaatiyaa asati jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahaarukkho atha puriso aagaccheyya kuddaalapi.taka.m {kudaalapi.taka.m (ka0)} aadaaya, so ta.m rukkha.m muule chindeyya, muule {muula.m (sa.m0 ni0 2.55)} chetvaa palikha.neyya, palikha.nitvaa muulaani uddhareyya antamaso usiiranaa.limattaanipi. so ta.m rukkha.m kha.n.daakha.n.dika.m chindeyya, kha.n.daakha.n.dika.m chinditvaa {chitvaa (sii0 ka0)} phaaleyya, phaaletvaa sakalika.m sakalika.m kareyya, sakalika.m sakalika.m karitvaa vaataatape visoseyya, vaataatape visosetvaa agginaa .daheyya, agginaa .dahetvaa masi.m kareyya, masi.m karitvaa mahaavaate vaa ophuneyya, nadiyaa vaa siighasotaaya pavaaheyya, eva.m hi so, bhikkhave, mahaarukkho ucchinnamuulo assa taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato {anabhaava.mgato (sii0)} aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. evameva kho, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne aahaare asati naamaruupassa ^a^P0.0164^ea^ avakkanti na hoti, naamaruupassa avakkantiyaa asati sabba.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti. ida.m lokuttara.m. ida.m lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca.
[03] 113^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0140^ea^ ^a^M0.0142^ea^ katama.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m?
[21] ``sabbaa disaa anuparigamma cetasaa, nevajjhagaa piyataramattanaa kvaci.
[22] eva.m piyo puthu attaa paresa.m, tasmaa na hi.mse paramattakaamo''ti {para.m attakaamoti (sii0) sa.m0 ni0 1.119; udaa0 41 passitabba.m}..
[06] ida.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m.
[21] ``ye keci bhuutaa bhavissanti ye vaapi {ca (sii0 ka0) passa udaa0 42}, sabbe gamissanti pahaaya deha.m.
[22] ta.m sabbajaani.m kusalo viditvaa, aataapiyo {aataapii so (sii0 ka0) passa udaa0 42} brahmacariya.m careyyaa''ti..
[06] ida.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m.

[03] ``sattahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagata.m kalyaa.namitta.m api viveciyamaanena pa.naamiyamaanena gale pisanamajjamaanena {galepi pamajjamaanena (sii0)} yaavajiiva.m na vijahitabba.m. katamehi sattahi? piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca vattaa ca vacanakkhamo ca gambhiira~nca katha.m kattaa hoti, no ca a.t.thaane {na ca a.t.thaane (sii0 ka0) passa a0 ni0 7.37} niyojeti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi...pe0... na vijahitabba.m. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato. athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``piyo garu bhaavaniiyo, vattaa ca vacanakkhamo.
[27] gambhiira~nca katha.m kattaa, na ca.t.thaane niyojako.
[22] ta.m mitta.m mittakaamena, yaavajiivampi seviya''nti..
[06] ida.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m.
[03] tattha ^a^P0.0165^ea^ katama.m dhammaadhi.t.thaana.m?
[21] ``ya~nca kaamasukha.m loke, ya~ncida.m diviya.m sukha.m.
[22] ta.nhakkhayasukhassete {ta.nhakkhayaa sukhassete (sii0) passa udaa0 12}, kala.m naagghanti so.lasi''nti..
[06] ida.m dhammaadhi.t.thaana.m.
[21] ``susukha.m ^a^M0.0143^ea^ {passa theragaa0 227} vata nibbaana.m, sammaasambuddhadesita.m.
[22] asoka.m viraja.m khema.m, yattha dukkha.m nirujjhatii''ti..
[06] ida.m dhammaadhi.t.thaana.m.
[03] tattha ^a^V0.0141^ea^ katama.m sattaadhi.t.thaana~nca dhammaadhi.t.thaana~nca
[21] ``maatara.m pitara.m hantvaa, raajaano dve ca khattiye.
[22] ra.t.tha.m saanucara.m hantvaa''ti ida.m dhammaadhi.t.thaana.m..
[21] ``aniigho yaati braahma.no''ti. ida.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m.
[22] ida.m sattaadhi.t.thaana~nca dhammaadhi.t.thaana~nca..

[03] ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, iddhipaadaa {passa iddhipaadasa.myutte}. katame cattaaro? chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato iddhipaado, viiriya...pe0... citta. viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato iddhipaado''ti. ida.m dhammaadhi.t.thaana.m.

[03] so kaayepi citta.m samodahati, cittepi kaaya.m samodahati, kaaye sukhasa~n~na~nca lahusa~n~na~nca okkamitvaa upasampajja viharati. ida.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m, ida.m sattaadhi.t.thaana~nca dhammaadhi.t.thaana~nca.
[03] 114^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m ~naa.na.m?
[21] ``ya.m ta.m lokuttara.m ~naa.na.m, sabba~n~nuu yena vuccati.
[22] na tassa parihaanatthi, sabbakaale pavattatii''ti..
[06] ida.m ~naa.na.m.
[21] ``pa~n~naa ^a^P0.0166^ea^ hi se.t.thaa lokasmi.m, yaaya.m nibbaanagaaminii {nibbedhagaaminii (itivu0 41)}.

[21] ``kittayissaami ^a^V0.0142^ea^ te {vo (sii0 ka0) passa su0 ni0 1072} santi.m, [dhotakaati bhagavaa,]
[27] di.t.the dhamme aniitiha.m.
[22] ya.m viditvaa sato cara.m, tare loke visattika.m..
[21] ``ta~ncaaha.m ^a^M0.0144^ea^ abhinandaami, mahesi santimuttama.m.
[22] ya.m viditvaa sato cara.m, tare loke visattika.m..
[21] ``ya.m ki~nci sampajaanaasi, [dhotakaati bhagavaa]
[27] uddha.m adho tiriya~ncaapi majjhe.
[26] eta.m viditvaa sa"ngoti loke,
[22] bhavaabhavaaya maakaasi ta.nha''nti..
[06] ida.m ~neyya.m.

[03] ``catunna.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaccaana.m ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca...pe0... tayida.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m, dukkhasamudaya.m {dukkhasamudayo (sii0 ka0) passa dii0 ni0 2.155} ariyasacca.m anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m, dukkhanirodha.m {dukkhanirodho (sii0 ka0)} ariyasacca.m anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m. ucchinnaa bhavata.nhaa, khii.naa bhavanetti, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato, athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m, yathaabhuuta.m adassanaa.
[22] sa.msita.m {sa.msarita.m (sii0)} diighamaddhaana.m, taasu taasveva jaatisu..
[21] ``taani etaani di.t.thaani, bhavanetti samuuhataa.
[22] ucchinna.m muula.m dukkhassa, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti..
[06] ida.m ^a^P0.0167^ea^ ~neyya.m.
[03] tattha katama.m ~naa.na~nca ~neyya~nca? ruupa.m anicca.m, vedanaa aniccaa, sa~n~naa aniccaa, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, vi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti. ida.m ~neyya.m.

[03] eva.m ^a^V0.0143^ea^ jaana.m eva.m passa.m ariyasaavako ``ruupa.m anicca''nti passati, ``vedanaa aniccaa''ti passati, ``sa~n~na.m...pe0... sa"nkhaare...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m anicca''nti passatiiti. ida.m ~naa.na.m.
[03] so parimuccati ruupena, parimuccati vedanaaya, parimuccati sa~n~naaya, parimuccati sa"nkhaarehi, parimuccati vi~n~naa.namhaa, parimuccati dukkhasmaati vadaamiiti. ida.m ~naa.na~nca ~neyya~nca.
[03] ``sabbe ^a^M0.0145^ea^ sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa''ti ida.m ~neyya.m. ``yadaa pa~n~naaya passatii''ti ida.m ~naa.na.m. ``atha nibbindati dukkhe esa maggo visuddhiyaa''ti ida.m ~naa.na~nca ~neyya~nca.
[03] ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa''ti ida.m ~neyya.m. ``yadaa pa~n~naaya passatii''ti ida.m ~naa.na.m. ``atha nibbindati dukkhe esa maggo visuddhiyaa''ti ida.m ~naa.na~nca ~neyya~nca.
[03] ``sabbe dhammaa anattaa''ti ida.m ~neyya.m. ``yadaa pa~n~naaya passatii''ti ida.m ~naa.na.m. ``atha nibbindati dukkhe esa maggo visuddhiyaa''ti ida.m ~naa.na~nca ~neyya~nca.

[03] ``ye ^a^P0.0168^ea^ hi keci, so.na {passa sa.m0 ni0 3.49}, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa aniccena ruupena dukkhena vipari.naamadhammena `seyyohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti, `sadisohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti, `hiinohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti. kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa adassanaa. aniccaaya vedanaaya...pe0... aniccaaya sa~n~naaya...pe0... aniccehi sa"nkhaarehi...pe0... aniccena vi~n~naa.nena dukkhena vipari.naamadhammena `seyyohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti, `sadisohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti, `hiinohamasmii'ti vaa samanupassanti, kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa adassanaa''ti. ida.m ~neyya.m.

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, so.na, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa aniccena ruupena dukkhena vipari.naamadhammena `seyyohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti, `sadisohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti, `hiinohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti, kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa dassanaa. aniccaaya vedanaaya...pe0... aniccaaya sa~n~naaya...pe0... aniccehi sa"nkhaarehi...pe0... aniccena vi~n~naa.nena dukkhena vipari.naamadhammena `seyyohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti, `sadisohamasmii'tipi ^a^V0.0144^ea^ na samanupassanti, `hiinohamasmii'tipi na samanupassanti, kima~n~natra yathaabhuutassa dassanaati. ida.m ~naa.na.m.
[06] ida.m ~naa.na~nca ~neyya~nca.

[24] ``ye ariyasaccaani vibhaavayanti, gambhiirapa~n~nena sudesitaani.
[22] ki~ncaapi te honti bhusa.m pamattaa {bhusappamattaa (sii0) passa khu0 paa0 609}, na te bhava.m a.t.thamamaadiyantii''ti..
[06] ida.m dassana.m.
[21] ``yathindakhiilo ^a^M0.0146^ea^ pathavissito siyaa, catubbhi vaatehi asampakampiyo.
[22] tathuupama.m ^a^P0.0169^ea^ sappurisa.m vadaami, yo ariyasaccaani avecca passatii''ti..
[06] ida.m dassana.m.

[03] ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, sotaapattiya"ngehi samannaagato ariyasaavako aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya `khii.nanirayomhi, khii.natiracchaanayoni, khii.napettivisayo, khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no, sattakkhattuparama.m {sattakkhattuparamo (sii0)} deve ca manusse ca sandhaavitvaa sa.msaritvaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'ti. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa tathaagate saddhaa nivi.t.thaa pati.t.thitaa viruu.lhaa muulajaataa asa.mhaariyaa sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m saha dhammena, dhamme kho pana ni.t.tha.m gato hoti, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhi, yadida.m madanimmadano...pe0... nirodho nibbaana.m, saha dhammiyaa kho panassa honti i.t.thaa kantaa piyaa manaapaa gihii ceva pabbajitaa ca. ariyakantehi kho pana siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammaasehi bhujissehi vi~n~nuppasa.t.thehi aparaama.t.thehi samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi sotaapattiya"ngehi samannaagato ariyasaavako aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya `khii.nanirayomhi, khii.natiracchaanayoni, khii.napettivisayo, khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo ^a^V0.0145^ea^ niyato sambodhiparaaya.no, sattakkhattuparama.m deve ca manusse ca sandhaavitvaa sa.msaritvaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'''ti.
[06] ida.m ^a^P0.0170^ea^ dassana.m.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0147^ea^ katamaa bhaavanaa?
[21] ``yassindriyaani bhaavitaani {subhaavitaani (sii0 ka0) passa su0 ni0 512}, ajjhatta.m bahiddhaa ca sabbaloke.
[22] nibbijjha ima.m para~nca loka.m, kaala.m ka"nkhati bhaavito sadanto''ti..
[06] aya.m bhaavanaa.

[03] ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, dhammapadaani {passa a0 ni0 4.29}. katamaani cattaari? anabhijjhaa dhammapada.m, abyaapaado dhammapada.m, sammaasati dhammapada.m, sammaasamaadhi dhammapada.m, imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari dhammapadaanii''ti. aya.m bhaavanaa.

[03] tattha katama.m dassana~nca bhaavanaa ca? ``pa~nca chinde pa~nca jahe''ti ida.m dassana.m. ``pa~nca cuttari bhaavaye. pa~nca sa"ngaatigo bhikkhu, oghati.n.noti vuccatii''ti aya.m bhaavanaa. ida.m dassana~nca bhaavanaa ca.

[03] ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani {passa sa.m0 ni0 5.493}. katamaani tii.ni, ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m a~n~nindriya.m a~n~naataavindriya.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anabhisametassa dukkhassa ariyasaccassa abhisamayaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, anabhisametassa dukkhasamudayassa ^a^P0.0171^ea^ ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa abhisamayaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ida.m, bhikkhave, ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya''nti. ida.m dassana.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, a~n~nindriya.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ida.m, bhikkhave, a~n~nindriya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^V0.0146^ea^, bhikkhave, a~n~naataavindriya.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati, khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m ^a^M0.0148^ea^ naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati. ida.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naataavindriya''nti. aya.m bhaavanaa.
[03] ida.m dassana~nca bhaavanaa ca.
[03] 116^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m sakavacana.m?
[21] ``sabbapaapassa akara.na.m, kusalassa upasampadaa.
[22] sacittapariyodaapana.m, eta.m buddhaana saasana''nti..
[06] ida.m sakavacana.m.

[03] ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, baalassa baalalakkha.naani baalanimittaani baalaapadaanaani, yehi baala.m baaloti pare sa~njaananti. katamaani tii.ni? baalo, bhikkhave, duccintitacintii ca hoti, dubbhaasitabhaasii ca hoti, dukka.takammakaarii {dukkatakammakaarii (sii0) ma0 ni0 3.246; a0 ni0 3.3 passitabba.m} ca hoti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni baalassa baalalakkha.naani baalanimittaani baalaapadaanaani.

[03] ``tii.nimaani ^a^P0.0172^ea^, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditassa pa.n.ditalakkha.naani pa.n.ditanimittaani pa.n.ditaapadaanaani, yehi pa.n.dita.m pa.n.ditoti pare sa~njaananti. katamaani tii.ni? pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, sucintitacintii ca hoti, subhaasitabhaasii ca hoti, sukatakammakaarii ca hoti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni pa.n.ditassa pa.n.ditalakkha.naani pa.n.ditanimittaani pa.n.ditaapadaanaanii''ti.
[06] ida.m sakavacana.m.
[03] tattha katama.m paravacana.m?
[21] ``pathaviisamo natthi vitthato, ninno paataalasamo na vijjati.
[22] merusamo natthi unnato, cakkavattisadiso natthi poriso''ti..
[06] ida.m paravacana.m.
[03] ```hotu ^a^V0.0147^ea^, devaanaminda, subhaasitena jayoti. hotu, vepacitti subhaasitena jayoti. bha.na, vepacitti, gaatha'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``bhiyyo ^a^M0.0149^ea^ baalaa pabhijjeyyu.m {pakujjheyyu.m (sii0 ka0) passa sa.m0 ni0 1.251}, no cassa pa.tisedhako.
[22] tasmaa bhusena da.n.dena, dhiiro baala.m nisedhaye''ti..

[03] ``bhaasitaaya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinaa asurindena gaathaaya asuraa anumodi.msu, devaa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca `bha.na, devaanaminda, gaatha'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``etadeva aha.m ma~n~ne, baalassa pa.tisedhana.m.
[22] para.m sa"nkupita.m ~natvaa, yo sato upasammatii''ti..

[03] ``bhaasitaaya kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devaanamindena gaathaaya devaa anumodi.msu, asuraa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo vepacitti.m asurinda.m etadavoca `bha.na, vepacitti, gaatha'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``etadeva ^a^P0.0173^ea^ titikkhaaya, vajja.m passaami vaasava.
[27] yadaa na.m ma~n~nati {ma~n~natii (sii0) passa sa.m0 ni0 1.251} baalo, bhayaa myaaya.m titikkhati.
[22] ajjhaaruhati dummedho, gova bhiyyo palaayina''nti..

[03] ``bhaasitaaya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinaa asurindena gaathaaya asuraa anumodi.msu, devaa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho vepacitti asurindo sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca `bha.na, devaanaminda, gaatha'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``kaama.m ma~n~natu vaa maa vaa, bhayaa myaaya.m titikkhati.
[22] sadatthaparamaa atthaa, khantaa bhiyyo na vijjati..
[21] ``yo ^a^V0.0148^ea^ have balavaa santo, dubbalassa titikkhati.
[22] tamaahu parama.m khanti.m, nicca.m khamati dubbalo..
[21] ``abala.m ta.m bala.m aahu, yassa baalabala.m bala.m.
[22] balassa dhammaguttassa, pa.tivattaa na vijjati..

[03] ye ca kho te ubho ante abhi~n~naaya tatra ca na ahesu.m, tena ca ama~n~ni.msu, va.t.ta.m tesa.m natthi pa~n~naapanaayaati. ida.m sakavacana.m. aya.m udaano sakavacana~nca paravacana~nca.

[03] raajaa pasenadi {passenadi (ka0) passa sa.m0 ni0 1.113} kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa ^a^V0.0149^ea^ eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi ``kesa.m nu kho piyo attaa, kesa.m appiyo attaa''ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi ``ye ca kho keci kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti, tesa.m appiyo attaa. ki~ncaapi te eva.m vadeyyu.m `piyo no attaa'ti, atha kho tesa.m appiyo attaa. ta.m kissa hetu? ya.m hi appiyo appiyassa kareyya, ta.m te attanaava attano karonti, tasmaa tesa.m appiyo attaa. ye ca kho keci kaayena sucarita.m caranti, vaacaaya sucarita.m caranti, manasaa sucarita.m caranti, tesa.m piyo attaa. ki~ncaapi te eva.m vadeyyu.m `appiyo no attaa'ti, atha kho tesa.m piyo attaa. ta.m kissa hetu? ya.m hi piyo piyassa kareyya ^a^M0.0151^ea^. ta.m te attanaava attano karonti. tasmaa tesa.m piyo attaa''ti.

[21] ``attaana~nce piya.m ja~n~naa, na na.m paapena sa.myuje.

[03] buddhavisayo avisajjaniiyo. puggalaparopara~n~nutaa avisajjaniiyaa. ``pubbaa, bhikkhave, ko.ti ^a^V0.0151^ea^ na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m saki.m niraya.m saki.m tiracchaanayoni.m saki.m pettivisaya.m saki.m asurayoni.m saki.m deve saki.m manusse sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m''. katamaa pubbaa ko.tiiti avisajjaniiya.m. na pa~n~naayatiiti saavakaana.m ~naa.navekallena. duvidhaa buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m desanaa attuupanaayikaa ca paruupanaayikaa ca. na pa~n~naayatiiti paruupanaayikaa. natthi buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m avijaananaati {appajaananaati (sii0)} attuupanaayikaa. yathaa bhagavaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m evamaaha --

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P0.0177^ea^ ^a^M0.0153^ea^, bhikkhu, viisatikhaariko kosalako tilavaaho...pe0... na tveva eko abbudo nirayo. seyyathaapi bhikkhu, viisati abbudaa nirayaa, evameko nirabbudo nirayo {nirabbudanirayo (sa.m0 ni0 1.181)}. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati nirabbudaa nirayaa, evameko ababo nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati ababaa nirayaa, evameko a.ta.to nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati a.ta.taa nirayaa, evameko ahaho nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati ahahaa nirayaa, evameko kumudo nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati kumudaa nirayaa, evameko sogandhiko nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati sogandhikaa nirayaa, evameko uppalako nirayo {uppalanirayo (sa.m0 ni0 1.181)}. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati uppalakaa nirayaa, evameko pu.n.dariiko nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati pu.n.dariikaa nirayaa, evameko padumo nirayo. padume pana, bhikkhu, niraye kokaaliko bhikkhu upapanno saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m aaghaatetvaa''ti. ya.m vaa pana ki~nci bhagavaa aaha ``aya.m appameyyo asa"nkhyeyo''ti. sabba.m ta.m avisajjaniiya.m. ida.m avisajjaniiya.m.
[03] 119^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m visajjaniiya~nca avisajjaniiya~nca, yadaa so upako aajiivako bhagavanta.m aaha ``kuhi.m, aavuso gotama, gamissasii''ti. bhagavaa aaha --
[21] ``baaraa.nasi.m gamissaami, aha.m ta.m amatadundubhi.m.
[22] dhammacakka.m pavattetu.m, loke appa.tivattiya''nti..
[03] upako aajiivako aaha ```jino'ti kho aavuso, bho gotama, pa.tijaanaasii''ti. bhagavaa aaha --

[22] jitaa me paapakaa dhammaa, tasmaaha.m upakaa jino''ti..

[03] katha.m jino kena jinoti visajjaniiya.m. katamo jinoti avisajjaniiya.m. katamo aasavakkhayo, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti visajjaniiya.m. kittako aasavakkhayoti avisajjaniiya.m. ida.m ^a^P0.0178^ea^ visajjaniiya~nca avisajjaniiya~nca.

[03] atthi ^a^M0.0154^ea^ tathaagatoti visajjaniiya.m. atthi ruupanti visajjaniiya.m. ruupa.m tathaagatoti avisajjaniiya.m. ruupavaa tathaagatoti avisajjaniiya.m. ruupe tathaagatoti avisajjaniiya.m. tathaagate ruupanti avisajjaniiya.m. eva.m atthi vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0... sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... atthi vi~n~naa.nanti visajjaniiya.m. vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatoti avisajjaniiya.m. vi~n~naa.navaa tathaagatoti avisajjaniiya.m. vi~n~naa.ne tathaagatoti avisajjaniiya.m. tathaagate vi~n~naa.nanti avisajjaniiya.m. a~n~natra ruupena tathaagatoti avisajjaniiya.m. a~n~natra vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya...pe0... sa"nkhaarehi...pe0... vi~n~naa.nena tathaagatoti avisajjaniiya.m. aya.m so tathaagato aruupako...pe0... avedanako...pe0... asa~n~nako...pe0... asa"nkhaarako...pe0... avi~n~naa.nakoti avisajjaniiya.m. ida.m visajjaniiya~nca avisajjaniiya~nca.

[03] passati bhagavaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte cavamaane upapajjamaane eva.m sabba.m...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaatiiti visajjaniiya.m. katame sattaa, katamo tathaagatoti avisajjaniiya.m. ida.m visajjaniiya~nca avisajjaniiya~nca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, baala.m pii.thasamaaruu.lha.m vaa ma~ncasamaaruu.lha.m ^a^P0.0179^ea^ vaa chamaaya.m {chamaaya (sii0 ka0) passa ma0 ni0 3.248} vaa semaana.m yaanissa pubbe paapakaani kammaani kataani kaayena duccaritaani vaacaaya duccaritaani manasaa duccaritaani, taanissa tamhi samaye olambanti ajjholambanti ^a^M0.0155^ea^ abhippalambanti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahata.m pabbatakuu.taana.m chaayaa saayanhasamaya.m pathaviya.m olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, baala.m pii.thasamaaruu.lha.m vaa ma~ncasamaaruu.lha.m vaa chamaaya.m vaa semaana.m yaanissa pubbe paapakaani kammaani kataani kaayena duccaritaani vaacaaya duccaritaani manasaa duccaritaani, taanissa tamhi samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti. tatra, bhikkhave, baalassa eva.m hoti `akata.m vata me kalyaa.na.m, akata.m kusala.m, akata.m bhiiruttaa.na.m. kata.m paapa.m, kata.m ludda.m, kata.m kibbisa.m, yaavataa bho akatakalyaa.naana.m akatakusalaana.m akatabhiiruttaa.naana.m katapaapaana.m kataluddaana.m katakibbisaana.m gati, ta.m gati.m pecca gacchaamii'ti, so socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjatii''ti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, pa.n.dita.m pii.thasamaaruu.lha.m vaa ma~ncasamaaruu.lha.m vaa chamaaya.m vaa semaana.m yaanissa pubbe kalyaa.naani kammaani kataani kaayena sucaritaani vaacaaya sucaritaani manasaa sucaritaani, taanissa tamhi samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahata.m pabbatakuu.taana.m chaayaa saayanhasamaya.m pathaviya.m olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa.n.dita.m pii.thasamaaruu.lha.m vaa ma~ncasamaaruu.lha.m vaa chamaaya.m vaa semaana.m yaanissa pubbe kalyaa.naani kammaani kataani kaayena sucaritaani vaacaaya sucaritaani manasaa sucaritaani, taanissa tamhi samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti. tatra, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditassa `eva.m hoti akata.m vata me paapa.m ^a^V0.0154^ea^, akata.m ludda.m, akata.m kibbisa.m. kata.m kalyaa.na.m, kata.m kusala.m, kata.m bhiiruttaa.na.m, yaavataa bho akatapaapaana.m ^a^P0.0180^ea^ akataluddaana.m akatakibbisaana.m katakalyaa.naana.m katakusalaana.m katabhiiruttaa.naana.m gati, ta.m gati.m pecca gacchaamii'ti, so na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjati, `kata.m me pu~n~na.m, akata.m paapa.m, yaa bhavissati gati akatapaapassa akataluddassa akatakibbisassa katapu~n~nassa katakusalassa katabhiiruttaa.nassa, ta.m pecca bhave gati.m paccanubhavissaamii'ti vippa.tisaaro na jaayati. avippa.tisaarino kho, bhikkhave, itthiyaa vaa purisassa vaa gihino vaa pabbajitassa vaa bhaddaka.m mara.na.m bhaddikaa kaala"nkiriyaati vadaamii''ti. ida.m kamma.m.

[03] ``tii.nimaani ^a^M0.0156^ea^, bhikkhave, duccaritaani. katamaani tii.ni, kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni duccaritaani. tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, sucaritaani. katamaani tii.ni? kaayasucarita.m vaciisucarita.m manosucarita.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni sucaritaani. ida.m kamma.m.

[21] ``sa.t.thivassasahassaani, paripu.n.naani sabbaso.
[22] niraye paccamaanaana.m {paccamaanassa (ka0) passa pe0 va0 802}, kadaa anto bhavissati..

[22] tadaa hi pakata.m paapa.m, tuyha.m mayha~nca maarisaa''ti..

[03] ``maa, bhikkhave, pu~n~naana.m bhaayittha, sukhasseta.m, bhikkhave, adhivacana.m i.t.thassa kantassa piyassa manaapassa yadida.m ^a^P0.0182^ea^ pu~n~naani. abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, diigharatta.m kataana.m pu~n~naana.m i.t.tha.m {diigharatta.m i.t.tha.m (sii0 ka0) passa itivu0 22} kanta.m piya.m manaapa.m vipaaka.m paccanubhuuta.m, satta vassaani mettacitta.m bhaavetvaa satta sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe na ima.m {na yima.m (itivu0 22)} loka.m punaraagamaasi.m. sa.mva.t.tamaane sudaaha.m, bhikkhave, kappe aabhassaruupago homi. viva.t.tamaane kappe su~n~na.m brahmavimaana.m upapajjaami. tatra sudaaha.m {suda.m (itivu0 22)}, bhikkhave, brahmaa homi mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii. chatti.msakkhattu.m kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, sakko ahosi.m devaanamindo, anekasatakkhattu.m raajaa ahosi.m cakkavattii {cakkavatti (ka0)} dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato, ko pana vaado padesarajjassa? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi `kissa nu kho me ida.m kammassa ^a^V0.0156^ea^ phala.m, kissa kammassa vipaako, yenaaha.m etarahi eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi `ti.n.na.m kho me ida.m kammaana.m phala.m, ti.n.na.m kammaana.m vipaako. yenaaha.m etarahi eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo'ti. seyyathida.m, daanassa damassa sa.myamassaa''ti. tattha ya~nca daana.m yo ca damo yo ca sa.myamo, ida.m kamma.m. yo tappaccayaa vipaako paccanubhuuto, aya.m vipaako. tathaa cuu.lakammavibha"ngo vattabbo.

[03] ya.m ^a^M0.0158^ea^ subhassa maa.navassa todeyyaputtassa desita.m. tattha ye dhammaa appaayukadiighaayukataaya sa.mvattanti bahvaabaadhaappaabaadhataaya appesakkhamahesakkhataaya dubba.n.nasuva.n.nataaya niicakulikauccakulikataaya appabhogamahaabhogataaya duppa~n~napa~n~navantataaya ca ^a^P0.0183^ea^ sa.mvattanti, ida.m kamma.m. yaa tattha appaayukadiighaayukataa...pe0... duppa~n~napa~n~navantataa, aya.m vipaako. ida.m kamma~nca vipaako ca.

[03] tattha lokiya.m sutta.m dviihi suttehi niddisitabba.m sa.mkilesabhaagiyena ca vaasanaabhaagiyena ca. lokuttara.mpi sutta.m tiihi suttehi niddisitabba.m dassanabhaagiyena ca bhaavanaabhaagiyena ca asekkhabhaagiyena ca. lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca. yasmi.m sutte ya.m ya.m pada.m dissati sa.mkilesabhaagiya.m vaa vaasanaabhaagiya.m vaa, tena tena lokiyanti niddisitabba.m, dassanabhaagiya.m vaa ^a^V0.0162^ea^ bhaavanaabhaagiya.m vaa asekkhabhaagiya.m vaa ya.m ya.m pada.m dissati tena tena lokuttaranti niddisitabba.m.

[03] vaasanaabhaagiya.m ^a^M0.0164^ea^ sutta.m sa.mkilesabhaagiyassa suttassa nigghaataaya, dassanabhaagiya.m sutta.m vaasanaabhaagiyassa suttassa nigghaataaya, bhaavanaabhaagiya.m sutta.m dassanabhaagiyassa suttassa pa.tinissaggaaya, asekkhabhaagiya.m sutta.m bhaavanaabhaagiyassa suttassa pa.tinissaggaaya, asekkhabhaagiya.m sutta.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarattha.m.
[03] lokuttara.m sutta.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m chabbiisatiyaa puggalehi niddisitabba.m, te tiihi suttehi samanvesitabbaa dassanabhaagiyena bhaavanaabhaagiyena asekkhabhaagiyena caati.

[03] tattha dassanabhaagiya.m sutta.m pa~ncahi puggalehi niddisitabba.m ekabiijinaa kola.mkolena sattakkhattuparamena saddhaanusaarinaa dhammaanusaarinaa caati, dassanabhaagiya.m sutta.m imehi pa~ncahi puggalehi niddisitabba.m. bhaavanaabhaagiya.m sutta.m dvaadasahi puggalehi niddisitabba.m sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipannena, sakadaagaaminaa, anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipannena, anaagaaminaa ^a^P0.0190^ea^, antaraa parinibbaayinaa, upahacca parinibbaayinaa, asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayinaa, sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayinaa, uddha.msotena akani.t.thagaaminaa, saddhaavimuttena, di.t.thippattena, kaayasakkhinaa caati, bhaavanaabhaagiya.m sutta.m imehi dvaadasahi puggalehi niddisitabba.m. asekkhabhaagiya.m sutta.m navahi puggalehi niddisitabba.m saddhaavimuttena, pa~n~naavimuttena, su~n~natavimuttena, animittavimuttena, appa.nihitavimuttena, ubhatobhaagavimuttena samasiisinaa paccekabuddhasammaasambuddhehi caati, asekkhabhaagiya.m sutta.m imehi navahi puggalehi niddisitabba.m. eva.m lokuttara.m sutta.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m imehi chabbiisatiyaa puggalehi niddisitabba.m.

[03] lokiya.m sutta.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m ekuunaviisatiyaa puggalehi niddisitabba.m. te caritehi niddi.t.thaa samanvesitabbaa keci raagacaritaa, keci dosacaritaa, keci mohacaritaa, keci raagacaritaa ca dosacaritaa ca, keci raagacaritaa ca mohacaritaa ca, keci dosacaritaa ca mohacaritaa ca, keci raagacaritaa ca dosacaritaa ca mohacaritaa ca, raagamukhe .thito raagacarito, raagamukhe .thito dosacarito, raagamukhe .thito mohacarito, raagamukhe .thito raagacarito ca dosacarito ca mohacarito ca, dosamukhe .thito dosacarito, dosamukhe .thito mohacarito, dosamukhe .thito raagacarito, dosamukhe .thito raagacarito ca dosacarito ^a^M0.0165^ea^ ca mohacarito ^a^V0.0163^ea^ ca, mohamukhe .thito mohacarito, mohamukhe .thito raagacarito mohamukhe .thito dosacarito, mohamukhe .thito raagacarito ca dosacarito ca mohacarito caati, lokiya.m sutta.m sattaadhi.t.thaana.m imehi ekuunaviisatiyaa puggalehi niddisitabba.m.

[03] lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca sattaadhi.t.thaana~nca dhammaadhi.t.thaana~nca ubhayena niddisitabba.m, ~naa.na.m pa~n~naaya niddisitabba.m pa~n~nindriyena pa~n~naabalena adhipa~n~naasikkhaaya dhammavicayasambojjha"ngena sammaadi.t.thiyaa tiira.naaya santiira.naaya dhamme ~naa.nena anvaye ~naa.nena khaye ~naa.nena anuppaade ~naa.nena ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyena a~n~nindriyena a~n~naataavindriyena cakkhunaa vijjaaya buddhiyaa bhuuriyaa medhaaya, ya.m ya.m vaa pana labbhati, tena tena pa~n~naadhivacanena niddisitabba.m.

[03] ~neyya.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppannehi ajjhattikabaahirehi hiinappa.niitehi duurasantikehi sa"nkhataasa"nkhatehi kusalaakusalaabyaakatehi sa"nkhepato vaa chahi aaramma.nehi niddisitabba.m. ~naa.na~nca ~neyya~nca tadubhayena niddisitabba.m, pa~n~naapi aaramma.nabhuutaa ~neyya.m, ya.m ki~nci aaramma.nabhuuta.m ajjhattika.m vaa baahira.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m sa"nkhatena asa"nkhatena ca niddisitabba.m.

[03] dassana.m bhaavanaa {dassanaa bhaavanaa (sii0)} sakavacana.m paravacana.m visajjaniiya.m avisajjaniiya.m kamma.m vipaakoti sabbattha tadubhaya.m sutte yathaa niddi.t.tha.m, tathaa upadhaarayitvaa labbhamaanato niddisitabba.m, ya.m vaa pana ki~nci bhagavaa a~n~nataravacana.m bhaasati, sabba.m ta.m yathaaniddi.t.tha.m dhaarayitabba.m.

[03] duvidho hetu ya~nca kamma.m ye ca kilesaa, samudayo kilesaa. tattha ^a^P0.0192^ea^ kilesaa sa.mkilesabhaagiyena suttena niddisitabbaa. samudayo sa.mkilesabhaagiyena ^a^M0.0166^ea^ ca vaasanaabhaagiyena ca suttena niddisitabbo. tattha kusala.m catuuhi suttehi niddisitabba.m vaasanaabhaagiyena dassanabhaagiyena bhaavanaabhaagiyena asekkhabhaagiyena ca. akusala.m sa.mkilesabhaagiyena suttena niddisitabba.m ^a^V0.0164^ea^. kusala~nca akusala~nca tadubhayena {tadubhayehi (sii0)} niddisitabba.m. anu~n~naata.m bhagavato anu~n~naataaya niddisitabba.m, ta.m pa~ncavidha.m sa.mvaro pahaana.m bhaavanaa sacchikiriyaa kappiyaanulomoti, ya.m dissati taasu taasu bhuumiisu, ta.m kappiyaanulomena niddisitabba.m. pa.tikkhitta.m bhagavataa pa.tikkhittakaara.nena niddisitabba.m. anu~n~naata~nca pa.tikkhitta~nca tadubhayena niddisitabba.m. thavo pasa.msaaya niddisitabbo. so pa~ncavidhena veditabbo bhagavato dhammassa ariyasa"nghassa ariyadhammaana.m sikkhaaya lokiyagu.nasampattiyaati. eva.m thavo pa~ncavidhena niddisitabbo.

[21] ``navahi ca padehi kusalaa, navahi ca yujjanti akusalappakkhaa.
[22] ete khalu muulapadaa, bhavanti a.t.thaarasa padaanii''ti..
